T04bsa054_u:3869: māmāśritya tu yāntyete narakān dīrghavedanān // Bca_6.48 //
T04bsa054_u:3872: etānapakāriṇa āśritya nimittīkṛtya mama pāpaṃ pūrvajanmakṛtaparāpakārajanitaṃ kṣīyate tadduḥkhānubhavanavipākena kṣayaṃ yāti /
T04bsa054_u:3875: māmāśritya matkarmacoditāḥ evamapyapakāraṃ kṛtvā punarete narakān tīvravedanān duḥsahaduḥkhānubhavān yānti /
T04bsa054_u:3876: ata uktakrameṇa ahameva apakārī eṣāmityādi subodham //
T04bsa054_u:3881: eṣāmatra kimāyātaṃ yadyātmā rakṣito mayā // Bca_6.50 //
T04bsa054_u:3884: na tu punareṣāṃ durāśayatayā narakeṣu mamāpatanamiti bhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:3886: ayamatra samudāyārthaḥ- yadyahamapakārī sannapi kenacidupāyakauśalena narakān na yāmi,
T04bsa054_u:3893: na caitāvatā kiṃcideṣāṃ nyūnādhikaṃ guṇadoṣeṣu syāt //
T04bsa054_u:3896: atha pratyapakārī syāṃ tathāpyete na rakṣitāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:3897: hīyate cāpi me caryā tasmānnaṣṭāstapasvinaḥ // Bca_6.51 //
T04bsa054_u:3900: na kaścideṣāṃ pratīkāro narakagamanādiṣu kṛtaḥ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:3902: tathā sarvasattveṣu na maitracittaṃ mayā niści[kṣepta?]tavyam /
T04bsa054_u:3905: tasmādetarhi pratīkāropāyābhāvāttapasvino varākā rakśitumaśakyatvānnaṣṭā durgatipatitā eva /
T04bsa054_u:3907: paścāttadupāyamadhigamya tatkariṣyāmi yathaiṣāṃ duḥkhamaṇumātrakamapi na syāt //
T04bsa054_u:3911: dvividhaṃ duḥkhamavicārato bādhakamupajāyate kāyikaṃ mānasikaṃ ceti /
T04bsa054_u:3912: tatra manasi na kaściddaṇḍādikaṃ dātuṃ śaktaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:3914: iti tadudbhavaṃ duḥkhaṃ paramārthato na saṃbhavati /
T04bsa054_u:3917: mamedaṃ śarīramiti vikalpābhyāsavāsanāvaśāt kāyaduḥkhena cittaṃ vihanyate //
T04bsa054_u:3920: kāyaṃ na bādhate tena cetaḥ kasmātprakupyasi // Bca_6.53 //
T04bsa054_u:3922: na hi kāyasyāyaṃ kaṃcidupaghātaṃ karotīti yena,
T04bsa054_u:3924: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma nyakkārādayaḥ kāyasya bādhakā na bhavanti,
T04bsa054_u:3927: mayyaprasādo yo 'nyeṣāṃ sa māṃ kiṃ bhakṣayiṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:3928: iha janmāntare vāpi yenāsau me 'nabhīpsitaḥ // Bca_6.54 //
T04bsa054_u:3932: sa kiṃ māṃ bhakṣayiṣyati ihaloke paraloka vā,
T04bsa054_u:3937: naṅkṣyatīhaiva me lābhaḥ pāpaṃ tu sthāsyati dhruvam // Bca_6.55 //
T04bsa054_u:3945: tannimittaṃ nyakkārādikartṛṣu krudhyato yatpāpaṃ tadeva paraṃ sthāsyati paralokānubandhi bhaviṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:3949: yasmācciramapi sthitvā mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ tadeva me // Bca_6.56 //
T04bsa054_u:3950: idameva varaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yallābhābhāvādasminnevāhani me maraṇamastu,
T04bsa054_u:3951: na tu punaḥ parāpakāradvāreṇa lābhapratilambhānmithyājīvitaṃ ciraṃ dīrghakālam /
T04bsa054_u:3952: kutaḥ? yasmādvahutarakālamapi jīvitvā maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam ityavaśyaṃbhāvino mṛtyorduḥkhaṃ tadeva mama /
T04bsa054_u:3956: svapne varṣaśataṃ saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yaśca vibudhyate /
T04bsa054_u:3957: muhūrtamaparo yaśca sukhī bhūtvā vibudhyate // Bca_6.57 //
T04bsa054_u:3963: anayordvayorapi svapnopalabdhopabhuktasukhayoḥ prativibuddhayoḥ satoḥ tadupalabdhaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ na nivartate,
T04bsa054_u:3970: labdhvāpi ca bahūṃllābhān ciraṃ bhuktvā sukhānyapi /
T04bsa054_u:3971: riktahastaśca nagraśca yāsyāmi muṣito yathā // Bca_6.59 //
T04bsa054_u:3977: kaṭisūtrakamātramapi na pariśeṣitamiti nagnaśca cauraiḥ parimuṣita iva asmāllokātparaṃ lokaṃ yāsyāmi //
T04bsa054_u:3978: syādetat- astyeva viśeṣo lābhasya cīvarādīnāmanupaghātādāyuḥsaṃskārāṇāmupastambhācciratarakālaṃ jīvitaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:3979: tataśca pūrvakṛtapāpasya vidūṣaṇāsamudācārādinā parikṣayaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaraparirakṣaṇena bodhicittasevanādinā ca kuśalapakṣasya ca vṛddhiṃ kuryām / yaduktam-
T04bsa054_u:3982: ato lābhāntarāyakāriṇi yukta eva pradveṣa ityāśaṅkayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:3983: pāpakṣayaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca lābhājjīvan karomi cet /
T04bsa054_u:3984: lābhāduktakrameṇa jīvan dhriyamāṇaḥ pāpakṣayaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca karomītyādi manyase /
T04bsa054_u:3985: nanu etaditaḥ samadhikaṃ doṣamapaśyatā abhidhīyata ityāha-
T04bsa054_u:3986: puṇyakṣayaśca pāpaṃ ca lābhārthaṃ krudhyato nanu // Bca_6.60 //
T04bsa054_u:3987: lābhārthaṃ lābhanimittaṃ tadantarāyakāriṇi dveṣaṃ kurvataḥ sukṛtakṣaya evopajāyate /
T04bsa054_u:3989: ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ- akṣāntisamudbhavasya pāpasya rāśirabhivardhate //
T04bsa054_u:3990: athāpi syāt- yathākathaṃcit tāvaccirakālaṃ lābhājjīvitaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:3997: tadā kiṃ tena tādṛśena jīvitenāpi kevalāśubhakarmakaraṇaśīlena?
T04bsa054_u:4003: parāyaśaskare 'pyevaṃ kopaste kiṃ na jāyate // Bca_6.62 //
T04bsa054_u:4021: parāśritāprasādattvādaprasādiṣu aprasannacitteṣu avarṇavādiṣu tava kṣamā kṣāntirūtpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:4024: yadi yaḥ parāyattāprasādaḥ tatra kṣamā bhavato bhavati,
T04bsa054_u:4031: na yujyate mama dveṣo buddhādīnāṃ na hi vyathā // Bca_6.64 //
T04bsa054_u:4035: kutaḥ? yasmādbuddhādīnāṃ bodhisattvāryaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ vitathābhiniveśaprasūtātmagrāhanivṛtterabhiṣvaṅgābhāvānna vyathā cittapīḍālakṣaṇaṃ daurmanasyaṃ nāsti /
T04bsa054_u:4038: tathā viruddhadharmakāriṣu karuṇaiva tu yujyate teṣu sādhūnām /
T04bsa054_u:4050: tathā priyāṇāṃ premasthānānāṃ cāpakāriṣu kopaṃ nivārayediti saṃbandhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4055: tadanena yathā aparasamaye devagurudvijātimātāpitṛprabhṛtīnāmarthe pāpaṃ kurvato 'pi na doṣa iti matam,
T04bsa054_u:4057: kiṃ ca / idamapi vastutattvaṃ manasi kurvatā na sattveṣu cittaṃ dūṣayitavyamityāha-
T04bsa054_u:4059: sā vyathā cetane dṛṣṭā kṣamasvaināṃ vyathāmataḥ // Bca_6.66 //
T04bsa054_u:4061: sā ca sāmagrī vastudharmatayā kācit kvacit samarthasvabhāvā /
T04bsa054_u:4066: svayameva yadṛcchayā vā loṣṭakuḍyādyabhighātajanitā vā dehināṃ śarīriṇāṃ niyatā vyathā niyamena samutpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:4068: sā caivaṃ dvividhakāraṇasāmagrīprasūtāpi cetane savijñānake kāye dṛṣṭā pramāṇapariniścitā /
T04bsa054_u:4072: tato yad yasyotpattisthānaṃ tat tatraiva bhavati nānyatra,
T04bsa054_u:4074: ataḥ asmānyāyāt kṣamasva sahasva enāmanantarakathitobhayarūpāṃ vyathām //
T04bsa054_u:4075: tadānīmubhayorapi sādhāraṇadūṣaṇatayā kvacidapi kopo na yukta iti kathayitumāha-
T04bsa054_u:4077: brūmaḥ kameṣu nirdoṣaṃ kaṃ vā brūmo 'parādhinam // Bca_6.67 //
T04bsa054_u:4083: itthaṃ brūmaḥ- kam eṣu kleśarākṣasāveśavaśīkṛteṣu nirdoṣam,
T04bsa054_u:4086: (Bcp 99) idamapi ca ātmagatameva cintayatā pratighacittaṃ nivartayitavyamityāha-
T04bsa054_u:4087: kasmādevaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yenaivaṃ bādhyase paraiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4095: tathāpi pratīkāro yukta ityāha- sarva ityādi /
T04bsa054_u:4096: sarve duḥkhahetavaḥ karmapratyayopajanitapravṛttayaḥ iti ko 'hamatra anyathākṛtau tatphalanivartanāya? na kaścit /
T04bsa054_u:4099: evaṃ buddhvā tu puṇyeṣu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham /
T04bsa054_u:4100: yena sarve bhaviṣyanti maitracittāḥ parasparam // Bca_6.69 //
T04bsa054_u:4101: ete sattvāḥ karmakleśaparāyattāḥ parasparamasamañjasakarmakāriṇo nivartayitumaśakyā iti /
T04bsa054_u:4102: evaṃ buddhvā jñātvā punaḥ puṇyeṣu kuśaleṣu karmasu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham,
T04bsa054_u:4104: yena tathāvidhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ pratilabhya sanmārge pravartitāḥ santaḥ sarve maitracittā hitasukhavidhānatatparāḥ parasparamanyonyaṃ bhaviṣyanti
T04bsa054_u:4105: drohacittaṃ vinivartya priyavastūpaghātakāriṇi laukikodāharaṇena dveṣaṃ nivartayediti ślokadvayamupadarśayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:4110: ekasmin gṛhe 'gninā dahyamāne yathā tasmād gṛhādanyad gṛhaṃ gṛhāntaraṃ gatvā /
T04bsa054_u:4112: tadantargatamanyadapi vastu mā dhākṣīditi śaṅkayā tadākṛṣyāpanīyate,
T04bsa054_u:4115: evamuktodāharaṇanyāyena cittaṃ mano yasya vastuna āsaṅgādāsakto dahyate paritapyate
T04bsa054_u:4116: dveṣavahninā pratighānalena tadāsaṅgasthānaṃ vastu tatkṣaṇaṃ na kālāntarapalimbena
T04bsa054_u:4121: tasya uktakrameṇa uddāhaḥ parikṣayo mā bhūt /
T04bsa054_u:4130: pratyuta labdhalābhamātmānaṃ manyate atyalpamidaṃ maraṇaduḥkhāt karacchedanaduḥkhamiti /
T04bsa054_u:4131: tathā yo 'pi manuṣyaduḥkhaṃ tāḍanabandhanatiraskārādikṛtamanubhūya narakaduḥkhādvimukto bhavati,
T04bsa054_u:4137: athāpi syāt- na mayā svalpamātre 'pi duḥkhe kṣamā kartuṃ śakyata iti, atrāha-
T04bsa054_u:4140: khaṭacapeṭaloṣṭādiprahārakṛtamīṣanmātramapi duḥkhamidānīṃ soḍhuṃ marṣituṃ na pāryate na śakyate /
T04bsa054_u:4142: tadayaṃ nārakaduḥkhasaṃvartanīyaḥ krodhaḥ kopaḥ kasmātkāraṇānna vāryate?
T04bsa054_u:4143: ayameva hi atitarāṃ narakeṣu duḥkhadāyaka iti duḥkhabhīrūṇāmeva krodhaṃ nivartayituṃ yuktaṃ syāt //
T04bsa054_u:4144: kiṃ ca / yadyapi soḍhuṃ na śakyate,
T04bsa054_u:4147: marṣaṇāt punastasya mahārthalābho bhaviṣyatīti vṛttadvayena śikṣayitumāha-
T04bsa054_u:4149: kārito 'smi na cātmārthaḥ parārtho vā kṛto mayā // Bca_6.74 //
T04bsa054_u:4150: na cedaṃ tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahārthaṃ ca kariṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:4157: evaṃ duḥkhamanubhavatāpi mayā na ca naiva ātmārthaḥ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaphalasādhanaḥ kṛto niṣpāditaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4160: tadadyāpi na tathaiva mamāsahiṣṇutā yuktetyāha- idaṃ duḥkhaṃ naiva tādṛśaṃ yādṛśaṃ narakasamudbhavam /
T04bsa054_u:4161: atha ca mahārthaṃ sarvasattvahitasukhavidhānabhūtaṃ buddhatvaṃ sādhayiṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:4162: ato jagato duḥkhahare trijagatparyāpannasarvasattvaduḥkhapraśamanakare duḥkhe prītirevātra yujyate nāruciriti bhāvaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:4165: manastvamapi taṃ stutvā kasmādevaṃ na hṛṣyasi // Bca_6.76 //
T04bsa054_u:4166: guṇādhikaṃ stutvā yadi prītisukhaṃ kaiścit prāptam,
T04bsa054_u:4167: tadā he manaḥ tvamapi tadguṇasaṃvarṇanena kimiti harṣasukhaṃ nānubhavasi?
T04bsa054_u:4172: yatra yatra ratiṃ yāti manaḥ sukhavimohitam /
T04bsa054_u:4176: idaṃ ca te hṛṣṭisukhaṃ niravadyaṃ sukhodayam /
T04bsa054_u:4177: na vāritaṃ ca guṇibhiḥ parāvarjanamuttamam // Bca_6.77 //
T04bsa054_u:4180: idaṃ ca paraguṇāśrayaṃ hṛṣṭisukhaṃ niravadyaṃ tava,
T04bsa054_u:4183: ata eva na vāritaṃ ca guṇibhirbhagavacchāsanavidhijñaiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4186: guṇeṣu evamayaṃ matsarīti manyamānā anye 'pi sattvā āvarjitā bhavanti,
T04bsa054_u:4189: kiṃ tarhi tāvattasyaiva sukhametaditi mayā soḍhumaśakyamiti / atrāha-
T04bsa054_u:4190: tasyaiva sukhamityevaṃ tavedaṃ yadi na priyam /
T04bsa054_u:4192: tasyaiva stutikartuḥ sukhamiti evamanenābhiprāyeṇa bhavato yadi idaṃ paraguṇastutipratisamudbhavaṃ sukhaṃ na priyam,
T04bsa054_u:4195: yadapi ca bhavataḥ svātmasukhanimittaṃ svabhṛtyādiṣu bhṛtidānaṃ karmamūlyadānam,
T04bsa054_u:4203: kiṃ ca / mithyottaramevedaṃ bhavata iti pratipādayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:4215: tasyaiva sukhamityevaṃ tavedaṃ yadi na priyam /
T04bsa054_u:4223: yataḥ sarvasattvāḥ triadhātukāntaścarāḥ samastasukhasaṃpattisaṃtarpitā buddhatvamadhigamya mayā kartavyāḥ iti manasikāreṇa bodhicittamutpādyate
T04bsa054_u:4228: iti akaraṇīyameva tat parasukhavaimukhyacittaṃ bodhisattvasyeti bhāvaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:4229: yaḥ punarutpāditabodhicitto 'pi parasya lābhasatkārasaṃpattimabhisamīkṣya tadīrṣyākaṣāyitahṛdayaḥ tenaiva śokena dahyate,
T04bsa054_u:4232: satkāramitvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ kiṃ paridahyase // Bca_6.81 //
T04bsa054_u:4233: athavā syādetat- na khalu mayā tatsukhameva na mṛṣyate,
T04bsa054_u:4235: trayo lokāeva kāmarūpārūpyadhātulakṣaṇāḥ lokaprasiddhayā vā svargādisvabhāvāḥ trailokyam,
T04bsa054_u:4245: puṣṇāti yastvayā poṣyaṃ tubhyameva dadāti saḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4246: kuṭumbajīvinaṃ labdhvā na hṛṣyasi prakupyasi // Bca_6.82 //
T04bsa054_u:4247: tvayā poṣaṇīyaṃ priyaputrakādikaṃ tvadīyaṃ yaḥ puṣṇāti,
T04bsa054_u:4250: ataḥ tvatkuṭumbajīvinaṃ tvadīyaṃ kuṭumbaṃ jīvayati yaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:4251: taṃ tathāvidhaṃ puruṣaṃ labdhvā prāpya prahṛṣyasi na?
T04bsa054_u:4254: tathā prakṛte 'pi yena sarvasattvā ātmīyatvena gṛhītāḥ,
T04bsa054_u:4258: sa kiṃ necchasi sattvānāṃ yasteṣāṃ bodhimicchati /
T04bsa054_u:4260: jagadadya nimantritaṃ mayā sugatatvena sukhena cāntarā //
T04bsa054_u:4264: tathāpi yaḥ samutpāditabodhicittaḥ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhiṃ buddhatvamicchati,
T04bsa054_u:4274: api ca / aparasya lābhasatkārasaṃpadabhāve 'pi na bhavatastadbhāvasaṃbhavaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4275: tatkimakāraṇameva tadvidveṣiṇā ātmaghātāya yatnaḥ kriyate iti pratipādayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:4276: yadi tena na tallabdhaṃ sthitaṃ dānapatergṛhe /
T04bsa054_u:4277: sarvathāpi na tatte 'sti dattādattena tena kim // Bca_6.84 //
T04bsa054_u:4278: yadi nāma tena tava akṣamāviṣayeṇa sattvena taddīyamānaṃ vastu na labdham,
T04bsa054_u:4281: sarvathāpi tena labdhena gṛhāvasthitena vā na tadvastu tavāsti /
T04bsa054_u:4287: labhamāno na gṛhṇātu vada kena na kupyasi // Bca_6.85 //
T04bsa054_u:4289: sa kiṃ vārayatu puṇyāni pūrvajanmakṛtāni vipākonmukhāni,
T04bsa054_u:4297: brūhi kena prakāreṇa atra na bhavato 'paritoṣaḥ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:4298: tatra puṇyādīnāṃ vārayitumaśakyatvāt labhyamānāgrahaṇe 'pi sarvathāpi na tatte 'stītyādinā bādhakasyoktatvāditi na kiṃcit paritoṣakāraṇamasti
T04bsa054_u:4299: athāpi syāt- parasyaiva lābhasatkārasaṃpattirasti, na mama /
T04bsa054_u:4303: na kevalaṃ tvamātmānaṃ kṛtapāpaṃ na śocasi /
T04bsa054_u:4313: (Bcp 104) yat kiṃcit sukhaṃ tat sarvaṃ puṇyaprasūtam /
T04bsa054_u:4314: iti sukhābhilāṣiṇā śubhe karmaṇi udyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4318: iti kathaṃ kṛtapuṇyaiḥ saha spardhā yujyate?
T04bsa054_u:4322: tava śatrordveṣaviṣayasya tvadabhilāṣamātreṇa apriyamaniṣṭaṃ jātamutpannaṃ ced yadi,
T04bsa054_u:4334: atha tvadicchayā siddhaṃ tadduḥkhe kiṃ sukhaṃ tava /
T04bsa054_u:4335: yadi nāma tavecchayā siddhaṃ niṣpannamapriyaṃ śatroḥ,
T04bsa054_u:4336: tathāpi tasya duḥkhe samutpanne kiṃ sukhaṃ tava? na kiṃcit /
T04bsa054_u:4338: nanu idameva prayojanaṃ yat tadduḥkhe mama saṃtuṣṭirityata āha-
T04bsa054_u:4339: athāpyartho bhavedevamanarthaḥ ko nvataḥ paraḥ // Bca_6.88 //
T04bsa054_u:4340: evamapi paraduḥkhaparitoṣe yadi arthaḥ prayojanaṃ bhavet,
T04bsa054_u:4341: tadā ataḥ paraḥ anarthaḥ ko nu?
T04bsa054_u:4346: yato narakapālāstvāṃ krītvā pakṣyanti kumbhiṣu // Bca_6.89 //
T04bsa054_u:4349: kleśā eva baḍiśena carantīti bāḍiśikāḥ tairarpitamādattam /
T04bsa054_u:4352: narakapālā yamapuruṣāḥ tvāṃ krītvā pakṣyanti pakṣyante /
T04bsa054_u:4358: stutiryaśo 'tha satkāro na puṇyāya na cāyuṣe /
T04bsa054_u:4359: na balārthaṃ na cārogye na ca kāyasukhāya me // Bca_6.90 //
T04bsa054_u:4368: iyāneva hi svārtho bhavato bhavet prajñāvataḥ svārthavedinaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4378: tadicchatā madyaṃ dyūtaṃ gaṇikā pāradārikaṃ sevanīyaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:4381: tasmāt saumanasya heturbhavato 'pi stutyādayo bālajanānandakāriṇo 'nupādeyā eva //
T04bsa054_u:4384: kecinmohapuruṣāḥ tādṛśaguṇāt svayamatisudūre vartamānā api śakrādiguṇaiḥ stūyamānā
T04bsa054_u:4385: bandijanairanyaiśca protphullanayanavadanā yaśorthino hastyaśvādidhanaṃ tṛṇavat tebhyaḥ prayacchanti /
T04bsa054_u:4386: tathā taireva guṇaiḥ saṃbhāvitātmanāmapi śakravat śatruvijayasamudbhūtaṃ yaśo mama jagati vipulatāṃ gamiṣyati,
T04bsa054_u:4390: kimakṣarāṇi bhakṣyāṇi mṛte kasya ca tatsukham // Bca_6.92 //
T04bsa054_u:4391: stutyādyabhidhāyakāni akṣarāṇi varṇāḥ kiṃ bhakṣyāṇi carvitavyāni?
T04bsa054_u:4392: yaśorthaṃ mṛte sati kasya ca tat sukhaṃ yaśaḥśravaṇasamuttham?
T04bsa054_u:4395: yathā kaścid bālo dhūlimayagṛheṇa paramaparitoṣeṇa parikrīḍamānaḥ kenacit tasmin bhagne mahadduḥkhena parigṛhītaḥ paramārtipīḍita iva madgṛhaṃ bhagnamiti karuṇasvaraṃ krandati,
T04bsa054_u:4397: tathā stutiyaśohānau svacittaṃ pratibhāti me // Bca_6.93 //
T04bsa054_u:4398: tathaiva stutiyaśohānau vighāte svacittaṃ duḥkhamāviśat pratibhāsate vicārayato mama /
T04bsa054_u:4399: atrāpi na vastusatā kenacid vipralambha iti parāmarṣṭavyam //
T04bsa054_u:4400: (Bcp 106) punaranyathā vicāreṇa bāladharma evāyamiti caturbhiḥ ślokaiḥ parāmṛśayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:4404: sa śabdo māṃ stauti madīyaṃ varṇamudīrayati /
T04bsa054_u:4407: paraḥ kila mayi prīta ityetatprītikāraṇam // Bca_6.94 //
T04bsa054_u:4415: anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā /
T04bsa054_u:4416: tasyaiva tatprītisukhaṃ bhāgo nālpo 'pi me tataḥ // Bca_6.95 //
T04bsa054_u:4417: yasmādanyasmin mayi vā prītyā parasaṃtānavartinyā kimāyātaṃ mama? na kiṃcit /
T04bsa054_u:4418: kutaḥ? tasyaiva tato ya eva prītaḥ stutikartā,
T04bsa054_u:4420: ato bhāgo nālpo 'pi īṣadapi mama tataḥ parasaṃtānavartinaḥ prītisukhāt //
T04bsa054_u:4422: tat kimiti tato bhāgo nāstīti? atrāha-
T04bsa054_u:4424: kasmādanyaprasādena sukhiteṣu na me sukham // Bca_6.96 //
T04bsa054_u:4426: tadā tasminnanyatra prasādena sukhite 'pi mamāstu tatsukhitvam /
T04bsa054_u:4428: na tvanyasmin prasādena sukhiteṣu mama sukham //
T04bsa054_u:4433: tadanyanimittābhāvāt ahaṃ stuta ityevaṃ vikalpanāt prītirātmabni jāyate,
T04bsa054_u:4436: ātmanyapi evamuktakrameṇa asaṃbandhādapratyāsatteḥ kāraṇāt kevalaṃ bālavilasitametat //
T04bsa054_u:4437: (Bcp 107) api ca / stutyādayo mama apacayameva dadhatītyupadarśayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:4439: guṇavatsu ca mātsaryaṃ saṃpatkopaṃ ca kurvate // Bca_6.98 //
T04bsa054_u:4447: tadguṇāsahanatayā vā saṃpadi lābhasatkārādisvabhāvāyāṃ kopaṃ ca amarṣaṃ kurvate teṣveva /
T04bsa054_u:4452: apāyapātarakṣārthaṃ pravṛttā nanu te mama // Bca_6.99 //
T04bsa054_u:4454: stutyādighātāya virodhāya ye sattvā mama pratyupasthitā udyatāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4456: tato rakṣārthaṃ trāṇārthaṃ rakṣaṇanimittaṃ pravṛttā udyuktā nanu te mama /
T04bsa054_u:4461: ye mocayanti māṃ bandhādveṣasteṣu kathaṃ mama // Bca_6.100 //
T04bsa054_u:4465: kalyāṇamitrakṛtyakāriṇaḥ śatrutvenābhimatā vimocayanti viyojayanti māṃ bandhāt saṃsāraduḥkhalakṣaṇāt lābhādisvabhāvādvā /
T04bsa054_u:4470: buddhādhiṣṭhānata iva dveṣasteṣu kathaṃ mama // Bca_6.101 //
T04bsa054_u:4476: kṣāntyā samaṃ tapo nāsti nanvetattadupasthitam // Bca_6.102 //
T04bsa054_u:4477: (Bcp 108) kuśalavighātaḥ kṛto 'nena ityevaṃ manasi nidhāya atra puṇyavighātakāriṇi dveṣo na yujyate /
T04bsa054_u:4478: kasmāt? yataḥ kṣāntyā titikṣayā samaṃ tulyaṃ tapaḥ sukṛtaṃ nāsti sarvaśubhakarmahetutvāt /
T04bsa054_u:4483: tatra pradveṣe tu ātmanaiva puṇyavighātaḥ kṛto bhavedityāha-
T04bsa054_u:4486: atha yadi ātmana eva doṣeṇa asahiṣṇutātmakena na karomi kṣamāṃ kṣāntimiha vighnakāriṇi,
T04bsa054_u:4487: tadā mayaiva na punaranyena atra puṇye kṛto vighnaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4493: yo hi yena vinā nāsti yasmiṃśca sati vidyate /
T04bsa054_u:4494: sa eva kāraṇaṃ tasya sa kathaṃ vighna ucyate // Bca_6.104 //
T04bsa054_u:4495: yo bhāvaḥ kāryābhimataḥ yena kāraṇābhimatena vinā nāsti,
T04bsa054_u:4500: evaṃ prakṛte 'pi sa janaka eva kathaṃ tasya janyasya vighna ucyate vighātaheturabhidhīyate?
T04bsa054_u:4501: tathāvidhe 'pi tathā vyavahāraṃ kurvato nāsti vipratipattiḥ //
T04bsa054_u:4504: na ca pravrājake prāpte pravrajyāvighna ucyate // Bca_6.105 //
T04bsa054_u:4505: na yasmāt kasyaciddānapaterditsākāle eva saṃprāptenārthinā yācanakena dānavighnaḥ kṛtaḥ ityucyate,
T04bsa054_u:4507: tathā kasyacit pravrajitukāmasya pravrājakasamavadhānaṃ pravrajyā saṃvarādigrahaṇasvabhāvā,
T04bsa054_u:4512: api ca / kṣāntiheturatidurlabha iti tatsamāgame prītireva yujyate ityupadarśayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:4514: atipracuraprāptikā yācanakā loke sarvatra sarveṣāṃ dīyamānagrahaṇāvaimukhyāt,
T04bsa054_u:4517: yadi kathaṃcit kaścit syādvā na veti /
T04bsa054_u:4520: (Bcp 109) yasmādanaparādhasya nivṛttaparāpakārasya mama nirnimittaṃ na kaścideko 'pi aparādhyati,
T04bsa054_u:4527: tasmād gṛhe prādurbhūto nidhiriva śramamantareṇaivādhigato ripurabhilaṣaṇīya eva mayā syāt,
T04bsa054_u:4529: evaṃvidhe paramapuruṣārthe sāhāyyaṃ bhajamānasya pratyupakārakaraṇameva kṛtajñatayā mama yuktamityupadarśayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:4531: etasmai prathamaṃ deyametatpūrvā kṣamā yataḥ // Bca_6.108 //
T04bsa054_u:4532: yasmādasau tatra sāhāyyaṃ kurvan kāraṇameva na vighnaḥ tasmānmayā kṣamāmabhyastatā,
T04bsa054_u:4536: kṣamāphalaṃ dharmādhigamalakṣaṇam etasmai dharmasahāyāya prathamamagrato dātavyaṃ mayā iti praṇidhātavyam /
T04bsa054_u:4539: eṣa eva pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
T04bsa054_u:4543: kṣamāsiddhayāśayo nāsya tena pūjyo na cedariḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4547: tena kāraṇena kuśalaheturapi yadi śatruḥ pūjanīyo na bhavati,
T04bsa054_u:4548: evaṃ tarhi kuśalaniṣpattihetuḥ nirabhiprāyo 'pi saddharmaḥ pravacanalakṣaṇaḥ kathaṃ pūjyate?
T04bsa054_u:4549: so 'pi tadāśayaśūnyatvāt pūjanīyo na syāt, iti bhāvaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:4553: anyathā me kathaṃ kṣāntirbhiṣajīva hitodyate // Bca_6.110 //
T04bsa054_u:4555: ityevamabhisaṃdhāya śatruryadi na pūjyate dānamānairna satkriyate /
T04bsa054_u:4556: anyatheti apakāriṇi dveṣacittamanivārayataḥ kathaṃ mama kṣāntiḥ?
T04bsa054_u:4567: sa evātaḥ kṣamāhetuḥ pūjyaḥ saddharmavanmayā // Bca_6.111 //
T04bsa054_u:4569: ataḥ asmāddhetoḥ tasya duṣṭāśayameva pratītya nimittīkṛtya samupajāyate kṣamā /
T04bsa054_u:4571: ataḥ asmāt sa eva yasyāśayaṃ pratītyotpadyate kṣamā kṣamāhetuḥ,
T04bsa054_u:4574: etaduktaṃ bhavati- kiṃ mamānena āśayavicāreṇa prayojanam?
T04bsa054_u:4584: etānārādhya bahavaḥ saṃpatpāraṃ yato gatāḥ // Bca_6.112 //
T04bsa054_u:4589: kutaḥ? yato yasmādetān sattvān jināṃśca ārādhya ānukūlyānuṣṭhānena bahavo buddhatvamadhigamya sarvalaukikalokottarasarvasaṃpattiparyantaṃ prāptāḥ
T04bsa054_u:4590: syādetat- yadi nāma sattvā api sarvasaṃpattihetavaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:4591: tathāpi tathāgataiḥ saha sādhāraṇatā na yukteti / atrāha-
T04bsa054_u:4593: jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvanna sattveṣviti kaḥ kramaḥ // Bca_6.113 //
T04bsa054_u:4594: ubhayebhyo 'pi buddhadharmāṇāṃ balavaiśāradyādīnāmāgame pratilambhe tulye aviśiṣṭe /
T04bsa054_u:4596: ataḥ sādhāraṇe 'pi hetubhāve jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvat,
T04bsa054_u:4600: nanu ca sattvānāṃ rāgādimalairhīnāśayatvāt kāraṇatve 'pi kathaṃ bhagavatsamānatā yujyate ityāśaṅkayāha-
T04bsa054_u:4601: āśayasya ca māhātmyaṃ na svataḥ kiṃ tu kāryataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4602: samaṃ ca tena māhātmyaṃ sattvānāṃ tena te samāḥ // Bca_6.114 //
T04bsa054_u:4604: tathāpi upayuktopayogitvena hetubhāvasya tulyatvāt samaṃ māhātmyamucyate /
T04bsa054_u:4605: tena hetunā te sattvāḥ samāḥ jinaistulyā ucyante iti nātra viśeṣaḥ kriyate //
T04bsa054_u:4617: na tu buddhaiḥ samāḥ kecidanantāṃśairguṇārṇavaiḥ // Bca_6.116 //
T04bsa054_u:4619: paramārthatastu na buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ samāḥ kecit sattvāḥ santi /
T04bsa054_u:4632: dṛśyate tasya pūjārthaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam // Bca_6.117 //
T04bsa054_u:4637: tasya tadguṇādhārasya pūjānimittaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam /
T04bsa054_u:4645: sattvārādhanamutsṛjya niṣkṛtiḥ kā parā bhavet // Bca_6.119 //
T04bsa054_u:4647: aparyantopakāriṇāṃ niṣkṛtiḥ tatkṛtāpakārasya niṣkrayaṇaṃ pariśodhanamiti yāvat /
T04bsa054_u:4650: prabhucittānukūlavartina eva bhṛtyasya vāñchitaṃ sidhyatītyavagamya sattvārādhanamevopādeyamiti pratipādayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:4651: bhindanti dehaṃ praviśantyavīciṃ yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:4653: karacaraṇaśironayanasvamāṃsāni chittvā chittvā pradattāni yeṣāṃ hitasukhavidhānāya,
T04bsa054_u:4654: tathā avīcīmapi paraduḥkhaduḥkhino yeṣāṃ kṛte praviśanti tatsamuddharaṇāya /
T04bsa054_u:4656: tatra teṣu sattveṣu kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:4657: anyathā tu kṛtamapi na kṛtaṃ bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:4659: yenaivam, tena paramāpakāriṣvapi na cittaṃ dūṣayitavyam /
T04bsa054_u:4660: kiṃ tu sarvamanekaprakāraṃ kāyavāṅmanobhirvā kalyāṇameva hitasukhameva vidhātavyameteṣu //
T04bsa054_u:4662: svayaṃ mama svāmina eva tāvad yadarthamātmanyapi nirvyapeikṣāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4663: ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu karomi mānaṃ na tu dāsabhāvam // Bca_6.121 //
T04bsa054_u:4664: mama svāmina eva buddhādayaḥ svayameva ātmanaiva /
T04bsa054_u:4669: tadahaṃ punaḥ teṣāṃ bhṛtyaḥ teṣu sattveṣu prabhuputreṣvatyantapriyeṣu kathaṃ karomi mānam,
T04bsa054_u:4673: ito 'pi ca sattvāpakāraṃ parityajya tadārādhanameva kartavyamityāha-
T04bsa054_u:4674: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrāḥ yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ praviśanti manyum /
T04bsa054_u:4676: yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ priyaputrāṇāmiva pitaro munīndrā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sukhe kāyamanojanmani mudaṃ harṣaṃ yānti,
T04bsa054_u:4677: yeṣāṃ ca duḥkhe manyuṃ praviśanti aparitoṣamāsādayanti /
T04bsa054_u:4685: sattvavyathāyāmapi tadvadeva na prītyupāyo 'sti dayāmayānām // Bca_6.123 //
T04bsa054_u:4686: samantāt sarvāvayavānabhivyāpya vahninā prajvalitaśarīrasya yathā pañcakāmaguṇairna saumanasyam,
T04bsa054_u:4689: tadvat tathaiva sattvānāṃ vyathāyāṃ duḥkhavedanāyāṃ na prīteḥ saumanasyasya upāyo heturasti kṛpātmakānāṃ bhagavatām //
T04bsa054_u:4693: tadadya pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yatkheditāstanmunayaḥ kṣamantām // Bca_6.124 //
T04bsa054_u:4699: yadi pratirūpamācaritaṃ tatra me kṣāntiṃ kurvantu anukampāmupādāya //
T04bsa054_u:4702: kurvantu me mūrdhni padaṃ janaughā vighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthaḥ // Bca_6.125 //
T04bsa054_u:4703: tathāgatānāmabhipretasaṃpādanāya loke lokaviṣaye sarvātmanā kāyena vācā manasā vā dāsībhāvaṃ svīkaromi /
T04bsa054_u:4704: te 'pi me prasādaṃ kurvanto mastake pādaṃ nidadhatu /
T04bsa054_u:4706: anena mayi purvāparādhamapāsya jagatāṃ patirbhagavān saṃtuṣṭamānaso bhavatu //
T04bsa054_u:4707: (Bcp 114) bhagavatsu ca gauravakāribhiḥ sattveṣvanādaro na kartavya iti prasādhayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:4708: ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagattaiḥ kṛpātmabhirnaiva hi saṃśayo 'sti /
T04bsa054_u:4709: dṛśyanta ete nanu sattvarūpāsta eva nāthāḥ kimanādaro 'tra // Bca_6.126 //
T04bsa054_u:4710: sarvatragadharmadhātuprativedhāt sarvasattvasamatāpādanaparātmaparivartanādinā vā ātmīkṛtaṃ svīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagat,
T04bsa054_u:4715: tasmāt sattvarūpeṇa buddhā bhagavanta evaite sattvā dṛśyante /
T04bsa054_u:4727: vikartuṃ naiva śaknoti dīrghadarśī mahājanaḥ // Bca_6.128 //
T04bsa054_u:4731: sa ca āgāmirājadaṇḍabhayadarśitayā mahājano vacanamātreṇāpi yāvadvikāramupagantumasamarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4734: yasmānnaiva sa ekākī tasya rājabalaṃ balam /
T04bsa054_u:4739: tathā na durbalaṃ kaṃcidaparāddhaṃ vimānayet // Bca_6.129 //
T04bsa054_u:4750: na tu punaḥ sattvāprasaktiphalasya rājāparādhaphalena samānatā samastītyāha-
T04bsa054_u:4756: kiṃbhūtam? yena duḥkhajātena nārakī vedanā anubhūyate //
T04bsa054_u:4760: ihaiva saubhāgyayaśaḥsausthityaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi // Bca_6.133 //
T04bsa054_u:4762: cakravartisukhaṃ sphītaṃ kṣamī prāpnoti saṃsaran // Bca_6.134 //
T04bsa054_u:4763: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paricchedaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:4766: tadevaṃ vipakṣapratiṣedhena tridhā kṣāntiṃ pratipādya vīryaṃ pratipādayitumāha-
T04bsa054_u:4767: evaṃ kṣamo bhajedvīryaṃ vīrye bodhiryataḥ sthitā /
T04bsa054_u:4768: na hi vīryaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ yathā vāyuṃ vināgatiḥ // Bca_7.1 //
T04bsa054_u:4787: yo 'yaṃ kuśalakarmaṇi dānādau śrutādau ca samudyamaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:4790: vipakṣeṇopahataṃ vīryamanaṅgamevābhimatasiddhaye iti tadvipakṣamapanayanāya darśayitumāha- tadvipakṣa ityādi /
T04bsa054_u:4791: tasya vīryasya viruddho vināśāya pakṣo vipakṣaḥ ka ucyate?
T04bsa054_u:4827: adyāpi etāṃ daśāṃ prāpto 'pi mṛtyormukhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ san kimiti na vetsi?
T04bsa054_u:4831: tathāpi nidrāṃ yāsyeva caṇḍālamahiṣo yathā // Bca_7.5 //
T04bsa054_u:4839: tena tāvatkālaṃ sukhānubhavanameva mama yuktamityatrāha- yadi nāmaivam,
T04bsa054_u:4842: kathaṃ te rocate bhoktuṃ kathaṃ nidrā kathaṃ ratiḥ // Bca_7.6 //
T04bsa054_u:4843: iti vadhyapuruṣasyeva sarvato vadhyaghātakairadhiṣṭhitasya vadhyabhūmiṃ nīyamānasya niḥsaraṇamapaśyataḥ sukhāsikāvalambanamanucitameva bhavataḥ
T04bsa054_u:4845: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma avaśyaṃbhāvitā mṛtyoḥ,
T04bsa054_u:4849: saṃbhṛtaḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ saṃbhāraḥ sāmagrī vadhāya vyādhijarālakṣaṇo yena /
T04bsa054_u:4852: tadā mṛtyumukhāntargataḥ asamaye ālasyaṃ tyaktvāpi kiṃ kariṣyasi?
T04bsa054_u:4861: idaṃ yadanāgate kartavyatayā manasikṛtaṃ tanna prāptam /
T04bsa054_u:4867: hato 'smīti vicintayan vihvalaḥ kiṃ kariṣyasītyanāgatena saṃbandhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4870: tena samucchūnāni samunnatāni sāśrūṇi sabāṣpāṇi raktāni tāmravarṇāni locanāni yeṣu ānaneṣu tāni tathā /
T04bsa054_u:4871: tathābhūtāni ānanāni mukhāni yeṣāṃ bandhūnāṃ te tathā /
T04bsa054_u:4877: maraṇasamayopasthitakṛtāntānucaramukhāni ca saroṣaparuṣabhṛkuṭīni saṃpaśyan vihvalaḥ kiṃ kariṣyasi?
T04bsa054_u:4878: svayaṃkṛtapāpakarmasmaraṇena maraṇasamaye kimityevaṃ mayā kṛtamiti paścāttāpena tāpitaḥ /

T04bsa054_u:5994: tadadya bhakṣitaṃ yāvat kimīrṣyālo na rakṣasi // Bca_8.46 //
T04bsa054_u:5998: tairgṛdhrairanyaiśca gomāyuprabhṛtibhirmāṃsocchrayaṃ māṃsapuñjamimaṃ bhakṣitaṃ bībhatsaṃ dṛṣṭvā kimīrṣyālo na rakṣasīti yojayitavyam /
T04bsa054_u:5999: kimidānīṃ palāyase iti vā vyavahitena saṃbandhaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:6002: niścalādapi kāṣṭhaloṣṭhasamānāt tava trāso jāyate iti kākkā pṛcchati /
T04bsa054_u:6004: evamapi bībhatsarūpāt īkṣitāt dṛṣṭāt yadi vā evaṃ trāsaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6006: yadevaṃ calataḥ kathaṃ na trāsa ityāha-
T04bsa054_u:6007: vetāleneva kenāpi cālyamānādbhayaṃ na kim // Bca_8.48 //
T04bsa054_u:6008: bhūtagraheṇa cālyamānāt jīvataścalataḥ kiṃ na bhayaṃ bhavati?
T04bsa054_u:6013: tatrāmedhyamaniṣṭaṃ te lālāpānaṃ kathaṃ priyam // Bca_8.49 //
T04bsa054_u:6029: kutaḥ? daurgandhyamaśuciniṣyandaṃ na muñcantīti kṛtvā aśuciparipūrite strīkalevare eva ramante /
T04bsa054_u:6035: syādetat- yadi nāma aśucitvamamedhye strīkalevare ca sādhāraṇam,
T04bsa054_u:6039: na cetprayojanaṃ tena kasmācchannaṃ vimṛdyate // Bca_8.51 //
T04bsa054_u:6045: atha tathābhūte sarvathā vaimukhyameva te nācchannena kiṃcit prayojanaṃ tavāsti /
T04bsa054_u:6046: yadyevam, tarhi kasmāddhetoḥ channaṃ viśeṣeṇa mṛdyate,
T04bsa054_u:6048: api ca / idamapi praṣṭavyastvam- kiṃ bhavānaśucivirāgo na veti /
T04bsa054_u:6065: atha śucau rāga iti dvitīyo vikalpaḥ svīkriyate,
T04bsa054_u:6068: anyathāvatāryateyaduktaṃ pareṇa- channe carmādinā rāgo bhavati nācchanne /
T04bsa054_u:6070: yadi tena hetunā carmādinā pihitatvāditi kṛtvā aśucau rāgo bhavati bhavataḥ,
T04bsa054_u:6083: acetanaṃ svabhāvena māṃsaṃ tvaṃ kathamicchasi // Bca_8.54 //
T04bsa054_u:6091: ityevaṃ tatpralobhāt pratyupakāradhiyā vā draṣṭuṃ spraṣṭuṃ ca vāñchasi,
T04bsa054_u:6095: na tu punaryathāpare varṇayanti- caitanyayogādacetanamapi cetanamabhidhīyate /
T04bsa054_u:6096: tādṛśaṃ māṃsaṃ tvamacetanasvabhāvaṃ kāmukaḥ san kathamicchasi?
T04bsa054_u:6098: tathā ca sati bhavānapi na cetanaḥ syāt //
T04bsa054_u:6101: yadicchasi na taccittaṃ draṣṭuṃ spraṣṭuṃ ca śakyate /
T04bsa054_u:6102: yacca śakyaṃ na tadvetti kiṃ tadāliṅgase mudhā // Bca_8.55 //
T04bsa054_u:6105: yacca māṃsādisvabhāvaṃ kalevaraṃ draṣṭuṃ spraṣṭuṃ ca śakyate,
T04bsa054_u:6116: svāmedhyamayameva tvaṃ taṃ nāvaiṣīti vismayaḥ // Bca_8.56 //
T04bsa054_u:6122: yat svasyātmano 'medhyamayaṃ tvaṃ taṃ kāyaṃ nāvaiṣi nāvagacchasi //
T04bsa054_u:6140: yadi te nāśucau rāgaḥ kasmādāliṅgase param /
T04bsa054_u:6145: tadeva amedhyaṃ mātāpitṛśukraśoṇitasvabhāvaṃ bījaṃ yasya tattathoktam /
T04bsa054_u:6146: tena vardhitamiti tena amedhyena mātṛpītāśitasya vāntakalpasya rasena vardhitaṃ garbhasthitamupabṛṃhitam /
T04bsa054_u:6177: śmaśāne patitān ghorān kāyān paśyāparānapi // Bca_8.63 //
T04bsa054_u:6184: vikhāditakavinīlakavipūyakādisvabhāvatayā bībhatsān bhayaṃkarān vā aparāniti ato 'dhikān //
T04bsa054_u:6185: kiṃ ca / prakṛtyā vikṛta evāyaṃ kāyo nābhiratisthānaṃ yujyate ityupadarśayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:6187: kathaṃ jñātvāpi tatraiva punarutpadyate ratiḥ // Bca_8.64 //
T04bsa054_u:6191: evaṃ tatsvabhāvaṃ viditvāpi kathaṃ tasminneva sthāne bhayasthānatvena ekadā pratipanne punaranyadā jāyate ratirabhiṣvaṅgaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:6192: syādetat- yadi nāma aśucisvabhāvatā kāyasya adhyakṣasiddhā,
T04bsa054_u:6200: ataḥ kasmāt parakīyena gandhena candanasamudbhūtena anyatra yasyāsau gandho na bhavati,
T04bsa054_u:6211: evaṃ guṇasaṃbhave 'pi kiṃ kāraṇamanarthapriyo lokaḥ taṃ kāyaṃ gandhenānulimpati?
T04bsa054_u:6220: atha tadvaśāt tasmin kamanīyatāmupādāya abhiratirutpadyate ityatrāha-
T04bsa054_u:6236: yadi kāyaḥ prakṛtyā bhīṣaṇaḥ pretānāmiva svabhāvena bhayaṃkaraḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6245: ātmanaiva saṃcintya ātmano vyāmohamutpādayituṃ yatnavadbhiḥ unmattairasvasthacittaiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6246: evaṃ ca viparītakarmānuṣṭhānānnaite varākāḥ sacetasa iti khedaṃ karoti śāsrakāraḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6247: na cātra kaścidātmajño dṛśyata iti unmattairākulā samākīrṇā mahī pṛthivīti //
T04bsa054_u:6249: kaṅkālān katicidṛṣṭvā śmaśāne kila te ghṛṇā /
T04bsa054_u:6253: etaduktaṃ bhavati- carmaṇyutpāṭite [8. 64] ityādikamuktvā yaduktaṃ kathaṃ jñātvāpītyādi,
T04bsa054_u:6261: tadeva śarīraṃ śmaśāne ghṛṇāsthānagrāme vā abhiratisthānamiti kākvā brūte /
T04bsa054_u:6268: tathā ca evaṃ vidhamapi draviṇavikalasya naitat sulabhamityupadarśayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:6271: vinā mūlyaṃ dravyamantareṇa na labhyate na prāpyate /
T04bsa054_u:6279: yātyarjanena tāruṇyaṃ vṛddhaḥ kāmaiḥ karoti kim // Bca_8.72 //
T04bsa054_u:6282: kena dhanena prakāreṇa vā asau bālo yauvane yuvāvasthāyāṃ sukhī syāt?
T04bsa054_u:6284: yadapi kasyacit pitṛpitāmahopārjitadhanena yauvane sukhitvaṃ dṛśyate,
T04bsa054_u:6288: tadarjayata eva galitavayaso na kaścidupayogo viṣayairiti //
T04bsa054_u:6289: athāpi syāt- tadarjayatāpi kāmasukhamanubhūyata eva, ityatrāha-
T04bsa054_u:6291: gṛhamāgatya sāyāhne śerate sma mṛtā iva // Bca_8.73 //
T04bsa054_u:6293: astaṃ gate savitari svagṛhamāgatya gāḍhamiddhākrāntatvāt mṛtakalpāḥ śerate sma svapanti /
T04bsa054_u:6311: vatsarairapi anekavarṣātyaye 'pi putrān dārāṃśca nekṣante na paśyanti /
T04bsa054_u:6316: tanna prāptaṃ mudhaivāyurnītaṃ tu parakarmaṇā // Bca_8.75 //
T04bsa054_u:6317: yadarthaṃ sukhapratilambhanimittaṃ vikrītaḥ paradāsīkṛtaḥ ātmā kāmaviḍambitaiḥ tanna prāptam,
T04bsa054_u:6318: taditi sukhaṃ na prāptaṃ na pratilabdham /
T04bsa054_u:6319: āyuḥsaṃskārā eva hi kevalamanarthakaṃ parakarmānuṣṭhānena kṣayamupanītāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6320: na sādhukarmaṇi kvacidapi yojitā iti bhāvaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:6324: sukhabubhukṣayā vikrītaḥ parāyattīkṛtaḥ svātmabhāva svakāyo yaiste tathā, teṣām /
T04bsa054_u:6333: mānārthaṃ dāsatāṃ yānti mūḍhāḥ kāmaviḍambitāḥ // Bca_8.77 //
T04bsa054_u:6336: tatra praviṣṭasya jīvitaṃ syādvā na veti jīvitasya saṃdeho 'sminniti kṛtvā /
T04bsa054_u:6343: ke te? kāmabiḍambitāḥ kāmāya kāmena vā viḍambitāstiraskṛtāḥ //
T04bsa054_u:6345: ihaiva janmani kāmāsaktacetasāṃ yadduḥkhaṃ dṛśyate tatkathayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:6350: kiṃ ca / ayaṃ sukhasādhanatvena upādīyamāno 'pi ca anarthaparaṃparāprasūtiheturevārthaḥ iti kathayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:6355: tathā rakṣitasyāpi kathaṃcit taskarādibhirnāśādviṣādo daurmanasyaṃ paritāpaheturanarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6357: ityevamarjanādibhiḥ sarvadā vyākulatvāt dhanāsaktacetasāṃ kṣaṇamapi samādhānānavakāśatvāt nāvasaraḥ saṃsārāśṛ[śri?
T04bsa054_u:6371: tasyaivaṃbhūtasya atitucchasya sukhāsvādaleśasya paśorapi sādhāraṇāsyārthe tasya nimittam /
T04bsa054_u:6383: kāyasyārthe kṛto yo 'yaṃ sarvakālaṃ pariśramaḥ // Bca_8.82 //
T04bsa054_u:6389: kāyasya ātmaśarīrasyārthe sukhotpādanāya yo 'yaṃ narakādiduḥkhamavigaṇayya kṛtaḥ sarvakālaṃ saṃsārasya pūrvasyāṃ koṭau pariśramaḥ prayāsaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:6391: tatastasmāt pariśramāt koṭiśatenāpi pariśramabhāgena aṃśena buddhatvaṃ syāt,
T04bsa054_u:6395: caryāduḥkhānmahadduḥkhaṃ sā ca bodhirna kāminām // Bca_8.83 //
T04bsa054_u:6396: caryāduḥkhamapekṣya idameva mahadduḥkhaṃ yatkāmārthe caratāṃ saṃsāre teṣāmavīcyādinarakapatanāt,
T04bsa054_u:6398: na tu bodhisattvānāṃ pratiniyatakālaṃ svecchayā tadanubhavatām /
T04bsa054_u:6399: tadevaṃ duḥkhamanubhavatāmapi kāmārthe kāmināṃ sā ca bodhirna bhavati,
T04bsa054_u:6402: na śastraṃ na viṣaṃ nāgnirna prapāto na vairiṇaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6404: amī śastrādayo duḥkhajanakatvena prasiddhā na sādṛśyaṃ bhajante prati kāmānām /
T04bsa054_u:6405: kasmāt? narakādidurgatiduḥkhasya āgamāt pratipannasya smaraṇāt smaraṇenāmukhīkaraṇāt /
T04bsa054_u:6407: kāmāstu dīrghakālikatīvranarakādiduḥkhahetava iti kīdṛśī tairupamā bhavet?
T04bsa054_u:6408: tadevaṃ kāyavivekānantaraṃ cittavivekaṃ pratipādya prakṛte yojayitumāha-
T04bsa054_u:6411: evamuktakrameṇa udvijya saṃtrāsaṃ kṛtvā pūrvoktaviveke ratimabhiratimutpādayet /
T04bsa054_u:6418: niḥśabdasaumyavanamārutavījyamānaiḥ caṃkramyate parahitāya vicintyate ca // Bca_8.86 //
T04bsa054_u:6421: śaśāṅkasya candramasaḥ karā raśmaya eva śuklatāśaityasādharmyāccandanānīva,
T04bsa054_u:6422: taiḥ śītalāni yāni ślātalāni teṣu caṃkramyata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6431: vījyamānāḥ taiścaṃkramyata iti parāvṛttyā punaḥ punarmandaṃ bhramyate /
T04bsa054_u:6433: kiṃ tu parahitāya sattvānāṃ sukhotpādanāya vicintyate /
T04bsa054_u:6438: vihṛtya yatra kvacidiṣṭakālaṃ śūnyālaye vṛkṣatale guhāsu /
T04bsa054_u:6449: upaśāntavitarkaḥ san bodhicittaṃ tu bhāvayet // Bca_8.89 //
T04bsa054_u:6453: iti hi sarvasukhasaṃpattiheturviveka iti cetasi punaḥ punarāmukhīkaraṇāddhetoḥ upaśānto vitarkaḥ asanmanasikāro yasya saḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6455: evaṃ pariśuddhe cetasi bhāvyamānaṃ bodhicittaṃ prakarṣapadamadhirohatīti viśeṣaṃ tuśabdena darśayati //
T04bsa054_u:6457: na tāvat parahitasukhāya samyak cittaṃ calati,
T04bsa054_u:6469: ato yathā mama duḥkhaṃ bādhakaṃ tathā eṣāmapi /
T04bsa054_u:6481: karacaraṇaśiraḥprabhṛtibhedādanekaprakāraḥ kāyo yathikatvenādhyavasitaḥ paripālanīyo bhavati duḥkhanivartanāt sukhopadhānācca,
T04bsa054_u:6489: tadā kathamiva bhavato duḥkhamanyasaṃtāneṣu na bādhakaṃ syāt?
T04bsa054_u:6493: anyeṣu apareṣu śarīreṣu mama duḥkhaṃ yadi nāma prabādhakaṃ na bhavati,
T04bsa054_u:6501: ataḥ svaparaviśeṣamapāsya duḥkhasvabhāvataiva nivartanahetuḥ / ata āha-
T04bsa054_u:6525: yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca tulyameva sukhaṃ priyam /
T04bsa054_u:6526: tadātmanaḥ ko viśeṣo yenātraiva sukhodyama // Bca_8.95 //
T04bsa054_u:6529: naiva kaścit yena tatraiva ātmanyeva sukhotpādanāya tātparyaṃ na parasminnityarthaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:6531: yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca bhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca na priyam /
T04bsa054_u:6532: tadātmanaḥ ko viśeṣo yattaṃ rakṣāmi netaram // Bca_8.96 //
T04bsa054_u:6535: syādetat- yadi nāma duḥkhātmakatā na viśiṣyate,
T04bsa054_u:6538: tadduḥkhena na me bādhetyato yadi na rakṣyate /
T04bsa054_u:6540: tasya parasya duḥkhena mama bādhā pīḍā nāstītyato 'smāt kāraṇād yadi na rakṣyate 'nyaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:6542: yato nāgāminaḥ kāyasya paralokabhāvino narakādijātasya duḥkhātmakasya [duḥkhānme] tasyopāttasya kāyasya kācidbādhā saṃbhavati,
T04bsa054_u:6546: yata evam, tasmāt kenābhiprāyeṇa asau rakṣyate?
T04bsa054_u:6547: kāya iti prakṛtatvāt pāpānnivartanāt kuśale pravartanācca //
T04bsa054_u:6552: ātmano nirākariṣyamāṇatvāt nirastatvācca leśataḥ tatko 'yamahaṃpratyayasya viṣayo bhaviṣyati?
T04bsa054_u:6561: anya eva mṛto yasmādanya eva prajāyate // Bca_8.98 //
T04bsa054_u:6564: tadā na khalu yadeva skandhapañcakamiha vinaśyati,
T04bsa054_u:6566: api tu apūrvameva pūrvanivṛttau tatra idaṃpratyayatāviśiṣṭaṃ kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛtamantarābhavasaṃtatyā samutpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:6569: yadi tasyaiva yadduḥkhaṃ rakṣyaṃ tasyaiva tanmatam /
T04bsa054_u:6570: pādaduḥkhaṃ na hastasya kasmāttattena rakṣyate // Bca_8.99 //
T04bsa054_u:6573: tato yadā anyadduḥkhamanyasya rakṣituṃ na yujyate,
T04bsa054_u:6574: tadā kathaṃ pādādau prahāraṃ patantaṃ dṛṣṭvā hastaṃ prasārya rakṣyate?
T04bsa054_u:6582: yato yadayuktaṃ yuktyā saṃgataṃ na bhavati,
T04bsa054_u:6583: tannivartyamapasāryaṃ svakīyaṃ parakīyaṃ ca yathābalaṃ yathāsāmarthyam /
T04bsa054_u:6588: tadetaddvayaṃ yathāsaṃbhavamihaloke paraloke ca ātmaduḥkhāpaharaṇāderniyāmakaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:6592: yasya duḥkhaṃ sa nāstyasmātkasya tatsvaṃ bhaviṣyati // Bca_8.101 //
T04bsa054_u:6593: saṃtāno nāma na kaścidekaḥ paramārthasan saṃbhavati /
T04bsa054_u:6596: tasmādeteṣāmeva kṣaṇānāmekapadena pratipādanāya saṃketo kṛto buddhairvyavahārārthaṃ saṃtāna iti /
T04bsa054_u:6599: anyathā ātmanā kimaparāddhaṃ yenāsau na svīkriyate /
T04bsa054_u:6600: evaṃ samudāyo 'pi na samudāyibhyo vastusan eko vidyate,
T04bsa054_u:6602: tattvānyatvavikalpastu asya avayavivicāreṇaiva gata iti neha pratāyate /
T04bsa054_u:6608: yathā anekeṣāṃ pipīlikādīnāṃ pūrvāparabhāvena vyavasthitānāṃ svarūpamantareṇa paṅktirnāsti straksūtravadekāḥ,
T04bsa054_u:6609: yathā ca hastyaśvapadātiprabhṛtibhyo militebhyo vyatiriktā nānyā senā kācidekā tatrāsti,
T04bsa054_u:6611: etacca anyatra [9.73] vistareṇa vicāritamiti neha vicāryate /
T04bsa054_u:6614: evamātmādeḥ svāminaḥ kasyacidabhāvād yasya saṃbandhi duḥkhaṃ sa nāsti /
T04bsa054_u:6618: tadā kathamayaṃ dṛṣṭānto bhaviṣyati ātmavaditi ātmasattvavaditi ca?
T04bsa054_u:6625: tadā tadabhiprāyeṇaiva svaparavibhāgaṃ kṛtvā tatpratyāyanārthaṃ sādhanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaścocyate,
T04bsa054_u:6628: idamupāttapañcaskandhamātramabhisaṃdhāya dṛṣṭānte dīyamāne na kācit kṣatiḥ,
T04bsa054_u:6639: duḥkhatvādeva svaparāvibhāgaṃ kṛtvā vāryāṇi niṣedhyāni bhavanti /
T04bsa054_u:6643: yena svakīyāni ca vāryāṇi na parakīyānīti /
T04bsa054_u:6644: evaṃ duḥkhatvāditi heturanaikāntiko na bhavatīti samarthitam //
T04bsa054_u:6645: nanu yadi duḥkhī nāma na kaścit saṃsāre saṃbhavati,
T04bsa054_u:6649: vāryaṃ cetsarvamapyevaṃ na cedātmāpi sattvavat // Bca_8.103 //
T04bsa054_u:6657: na ca abhyupagamamātreṇa tasya sattā prasidhyati tatsādhakapramāṇābhāvāt,
T04bsa054_u:6665: tadvaraṃ bahuduḥkhanidānaṃ saiva prathamato notpādayituṃ yujyata iti paravacanāvakāśaṃ śaṅkamāna āha-
T04bsa054_u:6669: jagadduḥkhaṃ nirūpyedaṃ kṛpāduḥkhaṃ kathaṃ bahu // Bca_8.104 //
T04bsa054_u:6670: jagato duḥkhaṃ narakādikṛtamanekaprakāraṃ samīkṣya idaṃ kṛpākṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ kathaṃ bahu?
T04bsa054_u:6675: ekasya puruṣasya duḥkhena bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ yadi duḥkhaṃ vigacchati nivartate,
T04bsa054_u:6680: ātmaduḥkhaṃ na nihataṃ bahūnāṃ duḥkhināṃ vyayāt // Bca_8.106 //
T04bsa054_u:6681: yata eva utpādyameva tadduḥkhaṃ kṛpālunā svaparātmanoḥ ata eva supuṣpacandreṇa bodhisattvena /
T04bsa054_u:6689: yaduktaṃ supuṣpacandrasyetivṛttake [samādhi. 35]- tathā hi- atīte 'dhvani ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājo nāma tathāgato 'bhūt /

T04bsa054_u:7159: yadi ca bhāvasyaiva kaścit svabhāvaḥ syāt,
T04bsa054_u:7162: ato na bhāvanivṛttirūpaḥ abhāvo nāma kaścit /
T04bsa054_u:7163: na ca bhāvābhāvayoruktakrameṇa asattve pratipādite tadubhayasaṃkīrṇātmatā saṃbhavati ubhayapratiṣedhasvabhāvatā vā,
T04bsa054_u:7165: tasminnirākṛte sarva eva amī ekaprahāreṇa nirastā bhavantīti / tasmāt-
T04bsa054_u:7170: subhūtirāha- ihāyuṣman śāradvatīputra bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anupāyakuśalo rūpaṃ śūnyamiti prajānāti, saṅgaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7175: evaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jivhā kāyo manaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:7197: etaduktaṃ bhavati- sarva eva amī ādhyātmikā bāhyāśca bhāvāḥ svabhāvadvayamābibhrataḥ samupajāyante yaduta sāṃvṛtaṃ pāramārthikaṃ ca /
T04bsa054_u:7206: samyagdṛśāṃ yo viṣayaḥ sa tattvaṃ mṛṣādṛśāṃ saṃvṛtisatyamuktam //
T04bsa054_u:7213: idameva satyadvayaṃ nānyat satyamastīti avadhāraṇārtho 'pi yujyate cakāraḥ / taduktam-
T04bsa054_u:7218: satya ime duvi lokavidūnāṃ diṣṭa svayaṃ aśruṇitva pareṣām /
T04bsa054_u:7219: saṃvṛti yā ca tathā paramārtho satyu na sidhyati kiṃ ca tṛtīyu //
T04bsa054_u:7221: nanu catvāri āryasatyāni duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgalakṣaṇāni abhidharme kathitāni bhagavatā,
T04bsa054_u:7222: tat kathaṃ dve eva satye iti?
T04bsa054_u:7223: satyam, kiṃ tarhi vaineyajanāśayānuśayavaśādete dve eva catvāri kṛtvā kathitāni (kathite?)
T04bsa054_u:7228: syādetat- saṃvṛtiravidyopadarśitātmatayā abhūtasamāropasvarūpatvādvicārāt śataśo viśīryamāṇāpi kathaṃ satyamiti /
T04bsa054_u:7233: ata eva lokasaṃvṛtisatyaṃ ceti śāstre 'pi viśeṣa ukta ācāryapādaiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7237: ekameva bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yaduta apramoṣadharma nirvāṇam,
T04bsa054_u:7242: paramārthasatyaṃ tu na jñāyate kīdṛk kiṃsvabhāvaṃ kiṃlakṣaṇamiti /
T04bsa054_u:7246: kenacit prakāreṇa tat sarvabuddhiviṣayīkartuṃ na śakyate iti yāvat /
T04bsa054_u:7249: ataḥ sarvopādhiśūnyatvāt kathaṃ kayācit kalpanayā paśyet?
T04bsa054_u:7251: vikalpajanmāno hi śabdā vikalpadhiyāmaviṣaye na pravartitumutsahante /
T04bsa054_u:7253: tathāpi bhājanaśrotṛjanānugrahārthaṃ parikalpamupādāya saṃvṛtyā nidarśanopadarśanena kiṃcidabhidhīyate //
T04bsa054_u:7254: yathā timiraprabhāvāt taimirikaḥ sarvamākāśadeśaṃ keśoṇḍukamaṇḍitamitastato mukhaṃ vikṣipannapi paśyati /
T04bsa054_u:7255: tathā kurvantamavekṣya ataimirikaḥ kimayaṃ karotīti tatsamīpamupasṛtya tadupalabdhakeśapraṇihitalocano 'pi na keśākṛtimupalabhate,
T04bsa054_u:7257: yadā punarasau taimirikaḥ ataimirikāya svābhiprāyaṃ prakāśayati- keśāniha paśyāmīti,
T04bsa054_u:7258: tadā tadvikalpāpasāraṇāya tasmai yathābhūtamasau bravīti- nātra keśāḥ santīti /
T04bsa054_u:7260: na ca tena tathā pratipādayatāpi kasyacit pratiṣedhaḥ kṛto bhavati vidhānaṃ vā /
T04bsa054_u:7265: tāneva skandhādīn yena svabhāvena nirastasamastāvidyāvāsanā buddhā bhagavantaḥ paśyanti ataimirikopalabdhakeśadarśananyāyena,
T04bsa054_u:7271: iti paramārthato 'vācyamapi paramārthatattvaṃ dṛṣṭāntadvāreṇa saṃvṛtimupādāya kathaṃcit kathitam /
T04bsa054_u:7272: na tu tadaśeṣasāṃvṛtavyavahāravirahitasvabhāvaṃ vastuto vaktuṃ śakyate iti / yaduktam-
T04bsa054_u:7273: anakṣarasya dharmasya śrutiḥ kā deśanā ca kā /
T04bsa054_u:7287: nanu ca tathāvidhamapi tathāvidhabuddhiviṣayaḥ paramārthataḥ kiṃ na bhavatītyatrāha- buddhiḥ saṃvṛtirucyate iti /
T04bsa054_u:7293: iti naiva kācid buddhiḥ pāramārthikarūpagrāhiṇī paramārthato yujyate /
T04bsa054_u:7297: yadi hi devaputra paramārthataḥ paramārthasatyaṃ kāyavāṅyanasāṃ viṣayatāmupagacchet,
T04bsa054_u:7310: tacca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtam /
T04bsa054_u:7322: yāvanna lābho nālabho na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ na yaśo nāyaśo na rūpaṃ nārūpamityādi //
T04bsa054_u:7328: evaṃ saṃvṛtiparamārthabhedena dvividhaṃ satyaṃ vyavasthāpya tadadhikṛtaśca loko 'pi dvividha evetyupadarśayannāha- tatra loke ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:7329: tatra loko dvidhā dṛṣṭo yogī prākṛtakastathā /
T04bsa054_u:7330: tatra prākṛtako loko yogilokena bādhyate // Bca_9.3 //
T04bsa054_u:7341: so 'syāstīti yogī loka ityekaḥ prakāro rāśiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7344: prākṛta eva prākṛtako loka iti dvitīyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7347: syādetat- ubhayorapi yathāsvaṃ tattvadarśitvāt kataraḥ punaranayorbhrāntimānastu ya evānyatareṇa bādhyate?
T04bsa054_u:7348: kaḥ punaranayoḥ kena bādhyata ityāha- tatretyādi /
T04bsa054_u:7351: tatra tayoryogiprākṛtakayorlokayormadhye prākṛtako lokaḥ prākṛtakatvajātyā samudāyānnirdhāryate,
T04bsa054_u:7359: idamihābhimatam- yathā vibhramāhitasadbhāvaṃ timiropahatacakṣuṣaḥ asadbhūtakeśoṇḍukādidarśino jñānaṃ yathāvasthitavastutattvagrāhiṇo 'taimirikajñānena
T04bsa054_u:7369: atha kiṃ prākṛtā eva bādhyante yogibhiḥ,
T04bsa054_u:7376: uttare ca uttare ca uttarottarāḥ, taiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7382: dhiyo jñānasya prajñāyā viśeṣaḥ tattadāvaraṇavigamāt prakarṣaḥ, tena /
T04bsa054_u:7385: tathā hi- pramuditākhyaprathamabhūmilābhino bodhisattvasya jñānādiguṇāpekṣayā taduttaravimalābhidhānadvitīyabhūmilābhino bodhisattvasya jñānaprabhāvādayo guṇā viśiṣyante /
T04bsa054_u:7390: syādetat- satyapi yogināṃ dhiyo viśeṣe prākṛtajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti kathamavagamayituṃ śakyata ityāha dṛṣṭāntenobhayeṣṭeneti-
T04bsa054_u:7397: tathā hi- ye tāvat sarvajanapratipannasvarūpā rūpādayaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:7401: atastatra ubhayorapi vipratipatterabhāvāt dṛṣṭāntadharmatā na vihanyate /
T04bsa054_u:7402: yeṣāṃ tu mīmāṃsakādīnāṃ deśakālānyathātmakaṃ vastu eva tattathā pratibhāsate iti matam,
T04bsa054_u:7403: te 'nyatra nirākṛtā iti na tanmatamiha nirasyate /
T04bsa054_u:7404: ye tu svayūthyāḥ cittameva vastusat svapnādiṣu tathā pratibhāsate iti manyante,
T04bsa054_u:7407: atastena dṛṣṭāntena viparītavastusvarūpagrāhitayā prākṛtakajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti vyavasthāpyate /
T04bsa054_u:7409: nanu yadi niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā iti vastutattvam,
T04bsa054_u:7410: kathaṃ tarhi sarvasattvasamuddharaṇāśayena dānādiṣu saṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ tattvavedināmapi bodhisattvānāṃ pravṛttiḥ?
T04bsa054_u:7417: tathābhūteṣvapi tatra idaṃpratyayatāniyamasya vidyamānatvāt na hetuphalabhāvasya virodhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7418: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadyapi māyādisvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvā dānādayaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:7419: tathāpi trikoṭipariśuddhyā sādarādiyogena abhyasyamānāḥ tathābhūtā api paramārthādhigamāya hetubhāvamāpadyante,
T04bsa054_u:7431: sarvadharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvāt hetvanurūpaṃ ca sarvatra phalamiṣyate /
T04bsa054_u:7432: ataḥ sāṃvṛtādapi niḥsvabhāvāddhetoḥ niḥsvabhāvatādhigama eva phalam,
T04bsa054_u:7435: iti dānādayo vastuto niḥsvabhāvā api paramārthatattvādhigamāya sarvasattveṣu karuṇāyamānairbodhisattvairupādīyante,
T04bsa054_u:7443: lokena bhāvā dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7444: na tu māyāvadityatra vivādo yogilokayoḥ // Bca_9.5 //
T04bsa054_u:7446: hetupratyayaṃ pratītya bhavanti svarūpaṃ labhante iti bhāvāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7449: satsvarūpeṇa na kevalaṃ dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7455: na tu punaryathā yoginā māyeva māyāvat svabhāvaśūnyā dṛśyante,
T04bsa054_u:7457: ityatrāsmin vivādo vipratipattiryogilokayoḥ yoginā saha lokasyetyarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7458: tatpratipanne vastuttattve lokasyāpratipatteḥ lokena saha vā yoginaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:7460: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- sarvabhāvānāṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ pāramārthikaṃ ceti rūpadvayamasti,
T04bsa054_u:7461: tatra yat sāṃvṛtaṃ tadeva lokena pratīyate,
T04bsa054_u:7466: athāpi syāt- yadetat samastajanasādhāraṇamarthakriyākṣamaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇapratītaṃ vasturūpam,
T04bsa054_u:7467: tat kathamapahrotuṃ śakyata iti parasya hṛdayamāśaṅkayāha pratyakṣamapītyādi-
T04bsa054_u:7471: tadapi prasiddhayā rūḍhyā lokapravādena na pramāṇataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7472: na pramāṇenādhigataṃ sat pratyakṣaṃ rūpādīti saṃbandhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7482: rūpādi tattvaṃ pratyakṣamapi yadi na pramāṇādhigatam,
T04bsa054_u:7486: yathā ca paramārthato 'śucini strīkalevarādau tadāsaktiviparyastacetasāṃ śucibuddhirupajāyate /
T04bsa054_u:7493: tathā hi skandhadhātvāyatanādisvabhāvatayā bhagavatā bhāvāḥ sūtre deśitāḥ,
T04bsa054_u:7496: sarvaṃ sarvamiti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva pañca skandhāḥ,
T04bsa054_u:7501: bhūtiryaiṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyate //
T04bsa054_u:7507: tattvataḥ kṣaṇikā naite saṃvṛtyā cedvirudhyate // Bca_9.7 //
T04bsa054_u:7508: lokānāṃ bhāvābhiniveśināṃ skandhādideśanāvaineyānāṃ sattvānāmāpātataḥ śūnyatādeśanānadhikṛtānāṃ śūnyatāyāmavatāraṇārthaṃ sukumāropakrameṇa pravartanāya
T04bsa054_u:7512: nāthena narakādiduḥkhāt sattvān paritrāyamāṇena abhyudayaniḥśreyasasukhaṃ prāpayatā sattvāśayādivedinā buddhena bhagavatā deśitāḥ prakāśitāḥ,
T04bsa054_u:7519: kathaṃ tarhi te kṣaṇikā ityāha- tattvataḥ kṣaṇikā naite iti /
T04bsa054_u:7520: tattvataḥ paramārthataḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt kṣaṇikā api na bhavanti ete ime bhāvāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7523: tarhi deśanāyāmapi kathitā iti manasi nidhāya [āha] saṃvṛtyā cet [iti]- yadi saṃvṛtyā kṣaṇikā abhidhīyanta ityucyate,
T04bsa054_u:7526: saṃvṛtyā kṣaṇikā na paramārthataḥ iti virudhyate na saṃgacchate /
T04bsa054_u:7528: sāṃvyavahāribhirakṣaṇikatvapratīteḥ na kṣaṇikatvaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ rūpamiti yāvat //
T04bsa054_u:7529: etat siddhāntavādī pariharati na doṣo yogisaṃvṛtyeti-
T04bsa054_u:7535: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yadi nāma arvāgdarśanaiḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ na pratīyate,
T04bsa054_u:7541: kutaḥ punaretat sāṃvṛtamapi kṣaṇikatvādi yogina eva paśyanti nārvāgdarśina ityāha- lokātte tattvadarśina iti /
T04bsa054_u:7551: aśucibhāvanāsamaye aśucīti striyāḥ kāminyā nirūpaṇe vibhāvanāyāṃ lokabādhā syāt,
T04bsa054_u:7562: evamukte subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat- māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7564: iti hi māyā ca sattvāśca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
T04bsa054_u:7579: evaṃ kathaṃ tatra satkārāpakārayoḥ puṇyapāpasamudbhava iti parasyābhiprāyamāśaṅkayannāha māyopamādityādi-
T04bsa054_u:7582: tadā māyopamānniḥsvabhāvājjinādbhagavataḥ puṇyaṃ sukṛtaṃ pūjāsatkārapādavandanādibhiḥ kathaṃ yathā kathamiveti manyase?
T04bsa054_u:7585: na hi māyākāranirmitapuruṣasatkārāpakārayoḥ puṇyapāpaprasūtiryukteti parasyā bhiprāyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7587: tathātra parameva paripṛcchati- sadbhāve 'pi kathaṃ yatheti /
T04bsa054_u:7590: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yathā kasyacit paramārthasato jināt paramārthasat puṇyamupajāyate,
T04bsa054_u:7596: na ca yuktisiddhaṃ paramārthasad vastusvarūpaṃ kiṃcidastīti pratipāditam //
T04bsa054_u:7598: idaṃ tu kathaṃ samādhīyate ityāha yadi māyopama ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:7599: yadi māyopamaḥ sattvaḥ kiṃ punarjāyate mṛtaḥ // Bca_9.9 //
T04bsa054_u:7604: evaṃ sati mahān doṣaḥ prasajyate ityāha- yadītyādi /
T04bsa054_u:7616: yāvatkālaṃ pratyayānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ mantrauṣadhādīnāṃ sāmagrī samudāyaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:7635: kathamiti pṛcchati- kena prakāreṇa sattvo 'sti vidyate?
T04bsa054_u:7643: evaṃ tarhi yathā māyāpuruṣavadhādau na prāṇātipātaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:7650: samāne 'pi niḥsvabhāvatve cittasya vijñānasya māyāpuruṣasaṃtāne 'bhāvāt asattvāt na pāpakaṃ na akuśalamutpadyate prāṇātipātādi /
T04bsa054_u:7653: tatrāpi māraṇābhiprāyeṇa prahāraṃ dadato bhavatyeva aśubham,
T04bsa054_u:7655: māyāpuruṣādanyatra kathaṃ prāṇātipāta iti cedāha cittamāyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:7670: ādiśabdādauṣadhādīnāṃ cittotpādaṃ prati asāmarthyādavyāpārāt na māyācittasaṃbhavaḥ na māyāsvabhāvaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati /
T04bsa054_u:7671: yathā paravyāmohanibandhanānāṃ māyākāraprayuktānāṃ mantrādīnāṃ prabhāveṇa hastyādyākāranirvṛttiḥ,
T04bsa054_u:7678: ata eva nānāpratyayasaṃbhavā nānāpratyayāt anekaprakārakāraṇāt saṃbhava utpādo yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
T04bsa054_u:7682: na hi ekasmin kārye kiṃcit kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kāryaśabdasāmyāt sarvatra tadeva prakalpayituṃ yujyate,
T04bsa054_u:7687: naikasya kvacidupalabdhasāmarthyasya pratyayasya kāraṇasya hetoḥ sarvasāmarthyaṃ sarvasmin kārye sāmarthyaṃ śaktirasti saṃbhavati /
T04bsa054_u:7688: kvacidṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā kutraciditi kasmiṃścit samaye deśe kāle vā dṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ vā /
T04bsa054_u:7692: etat sarva lokavyavahārānugataṃ kalpanānirmitaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ vastutattvamupādaya samutthitaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7695: etadasahamānaḥ paraḥ punaranyathā prasañjayannāha nirvṛta iti-
T04bsa054_u:7701: tadā ayaṃ mahān virodhaḥ syādityāha buddho 'pi saṃsaredevamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:7702: buddho 'pi saṃsaredevaṃ tataḥ kiṃ bodhicaryayā // Bca_9.13 //
T04bsa054_u:7703: evamabhyupagamyamāne buddho 'pi sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇato nirvṛto 'pi saṃsaret janmādibhāg bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:7704: yata evam, tataḥ tasmāt kāraṇāt kiṃ bodhicaryayā?
T04bsa054_u:7708: sā hi sarvasāṃsārikadharmanivṛttaye sarvaguṇasamuccayāśritabuddhatvaprāptaye ca samāśrīyate,
T04bsa054_u:7714: pratyayānāṃ tu vicchedātsaṃvṛtyāpi na saṃbhavaḥ // Bca_9.14 //
T04bsa054_u:7718: māyāpi na kevalaṃ saṃsāra iti samuccaye apiśabdaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7722: saṃvṛttyāpi kālpanikavyavahāreṇāpi na saṃbhavo na saṃsaraṇam /
T04bsa054_u:7725: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat- yaduktaṃ bhagavatā dharmasvāminā sarvajñena- yo bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ
T04bsa054_u:7741: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:7744: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:7747: ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambanaṃ śivamabhayamahāryamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ
T04bsa054_u:7749: yastu evaṃ satatasamitaṃ yāvadavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ dharmaṃ paśyati,
T04bsa054_u:7753: eteṣāmeva ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ yā ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā
T04bsa054_u:7754: sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā sattvasaṃjñā jīvasaṃjñā jantusaṃjñā manujasaṃjñā mānavasaṃjñā
T04bsa054_u:7806: pratyayānāṃ punarucchede sarvathaiva saṃsaraṇaṃ na syāt,
T04bsa054_u:7809: evaṃ tāvat sautrāntikādicodyamudasya yogācāravipratipattinirākaraṇāya tanmatena dūṣaṇamudbhāvayannāha yadā na bhrāntirapītyādi-
T04bsa054_u:7810: yadā na bhrāntirapyasti māyā kenopalabhyate // Bca_9.15 //
T04bsa054_u:7811: yadā sarvaṃ jagat māyātmakatayā svabhāvaśūnyamupagataṃ madhyamakavādibhiḥ,
T04bsa054_u:7816: yasya punaḥ svacittameva paramārthasat bāhyarūpatayā bhrāntaṃ tathā pratibhāsate,
T04bsa054_u:7819: yadā māyaiva te nāsti tadā kimupalabhyate /
T04bsa054_u:7820: yadā māyaiva grāhyatayā hastyādyākārapravṛtyā tava vijñānavādino nāsti,
T04bsa054_u:7826: cittasyaiva sa ākāro yadyapyanyo 'sti tattvataḥ // Bca_9.16 //
T04bsa054_u:7827: uktamatra cittameva bahīrūpatayā bhrāntaṃ hastyādyākāraṃ pratibhāsate iti /
T04bsa054_u:7829: kiṃ tu yadyapi cittasyaiva jñānasyaiva sa iti deśādivicchedena grāhyatayā pratibhāsamāna ākāro nirbhāsaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:7834: tathāpi naitat saṃgacchata ityāha cittameva yadā māyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:7835: cittameva yadā māyā tadā kiṃ kena dṛśyate /
T04bsa054_u:7838: na hi vedakacittavyatiriktā kācidanyā māyā nāma,
T04bsa054_u:7847: nanu syādevaitat yadi jñānasya ātmasaṃvedanaṃ na syāt,
T04bsa054_u:7848: yāvatā svasaṃvedanatayā svarūpaṃ saṃvedayat tadabhinnaṃ māyādipratibhāsamapi vedayet /
T04bsa054_u:7849: tathā ca sati na kācit kṣatiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7851: uktaṃ ca lokanāthena cittaṃ cittaṃ na paśyati /
T04bsa054_u:7852: svabhāvaśūnyameva sarva jagad yadā yuktitaḥ pratipāditam,
T04bsa054_u:7853: tadā kaḥ kasya svabhāvo vastutaḥ iti kasya kena vedanaṃ syāt?
T04bsa054_u:7859: kiṃ ca / uktaṃ ca kathitaṃ ca lokanāthena lokānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ nāthena śaraṇyena buddhena bhagavatā /
T04bsa054_u:7863: na cchinatti yathātmānamasidhārā tathā manaḥ // Bca_9.17 //
T04bsa054_u:7864: yathā sutīkṣṇāpyasidhārā khaṅgadhārā tadanyavadātmānaṃ svakāyaṃ na cchinatti na vighāṭayati,
T04bsa054_u:7868: tathā hi na tadevaikaṃ jñānaṃ vedyavedakavedanātmasvabhāvatrayaṃ yuktam /
T04bsa054_u:7871: sa cittaṃ parigaveṣamāṇo nādhyātmaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati /
T04bsa054_u:7885: tadyathā na tasyaiva asidhārayā saiva asiṃdhārā śakyate chettum,
T04bsa054_u:7886: na tenaiva aṅgulyagreṇa tadeva aṅgulyagraṃ spraṣṭuṃ śakyate,
T04bsa054_u:7887: evameva tenaiva cittena tadeva cittaṃ draṣṭumiti vistaraḥ //
T04bsa054_u:7888: atra cittāmātravādinaḥ svātmani kriyāvirodhaṃ vighaṭayituṃ svapakṣaprasādhanāya dṛṣṭāntamudbhāvayannāha ātmabhāvamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:7890: ātmabhāvaṃ svasvarūpaṃ yathā dīpaḥ pradīpaḥ saṃprakāśayati dyotayati /
T04bsa054_u:7891: yathā hi kila andhakārāvṛtaghaṭādivastupratipattaye pradīpa upādīyate,
T04bsa054_u:7893: api tu ghaṭādi prakāśayanneva ātmānamapi prakāśayati,
T04bsa054_u:7896: na cāpi kvacidvirodho dṛṣṭa iti sarvatra yojanīyam /
T04bsa054_u:7901: naiva prakāśyate dīpo yasmānna tamasāvṛtaḥ // Bca_9.18 //
T04bsa054_u:7909: na ca avidyāmānasya prakāśanaṃ yuktam, asattvāt /
T04bsa054_u:7912: syādetat- ātmabhāvamityādinā naitadabhidhīyate yadātmānaṃ ghaṭavat tamasāvṛtaṃ prakāśayati dīpaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:7922: tathā tena prakāreṇa kiṃcid ghaṭādikaṃ parāpekṣaṃ pradīpādyapekṣaṃ prakāśaṃ dṛśyate,
T04bsa054_u:7923: kiṃcit punaḥ pradīpādikamanapekṣaṃ ca svayaṃprakāśātmakaṃ dṛśyate upalabhyate /
T04bsa054_u:7925: evaṃ vijñānavādinā upadarśite viśeṣe siddhāntavādī nīlameva tāvannīlatve paranirapekṣaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvenopadarśitaṃ pratiṣedhayannāha anīlatva ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:7927: nīlameva hi ko nīlaṃ kuryādātmānamātmanā // Bca_9.20 //
T04bsa054_u:7938: nīlaṃ nīlaguṇayuktamātmānaṃ svarūpamātmanā svayameva na kuryāt,
T04bsa054_u:7941: tasmānna nīlasyāpi parānapekṣatā nīlatvaṃ prati sphaṭikavat /
T04bsa054_u:7942: tathā hi (Bcp 190) sphaṭikopalo 'pi vastuto 'vasthitarūpa eva upādhisaṃnidhau na nīloparāgamanubhavati,
T04bsa054_u:7944: nīlopādhiviśeṣahakāriṇaśca pūrvasvarasanirodhāt anya eva nīlaguṇoparaktaḥ sphaṭikopala utpadyate iti siddhāntaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7947: nanu priyamidamanuṣṭhitaṃ priyeṇa yasmāt jaḍasvabhāvavyāvṛttātmatayā svahetupratyayāt utpattireva jñānasya prakāśāntaranirapekṣasya ātmaprakāśatā svasaṃvedanamucyate /
T04bsa054_u:7963: tadā lokata eva bādhā bhavato bhaviṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:7966: tathā ca sutarāṃ na svasaṃvedanaṃ jñānasya,
T04bsa054_u:7969: na cāpi jaḍasvabhāvatā madhyamakavādinaṃ prati paramārthataḥ kasyacit siddhā,
T04bsa054_u:7974: sāṃprataṃ pradīpasya svayaṃprakāśatāmabhyupagamya buddheḥ svasaṃvedanamayuktamiti pratipādayannāha dīpa ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:7975: dīpaḥ prakāśata iti jñātvā jñānena kathyate /
T04bsa054_u:7976: buddhiḥ prakāśata iti jñātvedaṃ kena kathyate // Bca_9.22 //
T04bsa054_u:7978: tathāpi na buddhisaṃvedanasādhanaṃ prati sadṛśo dṛṣṭānta iti samudāyārthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7979: dīpaḥ prakāśata iti ābhāsate prakāśāntaranirapekṣaḥ svayameva,
T04bsa054_u:7980: iti jñātvā pratītya jñānena buddhyā kathyate pratipādyate,
T04bsa054_u:7984: tat punaḥ kena jñānena jñātvā kathyate iti paraṃ pṛcchati /
T04bsa054_u:7985: na cātra kiṃcid buddhipratipattinibandhanamastīti asaṃbhāvanāṃ prakāśayati /
T04bsa054_u:7995: itthaṃ sarvathā buddherapratipattau tatsaṃvedanamatīva ayuktamityāha prakāśā vetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:7996: prakāśā vāprakāśā vā yadā dṛṣṭā na kenacit /
T04bsa054_u:8002: na pratipannā kenacit pratipantrā svayaṃrūpeṇa vā /
T04bsa054_u:8004: tadā vandhyāyā aprasavadharmiṇyāḥ striyā duhitā putrī,
T04bsa054_u:8013: tadapratīteḥ tasyā api apratītiriti kathyamānāpi yuktirahitena vacanamātreṇa sā svasaṃvittirmudhāḥ,
T04bsa054_u:8018: yadi svasaṃvedanaṃ vijñānasya nāsti na vidyate,
T04bsa054_u:8023: tasmādanubhavaphalasya smaraṇasya uttarakālaṃ darśanāt jñānasaṃvedanamastītyanumīyate iti /
T04bsa054_u:8025: yato yadi svasaṃvedanakāryatayā smaraṇaṃ niścitaṃ bhavet,
T04bsa054_u:8026: bhaved vahveryathā dhūmaḥ svasaṃvedanasya kāraṇaṃ smṛtiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8036: ataḥ smaraṇamapi jñānatvāt kathaṃ siddhamiti vaktavyam /
T04bsa054_u:8038: na ca smaraṇaṃ svasaṃvedanasya pratyakṣatayā grāhakam,
T04bsa054_u:8042: anyatvāviśeṣāt saṃtānāntarabhāvināpi smaraṇena tasya grahaṇaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:8043: atha tena pūrvamananubhūtatvānna smaryata iti cet,
T04bsa054_u:8049: kālpanikatve ca sarvavyavahārāṇāṃ kalpanānirmitatvāt sāṃvṛtatvamiti sādhitaṃ naḥ sādhyam /
T04bsa054_u:8051: bhavato 'pi kathaṃ tarhi svasaṃvedanābhāve smṛtirityāha anyānubhūta ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:8053: jñānādanyasmin grāhye vastuni viṣaye 'nubhūte sati jñāne smṛtiḥ smaraṇamupajāyate /
T04bsa054_u:8054: nanu anyasminnanubhūte anyatra smaraṇe atiprasaṅgaḥ syādityāha- saṃbandhāditi /
T04bsa054_u:8058: satyapi saṃbandhe anyasminnanubhūte anyasya smaraṇe viplutaṃ smaraṇaṃ syāditi cenna,
T04bsa054_u:8061: jñānameva ca viṣayānubhavo nānya iti viṣayānubhavasmaraṇāttatsaṃbaddhatayā jñāne smaraṇamabhidhīyate,
T04bsa054_u:8062: na tu viṣayarahitaṃ jñānamapi kevalamanusmaryate ityadoṣaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:8064: ākhuviṣaṃ mūṣikaviṣaṃ yathā saṃbandhāt kālāntareṇa jāyate,
T04bsa054_u:8066: tathā hi mūṣikaviṣamekasmin kṣaṇe śarīrasaṃkrāntaṃ punaḥ kālāntareṇa meghastanitamadhigamya
T04bsa054_u:8073: ?] / īkṣaṇikādividyā paracittādijñānābhijñā ca tābhyāṃ yuktasya tatsāmagrīsaṃbaddhasya cittasya darśanāt pratibhāsanāt vijñānasya khaṃ prakāśate svarūpaṃ pratibhāsate /
T04bsa054_u:8075: yadi hi tat sarvadā parokṣarūpaṃ kathaṃ kadācit sāmagrīviśeṣādupalabhyeta,
T04bsa054_u:8084: tasmād dṛṣṭaḥ pratītaḥ ghaṭo nidhānādi vā naiva añjanaṃ bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:8087: evamīkṣaṇikādividyāsahakāriṇā jñānena paracittaṃ ca ghaṭādivad dṛṣṭamiti naitāvatā tatsaṃvedanaṃ siddhaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:8096: tadgahaṇābhyupagame ca uttarottarasya apratītasya pratītaye jñānāntarānusaraṇena anavasthāprasaṅgācca na kathaṃcidapi arthasya pratītiriti /
T04bsa054_u:8100: sarvaścāyaṃ dṛṣṭādivyavahāro loke na syādityāha yathā dṛṣṭamityādi /
T04bsa054_u:8108: yathā dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ jñātaṃ naiveha pratiṣidhyate /
T04bsa054_u:8109: iti / yathā dṛṣṭamiti cakṣurādivijñānena pratyakṣeṇa pratipannam /
T04bsa054_u:8117: tena jñānasaṃvedanābhāvādarthānadhigamādayo 'pi doṣāḥ paramārthapakṣavādina iha nāvataranti /
T04bsa054_u:8119: kiṃ nāma tarhi pratiṣidhyate ityāha satyata ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:8132: duḥkhaṃ samudayo loko dṛṣṭisthānaṃ bhavaśca te /
T04bsa054_u:8137: na tu vāstavaṃ kiṃcit pratiṣidhyate iti /
T04bsa054_u:8138: tadevaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ jñānasya na kathaṃcidacidapi yujyate / taduktam-
T04bsa054_u:8141: yatra boddhā ca bodhyaṃ ca tatra bodhirna vidyate //
T04bsa054_u:8145: idānīṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ parisamāpya prakṛte yojayannāha cittādanyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:8147: vastu cetsā kathaṃ nānyānanyā cennāsti vastutaḥ // Bca_9.27 //
T04bsa054_u:8155: dvitīyapakṣe tu “yadā māyaiva te nāsti” [9.6] ityādinā pratipādita eva doṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8165: anyonyaparihāravatorekapratiṣedhasya aparavidhināntarīyakatvāt tayorekatrābhāvāt caturthī kalpanā sāpi na saṃghaṭate //
T04bsa054_u:8168: yadi sā māyā vastusatī kathaṃ nānyā cittādvayatiriktā na bhavati?
T04bsa054_u:8173: tasyāstatsvabhāvatvāt cittameva kevalam ityetat tadevāyātam / yaduktam-
T04bsa054_u:8174: yadā māyaiva te nāsti tadā kimupalabhyate /
T04bsa054_u:8177: asatyapi yathā māyā dṛśyā draṣṭṛ tathā manaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8183: tena “yadā na bhrāntirapyasti” [9.15] ityādi yaduktaṃ pareṇa tat prasādhya upasaṃhāreṇa darśitam /
T04bsa054_u:8184: punarapi prakārāntareṇa paramārthasadvijñānasādhanāya paropakramamabhisaṃdhāya āha vastvāśrayaścetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:8186: tathāhi- saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca heyopādeyatayā dvayamidaṃ yathāvat pratipattavyam /
T04bsa054_u:8192: tadevaṃ (Bcp 195) saṃkleśavyavadānayorvastusamudbhūtacittamantareṇa vyavasthāpanaṃ na ghaṭate iti manyante,
T04bsa054_u:8196: tadeva paramataṃ nirūpayati-vastveva vastusadbhūtacittameva āśrayaḥ asyeti vastvāśrayaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8222: tathāpi vastusadbhūtacittasamāśritatvāt tasya arthakriyāsāmarthyaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāha vastvāśrayeṇetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:8229: tathāpi vastvāśrayeṇa vastusadbhūtacittasamāśrayeṇa abhāvasya asadātmakasya kriyāvattvam,
T04bsa054_u:8245: astu nāma, tathāpi na bādhakānmuktirityāha grāhyamuktamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:8246: grāhyamuktaṃ yadā cittaṃ tadā sarve tathāgatāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8250: grāhakābhāve ca tadupakalpitasya abhilāpyasyābhāvāt abhilāpasyābhāva ityupadarśayituṃ grāhyamuktamityuktam /
T04bsa054_u:8252: tadā tasya cittasya sarvasattvasaṃtānāntargatatvāt sarvasaṃsāriṇaḥ sattvāḥ (Bcp 196)
T04bsa054_u:8257: tasmāt satyapi grāhyagrāhakavaidhurye bhāvābhiniveśasya tadavasthatvānna sarvathā saṃkleśaprahāṇamityabhisaṃdhāyāha evaṃ cetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:8258: evaṃ ca ko guṇo labdhaścittamātre 'pi kalpite // Bca_9.30 //
T04bsa054_u:8265: nanu etatsamānaṃ niḥsvabhāvavādino bhavato 'pīti samānadūṣaṇatāmāpādayannāha māyopamatve 'pītyādi-
T04bsa054_u:8267: māyopamatve māyāsvabhāvatve 'pi jagato jñāte kathaṃ kleśo nivartate,
T04bsa054_u:8269: kimatra prahāṇānupapattikāraṇaṃ yat pṛcchasītyāha yadā māyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:8271: idamatra prahāṇānupapattibījaṃ dṛśyate- yadā māyāstriyāṃ māyākāravinirmitāyāmabalāyāṃ rāgaḥ saṃraktacittatā jāyate utpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:8276: kiṃ tu tasyā māyāstriyāḥ kartuḥ nirmāturapi jāyate iti apiśabdārthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8280: tadā na tāvat tadanye tāmabhisamīkṣya manmathaśaraprahārāntaravyathitacetaso jāyante,
T04bsa054_u:8281: api tu yo 'pi sa tasyāḥ kamanīyakāntisaṃpadaḥ kāmakalākauśalotkaṇṭhitamūrterabhinirmātā,
T04bsa054_u:8283: so 'pi kāmakalayā paramadaśāmāsādayan na kathaṃcidapi cetaḥ saṃdhārayitumalam,
T04bsa054_u:8284: tat kathaṃ māyopamatve 'pi niścite saṃsārasaṃtaticchedaḥ syāt?
T04bsa054_u:8300: tasyāpi advayatattvasya sattve 'pi āgantukasaṃkleśavāsanāyā aprahīṇatvāt na sarve tathāgatā bhavanti /
T04bsa054_u:8304: asmākaṃ tu niḥsvabhāvameva janyaṃ janakaṃ ceti na samānam /
T04bsa054_u:8312: durbalā śūnyavāsaneti śūnyasya śūnyatattvasya śūnyatāyā veti vigrahaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8313: chandonurodhād bhāvapratyayasya lopaṃ kṛtvā śūnyeti nirdeśaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8318: kathaṃ tarhi sā nivartate ityāha śūnyatetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:8320: śūnyatāyā māyāsvabhāvaniḥsvabhāvatāyā vāsanā tasya ādhānam āvedhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8328: nanu bhāvābhiniveśo vā śūnyatābhiniveśo vā iti nābhiniveśaṃ prati kaścidviśeṣaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:8338: ityevaṃ cābhyāsāt bhāvavāsanāprahāṇasya paścāt sāpi śūnyavāsanāpi prahīyate nivartate /
T04bsa054_u:8339: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- śūnyatāvedho hi bhāvābhiniveśasya pratipakṣatvāt prahāṇopāyabhūtaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8340: adhigate ca upeye paścāt kolopamatvāt upāyasyāpi prahāṇamanuṣṭhīyate / etadevāha-
T04bsa054_u:8345: syādetat- yadi nāma kiṃcinnāstīti manasikārābhyāsād bhavati śūnyatāvāsanāyāḥ prahāṇam,
T04bsa054_u:8347: tataśca gaṇḍapraveśe 'kṣitārānirgamo jāta iti tadavasthaṃ tava dauṣṭhayam,
T04bsa054_u:8350: yadā na labhyate bhāvo yo nāstīti prakalpyate /
T04bsa054_u:8351: tadā nirāśrayo 'bhāvaḥ kathaṃ tiṣṭhenmateḥ puraḥ // Bca_9.34 //
T04bsa054_u:8355: sa yadi vicāryamāṇo niḥsvabhāvatayā na labhyate na prāpyate taimirikopalabdhakeśastabakavat /
T04bsa054_u:8358: tasya saṃbandhino 'bhāvāt nirālambaḥ abhāvaḥ kalpanāvidarśitamūrtiḥ kathaṃ tiṣṭhenmateḥ puraḥ,
T04bsa054_u:8361: athavā anyathāvatāryate- bhavatu nāma śūnyatābalādhānād bhāvavāsanāvinivṛttiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8362: tatpratiṣedhābhāvādabhāvābhiniveśastu kena vāryate ityata āha- yadā na labhyate ityādi /
T04bsa054_u:8364: ayamatra samudāyārthaḥ- sarvadharmaśūnyatā hi bhāvābhiniveśaprahāṇāya upādīyate /
T04bsa054_u:8368: ata eva etatsamastakalpanājālavinivartanāya bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa adhyātmaśūnyatādayo 'ṣṭādaśa śūnyatāḥ proktāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8371: anyathā śūnyatāyā bhāvād vyatireke dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatā na syāt /
T04bsa054_u:8374: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairevaṃ pratyavekṣate- na rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaṃ śūnyam,
T04bsa054_u:8390: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā /
T04bsa054_u:8395: evaṃ sarvavikalpapratyastamayāt samastāvaraṇanirmuktirupajāyate ityupadarśayannāha yadā na bhāva ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:8397: yadā na bhāvo nābhāvo mateḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puraḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8399: yadā na bhāvaḥ paramārthasatsvabhāvo materbuddheḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puro 'grataḥ,
T04bsa054_u:8401: nāpi bhāvavirahitalakṣaṇo 'bhāvaḥ yadā mateḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puraḥ,
T04bsa054_u:8404: ābhyāmavyatiriktatayā anayoḥ saṃgrahe tāvapi saṃgṛhītāviti nirāśrayā,

T04bsa054_u:9052: sa cātmā kalpanāsamāropitamūrtiriti ahaṃkāro 'pi tadabhāvādanāspada ityupadarśayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:9053: yatastato vāstu bhayaṃ yadyahaṃ nāma kiṃcana /
T04bsa054_u:9054: ahameva na kiṃciccedbhayaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati // Bca_9.57 //
T04bsa054_u:9055: yatastato vā bhayābhayasthānāt astu bhavatu bhayam /
T04bsa054_u:9058: ahaṃ nāma ahaṃpratyayavedyaṃ yatkiṃcana kiṃcidvastu syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9061: yadā punarahameva na kiṃcit na vastusat vicāryamāṇamahaṃ kiṃcit śabdavikalpamātrādanyata,
T04bsa054_u:9065: ito 'pi vicārāt trāso nivartate iti bhāvaḥ / taduktam-
T04bsa054_u:9066: nāsmyahaṃ na bhaviṣyāmi na me 'sti na bhaviṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:9072: na siṃghāṇaṃ na ca śleṣmā na pūyaṃ lasikāpi vā // Bca_9.58 //
T04bsa054_u:9079: siṃghāṇaṃ na ca śleṣmā na pūyam /
T04bsa054_u:9086: nāhaṃ vasā na ca svedo na medo 'strāṇi nāpyaham /
T04bsa054_u:9087: na cāhamantranirguṇḍī gūthamūtramahaṃ na ca // Bca_9.59 //
T04bsa054_u:9088: nāhaṃ vasā na ca svedo na meda iti /
T04bsa054_u:9101: nāhaṃ māṃsaṃ na ca strāyu noṣmā vāyurahaṃ na ca /
T04bsa054_u:9102: na ca cchidrāṇyahaṃ nāpi ṣaḍ vijñānāni sarvathā // Bca_9.60 //
T04bsa054_u:9103: nāhaṃ māṃsaṃ na ca snāyu noṣmā /
T04bsa054_u:9119: na hi pareṣāmapi ekaikaśaḥ keśādayo 'haṃ pratyayavedyā bhavanti /
T04bsa054_u:9120: samuditā api te eva kevalāḥ pūrvavat /
T04bsa054_u:9121: na ca samuditeṣu teṣu kaścidekaḥ saṃbhavati,
T04bsa054_u:9124: na ca anekeṣu ekapratyayo bhrānto yuktaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9128: santi asmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā rajo malaṃ tvakū māṃsāsthi snāyu śirā bukkā
T04bsa054_u:9129: hṛdayaṃ plīhakaḥ klomakaḥ antrāṇi antraguṇāḥ āmāśayaḥ pakkāśayaḥ audarīyakaṃ yakṛt
T04bsa054_u:9130: purīṣam aśru svedaḥ kheṭaḥ siṃghāṇakaṃ vasā lasikā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śliṣmapūyaśoṇitaṃ
T04bsa054_u:9132: eṣu ca vastuṣu bodhisattvaḥ upaparīkṣaṇajātīyo bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:9136: syādetat- yadi nāma keśādayo 'haṃpratyayavedyā na bhavanti,
T04bsa054_u:9138: yataḥ antarvyāpārapuruṣagocara eva ahaṃpratyayo 'smābhiriṣyate iti naiyāyikādayaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9140: yasmāt- ahaṃ gauraḥ kṛśo dīrgho gacchāmītyādyākāraparāmarśātmaka eva ayamahaṃpratyayaḥ pratibhāsate /
T04bsa054_u:9142: na ca anyākāreṇa jñānena anyasya grahaṇaṃ yuktam,
T04bsa054_u:9146: tatra naiyāyikāstāvat nityaṃ sarvagataṃ pratiprāṇibhinnamacetanaṃ cetanāyogāttu cetanaṃ
T04bsa054_u:9147: sukhādiguṇādhāraṃ śubhāśubhakarmakartāraṃ tatphalopabhoktāraṃ paralokinaṃ ca ātmānamicchanti /
T04bsa054_u:9159: tadyathā- sarpasya kuṇḍalāvasthānivṛttau ṛjutvāvasthāpravṛttau ca sarpatvasyobhayatrāpyavṛttiḥ / yathoktam-
T04bsa054_u:9173: kāpilāstu nityaṃ vyāpakaṃ nirguṇaṃ svayameva caitanyātmakamātmānamicchanti,
T04bsa054_u:9186: śabdādiṣu śrotrādivṛttibhirmanasādhiṣṭhitābhiḥ parigṛhīteṣu viṣayeṣu buddhiradhyavasāyaṃ karoti /
T04bsa054_u:9191: ātmanaśca nijaṃ rūpaṃ caitanyaṃ kalpayanti te //
T04bsa054_u:9193: pradhānenopanītaṃ ca phalaṃ bhuṅkte sa kevalam /
T04bsa054_u:9198: upaniṣadvādinastu samastaprāṇisaṃtānāntargatamekameva vyāpi nityaṃ ca jñānamicchanti /
T04bsa054_u:9201: na bāhyaṃ kimapyavayavi paramāṇvādikaṃ grāhyaṃ pramāṇaprasiddhamasti / āha ca-
T04bsa054_u:9217: saṃprati citsvabhāvātmavādinaḥ sāṃkhyādayaḥ ṣaḍvijñānānāmātmaniṣedhamasahiṣṇavaḥ prāhuḥ- śabdādijñānaṃ cidātmakamātmaivāsmābhirabhidhīyate /
T04bsa054_u:9220: śabdajñānaṃ yadi tadā śabdo gṛhyeta sarvadā /
T04bsa054_u:9222: tasya ca nityatvāt śabdajñānaṃ nityaṃ syāt,
T04bsa054_u:9223: tadā śabdo 'pi sadā nityameva tadbhāvābhāvakālayorgrahītavyaḥ syāt,
T04bsa054_u:9228: jñeyaṃ vinā tu kiṃ vetti yena jñānaṃ nirucyate // Bca_9.61 //
T04bsa054_u:9230: śabdasya tu kādācitkatvāt na sarvadā sattābhivyaktiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9231: tataśca tadasattākāle jñeyaṃ vinā viṣayamantareṇa kiuṃ vetti kiṃ jānāti tad jñānam?
T04bsa054_u:9233: yena jñeyena śūnyamapi jñānaṃ nirucyate abhidhīyate /
T04bsa054_u:9237: ajānānaṃ yadi jñānaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ prasajyate /
T04bsa054_u:9241: na hi tena kiṃcidaparāddhaṃ yena na vijñānaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9243: tasmādviṣayaparijñānābhāvāt yathā kāṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ na bhavati,
T04bsa054_u:9247: tena kāraṇena asaṃnihitajñeyaṃ asaṃnihitamayogyadeśasthaṃ jñeyaṃ grāhyo viṣayo yasya tattathoktaṃ jñānaṃ nāsti na vidyate iti niścayaḥ ekānta eṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9252: yato yadasya jñānasya paricchedyaṃ rūpaṃ vyaktamityucyate,
T04bsa054_u:9254: śabdasya tu sadā sattvamasattvaṃ vā na vivakṣitam /
T04bsa054_u:9258: tasya na sarvadā saṃnidhānamastīti kṛtvā iti kathaṃ noktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ?
T04bsa054_u:9264: yataḥ tadeva rūpagrāhakamiṣyate iti cedatrāha tadevetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:9265: tadeva rūpaṃ jānāti tadā kiṃ na śṛṇotyapi /
T04bsa054_u:9266: tadeva śabdajñānameva yadi rūpaṃ jānātīti matam,
T04bsa054_u:9273: kevalamasaṃnidhānāt na doṣa iti parasyottaramāśaṅkayāha śabdasyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:9275: śabdasya viṣayatāmāpannasya asaṃnidhānādayogyadeśāt grahaṇaṃ na syāt- yadi,
T04bsa054_u:9278: tat tasmāt tarhi śabdasyāsaṃnidhānāt tat jñānamapi śabdajñānam asadavidyamānam /
T04bsa054_u:9281: kiṃ ca / yadi śabdajñānaṃ tadā rūpagrahaṇādyātmakaṃ tanna yujyate ityāha śabdagrahaṇetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:9285: yat jñānaṃ tad rūpagrahaṇaṃ rūpagrahaṇātmakaṃ katham?
T04bsa054_u:9288: nanu yathā kaścideka eva kasyacidapekṣayā pitā,
T04bsa054_u:9289: kasyacidapekṣayā ca sa eva putraḥ syāt,
T04bsa054_u:9290: tathā prakṛte 'pi rūpadvayamekasya bhaviṣyatītyāha ekaḥ pitetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:9291: ekaḥ pitā ca putraśca kalpyate na tu tattvataḥ // Bca_9.64 //
T04bsa054_u:9292: ekaḥ pitā eva janakaḥ putraśca janyaḥ sa eveti kalpyate,
T04bsa054_u:9296: eka eva svabhāvaḥ ubhayātmakaḥ kalpanāsamāropitavyapadeśāt [rūpabhedena] punareka eva tathā nānābhidhānena naivābhidhīyate /
T04bsa054_u:9300: tasmāt yathā vāstavamekasya dvirūpatvaṃ tanna dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇyasti,
T04bsa054_u:9303: ito 'pi na pāramārthiko 'yaṃ vyapadeśa ityāha sattvaṃ raja iti-
T04bsa054_u:9304: sattvaṃ rajastamo vāpi na putro na pitā yataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9305: etacca avaśyaṃ tvayāpi svīkartavyam- sāṃkhyamate hi triguṇamekaṃ jagat,
T04bsa054_u:9306: tataḥ sattvaṃ rajastamo vāpīti samudāyaḥ samuccayārthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9307: yato yasmādete guṇāḥ svasvabhāvāvasthitāḥ pratyekaṃ samuditā vā /
T04bsa054_u:9311: te eva prāptajanakabhāvā api tena pūrvāparakālayoraviśiṣṭasvabhāvā eva /
T04bsa054_u:9322: svabhāvastasya rūpagrāhakasya jñānasya nekṣyate na pratīyate /
T04bsa054_u:9329: anyena rūpeṇa svabhāvena rūpagrahaṇātmakena rūpaṃ gṛhṇātīti śeṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9331: yathā nāṭyasamaye raṅgabhūmigato naṭaḥ eka eva (Bcp 218)
T04bsa054_u:9334: atrāha- so 'pyaśāśvataḥ iti anityaḥ pūrvasvabhāvaparityāgena rūpāntaramāviśati /
T04bsa054_u:9335: na ca pūrvāparakālayorekasvabhāva eva naṭo nānārūpasaṃbandhāt,
T04bsa054_u:9339: svabhāvaḥ punarasya aparāpara utpadyate nirudhyate ca /
T04bsa054_u:9351: na hi bhāvo nāma anya eva svabhāvāt,
T04bsa054_u:9352: yena tasyotpādanirodhayorapi bhāvasya tau na syātām /
T04bsa054_u:9353: nāpi tadabhinnasya svabhāvasya utpādanirodhayorbhāvasya tādavasthyaṃ yuktamabhedābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
T04bsa054_u:9355: syādetat- bhavatveva eṣa prasaṅgaḥ yadi rūpadvayamasyātmanaḥ satyaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9356: kiṃ tarhi nijamasya rūpamapahāya aparaṃ rūpamatāttvikam,
T04bsa054_u:9362: tarhi nijaṃ tadrūpamucyatām nijaṃ svābhāvikaṃ tasyātmano rūpaṃ tattvamucyatām /
T04bsa054_u:9377: yadi vā avāntaraṃ bhedanibandhanaṃ viśeṣamapāsya kiṃcidākārakamāśritya ekatvamucyate tadā cetanā puruṣadharmaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:9381: katham? tayoścetanācetanayoḥ yena kāraṇena astitā samā /
T04bsa054_u:9384: nanu ca / atrāpi sādṛśyanibandhanamiṣyate eva ekatvaṃ vastubhede 'pi /
T04bsa054_u:9386: viśeṣaśca yadā mithyā kaḥ sādṛśyāśrayastadā // Bca_9.68 //
T04bsa054_u:9388: viśeṣo bhedaḥ sarvabhāvānāmaniyamena yadā mithyā asatyam [tyaḥ?
T04bsa054_u:9393: viśeṣābhāve ca tadeva tat syānna sadṛśam /
T04bsa054_u:9394: na hi gogavayayorgoviśeṣamananubhavan na gavayo gosadṛśo bhavet,
T04bsa054_u:9397: sa ca yadā pāramārthiko na bhavati,
T04bsa054_u:9398: tadā kaḥ sādṛśyasya samānākāratāyāḥ puṃsāmanyasya vā āśrayo nibandhanaṃ vā bhavet?
T04bsa054_u:9424: tenāyamadoṣaḥ iti parābhiprāyaṃ saṃbhāvayannāha atha jña ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:9427: athāyamātmā cetanāyogād buddhisamavāyāt svayamacetano 'pi jño bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:9430: yadā tarhi madamūrcchāvasthāyāṃ cetanānivṛttau ayamātmā ajño na kiṃcidapi jānāti,
T04bsa054_u:9437: acetanasya sarvakālamavikṛtasya sataḥ asyātmanaḥ caitanyena buddhisamavāyena kiṃ kṛtam,
T04bsa054_u:9442: ajñasya kiṃcidapi hitāhitaṃ jñātumaśaktasya niṣkriyasya nirgato bahirbhūtaḥ kriyāyā iti niṣkriyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9444: athavā sarvakarmaṇi śaktivikalasya gamanādhikriyāśūnyasya vā ākāśasya prakṛtānupayogitvādākāśakalpasya /
T04bsa054_u:9452: idānīṃ punaranyathā ātmapratiṣedhabādhakaṃ paramatenotthāpayannāha na karmetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:9455: tadā tenātmanā paralokagāminā vinā antareṇa karmaphalasaṃbandho 'yuktaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9468: na hi bhikṣavaḥ kṛtopacitāni karmāṇi pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau /
T04bsa054_u:9472: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
T04bsa054_u:9478: kathamasati ātmani karmaphalasaṃbandho ghaṭate ityāha karma kṛtvetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:9479: karma kṛtvā vinaṣṭe hi phalaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati // Bca_9.71 //
T04bsa054_u:9480: hi yasmāt karma kṛtvā karmotpādya śubhāśubhalakṣaṇam /
T04bsa054_u:9486: kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ sugatau durgatau vā sukhaduḥkhātmakaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati utpatsyate?
T04bsa054_u:9488: paraloke ca kṛtakarmaṇa eva phalayogino 'nyasya kasyacidutpādāt,
T04bsa054_u:9498: ke siddhe? āhabhinnādhāre kriyāphale karma kriyā asmin bhave,
T04bsa054_u:9501: tathāhi- na yenaiva śarīreṇa tasmin janmani karma karoti,
T04bsa054_u:9507: syādetat- ātmavyāpāramantareṇa te eva kartṛtvopabhoktṛtve na syātāmityatrāha-
T04bsa054_u:9508: nirvyāpāraśca tatrātmetyatra vādo vṛthā nanu // Bca_9.72 //
T04bsa054_u:9517: iti hetoratrātmani nirvyāpāre vādo vivādo vṛthā niṣphalaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9523: tato na vṛthā tadvāda ityāha hetumānityādi-
T04bsa054_u:9527: sa eva phālayogī phalasaṃbaddhaḥ iti evameṣa saṃbhavo na dṛśyate,
T04bsa054_u:9529: anya eva mṛto loke jāyate anya eva hi /
T04bsa054_u:9531: etattarhi kathaṃ nīyate yaduktam- anenaiva kṛtaṃ karma,
T04bsa054_u:9536: aikyamāśritya anekeṣu ekatvaṃ lokādhyavasāyavaśādāropitameva nimittīkṛtya kartā bhoktā
T04bsa054_u:9537: iti deśitam- ya eva karmaṇaḥ kartā sa eva tatphalasyopabhoktā ca /
T04bsa054_u:9541: ata eva ca tatraivoktam- upātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu vipacyante iti /
T04bsa054_u:9544: karmajaṃ lokavaicitryaṃ cetanā tatkṛtaṃ ca tat /
T04bsa054_u:9549: karmajaṃ hi jagaduktamaśeṣaṃ karma cittamavadhūya na cāsti //
T04bsa054_u:9559: yathā ca lākṣārasaparibhāvitaṃ mātuluṅgādibījamuptaṃ tatsaṃskāraparaṃparāpravṛtteḥ tatpuṣpādiṣu raktatāmutpādayati,
T04bsa054_u:9560: na ca tatra kaścit pūrvāparakālayoreko 'nugāmī samasti /
T04bsa054_u:9565: phalaṃ tatraiva badhnāti karpāse raktatā yathā //
T04bsa054_u:9567: tasmādyathā bījādiṣu ātmānamantareṇāpi pratiniyamena kāryaṃ tadutpattiśca krameṇa bhavati,
T04bsa054_u:9568: tathā prakṛte 'pi paralokagāminamekaṃ vināpi kāryakāraṇabhāvasya niyāmakatvāt pratiniyatameva phalam,
T04bsa054_u:9569: kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛtasya saṃtānasya avicchedena pravartanāt paraloke phalapratilambho 'bhidhīyate,
T04bsa054_u:9572: yathā ca satyevātmani sa na ghaṭate,
T04bsa054_u:9573: tathā sapracayamucyamānamativistaraṃ syāditi neha pratanyate // āha ca-
T04bsa054_u:9589: kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imān skandhān vijahāti,
T04bsa054_u:9595: etena bhagavataiva idaṃpratyayatāmātralakṣaṇaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi darśita eva /
T04bsa054_u:9596: ayamapi ca saṃtānasyetyanena [saṃtāna eka ityanena] yathāvyavahāramanirūpitasvarūpaḥ sūcita eva,
T04bsa054_u:9602: dṛṣṭā śaktirmatā sā cetsaṃvṛtyāstu yathā tathā //
T04bsa054_u:9607: na ca atra smarturabhāve 'pi kaścid vyāghātaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9608: anubhūte hi vastuni vijñānasaṃtāne smṛtibījādhānāt kālāntareṇa saṃtatiparipākahetoḥ smaraṇaṃ nāma kāryamutpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:9610: ativistarabhayāt pratyekamiha na pratividhīyante iti tatsamarthanamanyatraiva vistareṇāvadhāryamiti //
T04bsa054_u:9613: paramārthe tu sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvāt sarvavikalpoparamācca na kiṃcidutpadyate vā nirudhyate vā sātmakamanātmakaṃ vā /
T04bsa054_u:9615: nāpi ihaloko na paraloko vā na kaścidasti,
