T04bsa054_u:9617: tasmāt sarvametat pratibimbasaṃnibhaṃ niḥsvabhāvamutpadyate nirudhyate ca /
T04bsa054_u:9618: kāryakāraṇaṃ ca sātmakaṃ nirātmakaṃ ca nityamanityaṃ cābhidhīyate /
T04bsa054_u:9626: evaṃ na ca nirodho 'sti na ca bhāvo 'sti tattvataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9633: na kartāsti na bhoktāsti puṇyāpuṇyaṃ pratītyajam /
T04bsa054_u:9634: yatpratītya na tajjātaṃ proktaṃ vācaspate tvayā //
T04bsa054_u:9640: bhagavānāha- evameva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni abhiniviśate /
T04bsa054_u:9646: tacca karmābhisaṃskṛtamādita eva kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
T04bsa054_u:9656: tat punaḥ kālāntareṇa maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite jīvitendriyanirodhe āyuṣaḥ
T04bsa054_u:9657: parikṣayāt tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣīṇatvāt caramavijñānasya nirudhyamānasya manasa ārambaṇībhavati /
T04bsa054_u:9659: iti hi mahārāja caramavijñānenādhipatinā tena ca karmārambaṇena aupapattyaṃśikaṃ dvayapratyayaṃ prathamaṃ vijñānamutpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:9666: tasya ca prathamavijñānasya aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasya anantaraṃ sabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate,
T04bsa054_u:9673: iti mahārāja na kaściddharmo 'smāllokāt paralokaṃ gacchati,
T04bsa054_u:9697: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagāḥ,
T04bsa054_u:9709: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
T04bsa054_u:9719: ātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhavatviti aparityāgo bhūyo bhūyaśca prārthanā,
T04bsa054_u:9721: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayatti kāyena vācā manasā,
T04bsa054_u:9736: tatra karmaṇāṃ naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomi /
T04bsa054_u:9737: (Bcp 226) tṛṣṇāyāṃ api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti /
T04bsa054_u:9738: avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /
T04bsa054_u:9740: api tu vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhisyanditam avidyāvakīrṇaṃ virohati,
T04bsa054_u:9742: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9743: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogādṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyādāsvādanānuprabaddhaṃ
T04bsa054_u:9745: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu
T04bsa054_u:9756: kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu
T04bsa054_u:9769: na tu ya eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ,
T04bsa054_u:9773: na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,
T04bsa054_u:9776: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,
T04bsa054_u:9792: tadevamātmādivirahe 'pi karmaphalasaṃbandho 'vikalaḥ sūtreṣu bhagavatā svayamupadarśita ityupadarśitaṃ bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:9796: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:9797: ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍitaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:9803: cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham /
T04bsa054_u:9806: tadapi ca ātmadṛṣṭayabhiniviṣṭānāmanyatrātmagrāhaparikalpavicchedārthaṃ neyārthatayā saṃvṛtyā cittamātmeti prakāśitaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9812: yataḥ tadapi ca anyatra pudgalādyabhiniveśabādhanāya vacanam /
T04bsa054_u:9817: tathāpi na vastutaḥ tadahaṃkāragocara ityupadarśayannāha atītetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:9818: atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ taddhi na vidyate /
T04bsa054_u:9819: tridhā hi cittaṃ saṃbhavati parikalpamupādāya atītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca /
T04bsa054_u:9821: atītānāgataṃ naṣṭājātaṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ na ahaṃdarśanaviṣayaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9826: yadatītaṃ tat kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇāmitam /
T04bsa054_u:9829: pratyutpannaṃ tarhi cittamahaṃ bhaviṣya tītyata āha-
T04bsa054_u:9834: asmin pratyutpanne citte naṣṭe dvitīyakṣaṇe atīte sati nāstyahaṃ punaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:9838: ato na cittālambano 'pīti nirālambana evāyamahaṃpratyaya utpadyate //
T04bsa054_u:9841: nāpi cittamahaṃkārasya viṣaya iti prasādhyopasaṃharannāha yathaivetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:9846: bhāgaśaḥ pratyavayavaśaḥ kṛto 'vadhūto na kaścit na vastusan prāpyate,
T04bsa054_u:9853: yadi sattvo na vidyeta kasyopari kṛpeti cet /
T04bsa054_u:9854: yadi sarvathaiva sattvaḥ ātmā pudgalo vā vicāryamāṇo na vidyeta,
T04bsa054_u:9856: tadā kasyopari kṛpā karuṇā bodhisattvānāṃ bhavet,
T04bsa054_u:9862: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat- na bhagavan bodhisattvena atibahuṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam /
T04bsa054_u:9863: eka eva dharmo bodhisattvena svārādhitaḥ kartavyaḥ supratibiddhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9867: evameva bhagavan yena bodhisattvasya mahākaruṇā gacchati,
T04bsa054_u:9869: tadyathā bhagavan jīvitendriye sati anyeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavati,
T04bsa054_u:9870: evameva bhagavan mahākaruṇāyāṃ satyāṃ bodhikārakāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavatīti //
T04bsa054_u:9874: mañjuśrīrāha- mahākaruṇārambhā devaputra bodhisattvānāṃ caryā sattvādhiṣṭhānā //
T04bsa054_u:9876: tasmādavaśyaṃ prathamataḥ sattvālambanā karuṇābhyupagantavyāḥ duḥkhitasattvādhiṣṭhānena samutpatteḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9877: sattvābhāve ca sā na syāditi cet,
T04bsa054_u:9882: tadarthamabhyupetena svīkṛtena mohena saṃvṛtyā yaḥ prakalpitaḥ samāropitaḥ sattvaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:9884: tathāhi sakalakalpanājālarahitaṃ sarvāvaraṇavinirmuktaṃ paramapuruṣārthatayā buddhatvamiha sādhyam /
T04bsa054_u:9889: sā ca prathamato duḥkhitasattveṣu pravartamānā saṃbhārārambhanidānamupapadyate iti kāryārthaṃ mohasya saṃvṛtisatyarūpasyābhyupagamaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9897: ye kecidbhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti imānete (tān?)
T04bsa054_u:9899: tato yadi nāma prajñayā nirūpayataḥ paramārthataḥ sattvānupalambhaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:9900: tathāpi saṃvṛtyā na niṣidhyate iti / taduktam-
T04bsa054_u:9901: yataḥ prajñā tattvaṃ bhajati karuṇā saṃvṛtimataḥ
T04bsa054_u:9904: tadā te 'bhūdārte suta iva pituḥ prema jagati //
T04bsa054_u:9907: sattvasaṃjñā ca te nātha sarvathā na pravartate /
T04bsa054_u:9912: nanu paramārthataḥ sattvābhāve kasya tat kāryam,
T04bsa054_u:9913: iti kathaṃ tatsādhanāya kasyacit pravṛttirityabhisaṃdhāya āha kāryamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:9914: kāryaṃ kasya na cetsattvaḥ satyamīhā tu mohataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9917: tadā ekasyānuyāyino 'bhāvāt rūpādīnāṃ ca utpannavināśitvāt kāryaṃ kasya?
T04bsa054_u:9920: evameva etanmatameva asmākam- naiva kasyacit paramārthataḥ kāryam,
T04bsa054_u:9922: yadyevam, kathaṃ tarhi tatsādhanāya prathamataḥ pravṛttiriti cet,
T04bsa054_u:9925: mamaiva tat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyatītyekatvādhyavasāyena sattvābhāve 'pi saṃvṛtyā māyāsvabhāvatayā /
T04bsa054_u:9931: nanu ca moho nāma avidyāsvabhāvatayā sarvathaiva anupādeyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9932: tat kathaṃ punastasyaiva svīkāraḥ ityata āha duḥkhetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:9933: duḥkhavyupaśamārthaṃ tu kāryamoho na vāryate // Bca_9.77 //
T04bsa054_u:9950: etat kāryārthamavicārataḥ [9.4] ityasmin prastāve pratipāditameva pūrvam /
T04bsa054_u:9963: kiṃbhūtaḥ? duḥkhahetuḥ duḥkhasya sāṃsārikasya triduḥkhatālakṣaṇasya hetuḥ kāraṇam /
T04bsa054_u:9968: tathāhi ātmānaṃ paśyataḥ saṃskṛteṣu skandhadhātvāyataneṣu ahamiti dṛḍhataramutpadyate snehaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9969: tatastadduḥkhapratīkārecchayā sukhābhilāṣo doṣān pracchādya tadarthitayā guṇādhyāropāt tatsādhaneṣu pravartate /
T04bsa054_u:9971: ahaṃ mameti ca darśanāt paripanthini vidveṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9972: tataḥ samastaduḥkhanidānaṃ sarva eva kleśopakleśā labdhaprasarāḥ pravartante /
T04bsa054_u:9985: tato 'pi ātmadarśanādapi na nivartyo nivartayitumaśakyo 'haṃkāraśced yadi, tadā-
T04bsa054_u:9993: tathāhi tadbhāvanāprakarṣaparyantagamanāt sākṣānnairātmyadarśanāt virodhi satkāyadarśanaṃ nivartate /
T04bsa054_u:9994: tannivṛttau ca ekasyānugāmino darśanābhāvāt pūrvāpararūpavikalasya kṣaṇamātrasya darśanam /
T04bsa054_u:9995: tataḥ pūrvāparasamāropābhāvāt na anāgatasukhasādhanaṃ kiṃcidātmanaḥ paśyati /
T04bsa054_u:9996: tato na tasya kvacidviṣaye rāgo jāyate,
T04bsa054_u:10002: na ca anyena kṛte 'pakāre prekṣāvataḥ anyatra vairaniryātanamucitam,
T04bsa054_u:10004: evaṃ rāgādinivṛttau anye 'pi tatprabhavāḥ kleśopakleśā notpadyante /
T04bsa054_u:10007: evaṃ hi pudgalaśūnyatāyāṃ satkāyadarśananivṛttau chinnamūlatvāt kleśā na samudācaranti /
T04bsa054_u:10009: tadyathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūlacchinnasya sarvaśākhāpatrapalāśaṃ śuṣyati,
T04bsa054_u:10014: syādetatyadi nāma ātmā vicāreṇa kharaviṣāṇasadṛśatvānnāhaṃkārasya viṣayaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:10015: tathāpi kāyāvayavī tadviṣayo bhaviṣyatītyatrāha kāyo neti-
T04bsa054_u:10016: kāyo na pādau na jaṅghā norū kāyaḥ kaṭirna ca /
T04bsa054_u:10017: nodaraṃ nāpyayaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ noro bāhū na cāpi saḥ // Bca_9.79 //
T04bsa054_u:10018: na hastau nāpyayaṃ pārśvau na kakṣau nāṃsalakṣaṇaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10019: na grīvā na śiraḥ kāyaḥ kāyo 'tra kataraḥ punaḥ // Bca_9.80 //
T04bsa054_u:10020: kāyo 'pi vicāreṇaiko naiva kaścidastītyupadarśayati- tathā hi karacaraṇādayo bhāgā evaṃ paraṃ dṛśyante,
T04bsa054_u:10037: na kakṣau, bhujamūle api na kāyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10049: atra eṣu pādādibhāgeṣu purovartiṣu śarīrakalpanānimitteṣu kataraḥ kāyo bhavatu?
T04bsa054_u:10050: naiva kaścideko 'pi nirūpyamāṇaḥ kāyātmaka upalabhyate iti yāvat //
T04bsa054_u:10051: athāpi syāt- naivamabhidhīyate pratyekaṃ karādayaḥ kāyaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:10052: kiṃ tarhi sarvāvayavavyāpakatvādavayavinaḥ sarvāvayaveṣu vartate ityatrāha yadītyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10056: tatra yadi sarveṣu karacaraṇādiṣu avayaveṣu kāyo 'vayavī,
T04bsa054_u:10066: tasya avakāśābhāvādeva avayaveṣu na vṛttirityāha aṃśā ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10067: aṃśā aṃśeṣu vartante sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ // Bca_9.81 //
T04bsa054_u:10068: aṃśā bhāgāḥ aṃśeṣu svasvabhāgeṣu vartante vyavatiṣṭhante,
T04bsa054_u:10071: svayaṃ punarasau kāyo 'vayavī kva nu nāma vyavasthitaḥ iti na vidmaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:10077: avayaveṣu anavakāśatvāt sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ iti prasaṅgo nādyāpi nivartate /
T04bsa054_u:10080: ādiśabdāccaraṇādiṣu sthitaḥ samavetaḥ kāyāvayavī cet yadi,
T04bsa054_u:10081: tadā punarayaṃ doṣaḥ syādityāha- kāyā iti /
T04bsa054_u:10090: ayaṃ ca prasaṅgaḥ anekatra ekadeśena vṛttipakṣe 'pi yojayitavyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10095: naivāntarna bahiḥ kāyaḥ kathaṃ kāyaḥ karādiṣu /
T04bsa054_u:10097: adhunā punaravayavinaḥ pratiṣedhāt na bahiḥ na bāhyaḥ pratyakṣādigocaraḥ kāyaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:10100: karādibhyaḥ pṛthaṅ nāsti kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // Bca_9.83 //
T04bsa054_u:10101: karādibhyo 'vayavebhyaḥ pṛthag bhinnaḥ upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaḥ kāyo nāsti,
T04bsa054_u:10107: sa kāyaḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate?
T04bsa054_u:10108: kathaṃ nviti kathaṃcidapi kāyamanupalabhamānaḥ tatsattvamasaṃbhāvayan pṛcchati- kathaṃ nu kena prakāreṇa /
T04bsa054_u:10117: kathaṃ tarhi karādiṣu kāyabuddhirityāha- mohāttu ityādi /
T04bsa054_u:10118: mohādavidyāvaśāt tu punaḥ kāyabuddhiḥ karādiṣu ekadravyarahiteṣu,
T04bsa054_u:10124: kathamanyatra sā na bhavati ityatrāha saṃniveśeti-
T04bsa054_u:10132: yathā sthāṇau puruṣasvabhāvarahite 'pi puruṣasādhāraṇordhvatādisaṃniveśaviśeṣamupalabdhavato dūrādavivecitaparaviśeṣasya kasyacit vibhramāt
T04bsa054_u:10138: yāvat yāvatkālāvadhiparicchinnā pratyayānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ pṛthivyādiṣaḍdhātuṣaṭsparśāyatanāṣṭādaśamanopavicārātmakānāṃ karmāyattavṛttīnāṃ sāmagrī
T04bsa054_u:10140: yathā puruṣasvabhāvavirahito 'pi paramārthataḥ parikalpitarūpatayā puruṣa iva pratibhāsate vyavahriyate /
T04bsa054_u:10143: na pūrvaṃ kalalādyavasthāyāṃ na paścādvikalitatvād bhasmādyavasthāyāṃ nijasvabhāvābhāvāt /
T04bsa054_u:10145: evaṃ karādau sā yāvattāvatkāyo 'tra dṛśyate // Bca_9.85 //
T04bsa054_u:10148: evaṃ tathā karādau yāvat sā pratyayasāmagrī,
T04bsa054_u:10155: ayamatra samudāyārthaḥtattatpratyayasāmagrīsadbhāve tattadvastusvabhāvamantareṇāpi abhūtaṃ tattvamādarśayantī bhrāntivaśādasau kalpanā upajāyate
T04bsa054_u:10158: ato nāyaṃ kāyādivyavahāro vāstava iti vakṣyati / taduktam-
T04bsa054_u:10162: anirdeśyaḥ svataḥ prāptaḥ kāya ityucyate katham //
T04bsa054_u:10175: tāvat kāyo 'tra karādau dṛśyate, na paścāt /
T04bsa054_u:10178: karacaraṇādayaḥ punaravayavāḥ pratyakśopalabdhatvāt pratiṣeddhumaśakyāḥ ityāśaṅkaya karādayo 'pi parikalpitasvabhāvā evetyupadarśayitumāha evamaṅgulītyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10194: parvaṇāmaṅgulibhāgānāṃ samūhatvāt saṃghātatvāt kataro bhavediti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10195: parvaṇāmapi pratyekamavastutvamityata āha- parvāpi na vastu /
T04bsa054_u:10200: iti / aṃśāḥ parvabhāgāḥ api aṇubhedena paramāṇuśo vibhāgena bhidyamānatvāt kalpitā eva /
T04bsa054_u:10205: dikṣu vā vibhāgāḥ nānādigavasthitā nānārūpāṃśāḥ paramāṇoḥ,
T04bsa054_u:10208: iti nyāyāt / tathāhi- pūrvāparādidigavasthitaparamāṇvabhimukhaṃ yat tat paramāṇormadhyavartino rūpam,
T04bsa054_u:10216: tasyāpi pūrvadigavasthitasya paramāṇoraparaparamāṇunā sarvātmanā saṃbandhena tatsvarūpāntarbhāvāt paramāṇumātraṃ dravyaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:10217: tathā ca sati pracayarūpā bhūdharādayo na syuḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10218: ato bhavanādīnāṃ pracayamicchatā dvitīya eva pakṣaḥ samabhyupeyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10219: tadā ca ṣaḍbhiraparāpararūpeṇa yugapat saṃbandhāt ṣaḍbhāgo madhyaparamāṇuḥ syāt,
T04bsa054_u:10227: te 'pi punaraṇīyāṃso bhāgāḥ tathaiva nirūpyamāṇāḥ nirātmatayā nabhaḥsvabhāvatāṃ pratipadyante ityāha digvibhāgo 'pītyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10229: digvibhāgo 'pi digbhedena paramāṇorvibhāgo 'pi pūrvavat ṣaḍaṃśatayā bhidyamānaḥ kataro bhavet?
T04bsa054_u:10236: evaṃ karādayo 'pi vicārato niḥsvabhāvā draṣṭavyā iti /
T04bsa054_u:10242: na ca kāyaḥ ahaṃkārasya viṣayo vastutaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10243: tasmādavidyāsamutthāpitātmatayā ātmādisattvamantareṇāpi pravartamāno 'yamahamiti pratyayo nirviṣaya eva samutpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:10249: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bodhisattva evaṃ kāyasmṛtimupasthāpayati- ayaṃ kāyaḥ pādapādāṅulijaṅghorutrikodaranābhīpṛṣṭhavaṃśahṛdayapārśvapārśukāhastakalācībāhvaṅgagrīvāhanulalāṭaśiraḥkapālamātrasamūhaḥ
T04bsa054_u:10254: tasya pratyavekṣamāṇasya evaṃ bhavati- ākāśasamo 'yaṃ kāyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10257: tasya kāyaparijñānahetorna bhūyaḥ kvacit smṛtiḥ prasarati,
T04bsa054_u:10261: ayaṃ kāyo na pūrvāntādāgato nāparānte saṃkrānto na pūrvāntāparāntāvasthito 'nyatrāsadviparyāsasaṃbhūtaḥ kārakavedakarahito nādyantamadhye pratiṣṭhitamūlaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:10263: āgantukairvyavahārairvyavahriyate kāya iti deha iti bhoga iti āśraya iti kuṇapa iti āyatanamiti /
T04bsa054_u:10266: evaṃ yadā vicāryamāṇo vastutaḥ śūnyasvabhāvatayā ākāśasaṃkāśaḥ sarvathā kāyaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:10267: tadā mithyaiva vastutattvamāropya rāgādikamutpādayantaḥ saṃsāramupabṛṃhayanti bālāḥ ityāhaevamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10268: evaṃ svapnopame rūpe ko rajyeta vicārakaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10269: evamityuktakrameṇa svapnopame svapnopalabdhe iva rūpe 'saumanasyasthānīye ko rajyeta,
T04bsa054_u:10274: tadyathā- saumanasyasthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā rāgo jāyate /
T04bsa054_u:10275: daurmanasyasthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā dveṣo jāyate /
T04bsa054_u:10276: upekṣāsthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā moho jāyate iti /
T04bsa054_u:10285: iti hi atyantayā cakṣurāyatanaṃ śūnyaṃ cakṣurāyatanasvabhāvena tat pūrvāntato 'pi nopalabhyate,
T04bsa054_u:10291: iti hi māyopamānīndriyāṇi svapnopamān viṣayān paśyati,
T04bsa054_u:10295: evametadyathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā paśyan ko rajyeta dveṣṭi muhyati vā?
T04bsa054_u:10297: kāyābhāve ca strāyādikalpanayāpi rāgo na yukta ityāha kāyaścetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10298: kāyaścaivaṃ yadā nāsti tadā kā strī pumāṃśca kaḥ // Bca_9.88 //
T04bsa054_u:10303: tadā kāyābhāvāt kā strī kāminī yasyāḥ kamanīyatayā puruṣe rāgo bhavet?
T04bsa054_u:10304: kaśca pumān kāmukaḥ yasya rañjanīyatayā striyāṃ rāgo bhavet?
T04bsa054_u:10305: strī hi svātmani strīti saṃkalpya bahirdhā puruṣe puruṣa iti rāgaṃ janayati /
T04bsa054_u:10306: evaṃ puruṣo 'pi svātmani puruṣa iti saṃkalpya bahirdhā striyāṃ strīti rāgaṃ janayati /
T04bsa054_u:10307: kāyābhāve tu striyāṃ strīti na saṃvidyate,
T04bsa054_u:10310: na tat strī na puruṣa iti /
T04bsa054_u:10311: tasmādasati kāye stryādikalpanākṛto 'pi na yujyate rāgaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10322: ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ mahārāja puruṣa iti khalu punaretad yuktam /
T04bsa054_u:10334: cakṣuḥsparśāyatanaṃ rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya yāvanmanaḥsparśāyatanaṃ dharmāṇāṃ vijñānāya /
T04bsa054_u:10339: iha puruṣaḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyadaurmanasyopekṣāsthānīyāni rūpāṇyupavicarati /
T04bsa054_u:10346: tadyathā- keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā ityādi /
T04bsa054_u:10350: tatra mahārāja ādhyātmikaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ utpadyamāno na kutaścidāgacchati,
T04bsa054_u:10352: bhavati mahārāja samayo 'yaṃ yat strī adhyātmaṃ [ahaṃ] strīti kalpayati /
T04bsa054_u:10353: sā adhyātmamahaṃ strīti kalpayitvā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayati /
T04bsa054_u:10354: sā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayitvā saṃraktā satī bahirdhā puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃyogamākāṅkṣate /
T04bsa054_u:10370: iti hi mahārāja saṃkalpaṃ jñātvā kakkhaṭatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā kakkhaṭatvamutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchatīti /
T04bsa054_u:10373: tasya tat kakkhaṭatvaṃ saṃklidyamānaṃ saṃnirudhyamānaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ gacchati,
T04bsa054_u:10385: iti hi mahārāja pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātutvena nopalabhyate,
T04bsa054_u:10387: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10388: evaṃ mahārāja yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā draṣṭavyamiti /
T04bsa054_u:10393: evaṃ kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādya vedanāsmṛtyupasthānamupadarśayituṃ vedanāṃ vicārayannāha yadyastītyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10395: yadyasti duḥkhaṃ tattvena prahṛṣṭān kiṃ na vādhate /
T04bsa054_u:10396: śokādyārtāya mṛṣṭādi sukhaṃ cetkiṃ na rocate // Bca_9.89 //
T04bsa054_u:10415: na hi vastu satsvabhāvaṃ kadācidapi nivartitumutsahate /
T04bsa054_u:10417: yaduktaṃ prahṛṣṭān kiṃ na bādhate iti,
T04bsa054_u:10421: kiṃ tarhi samudbhūtavartinā sukhena tiraskṛtatvāt vidyamānamapi nānubhūyate,
T04bsa054_u:10423: sadapi yadi tadduḥkhaṃ nānubhūyate na vedyate ityucyate,
T04bsa054_u:10425: vedanātvaṃ kathaṃ tasya yasya nānubhavātmatā // Bca_9.90 //
T04bsa054_u:10426: vedanātvaṃ vedanāsvabhāvatvaṃ kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa tasyāvyaktasya sukhasya yasya nānubhavātmatā nānubhūyamānasvabhāvatā /
T04bsa054_u:10432: kiṃ tu sūkṣmatayā anubhūtamapi ananubhūtakalpamityatrāha astītyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10433: asti sūkṣmatayā duḥkhaṃ sthaulyaṃ tasya hṛtaṃ nanu /
T04bsa054_u:10438: prahṛṣṭāvasthāyāṃ pravṛttena balavatā sukhena sthaulyaṃ prābalyamasya duḥkhasya hatamabhibhūtam /
T04bsa054_u:10441: na hi sūkṣmatā nāma duḥkhasya sātānubhavakāle kācidupalabhyate /
T04bsa054_u:10443: atha tuṣṭimātrā aparā tasmādeva udbhūtavṛtteḥ sukhāt,
T04bsa054_u:10444: aparā tuṣṭimātrā dvitīyā sukhamātrā alpīyasī sukhakaṇikā syāt,
T04bsa054_u:10447: nanu sāpyasya sūkṣmatā sāpi tuṣṭimātrā aparā,
T04bsa054_u:10451: iti duḥkhasya sūkṣmatā avedyasvabhāvā sukhānubhavakāle nāstyeveti niścitam //
T04bsa054_u:10453: kiṃ tarhi kāraṇavaikalyāt kadācinnopalabhyate ityatrāha viruddhetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10456: duḥkhena viruddhasya sukhasya yaḥ pratyayo hetuḥ sparśaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:10462: tasyotpattau satyāṃ prahṛṣṭāvasthāyāṃ hetuvaikalyāt duḥkhasyānudayo duḥkhasyānutpattiśceducyate, tadā-
T04bsa054_u:10468: sa eva vedanā sukhā duḥkhā taditarā vā /
T04bsa054_u:10479: ahirmayūrasya sukhāya jāyate viṣaṃ viṣābhyāsavato rasāyanam /
T04bsa054_u:10480: bhavanti cānandaviśeṣahetavo mukhaṃ tudantaḥ karabhasya kaṇṭakāḥ //
T04bsa054_u:10482: vedanā abhiniveśasvabhāvatvādeva ca vicāreṇa nivartayituṃ śakyate ityāha ata evetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10484: ata eveti / yata eva abhiniveśasvabhāvā vedanā,
T04bsa054_u:10485: ata eva vicāro 'yaṃ vimarśo 'yaṃ pratipakṣo virodhī,
T04bsa054_u:10493: tasmin saṃbhūtaṃ jātaṃ dhyānaṃ viviktaṃ kāmaiḥ,
T04bsa054_u:10494: viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhamityādi /
T04bsa054_u:10501: sāṃprataṃ hetvanabhisaṃbhavādeva na vedanā vastusatī yuktetyāha sāntarāvityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10506: sparśāḥ ṣaṭ saṃnipātajāḥ [abhi. ko.-3.30] iti vacanāt /
T04bsa054_u:10507: sa trikasaṃnipātajaḥ sparśa eva na ghaṭate,
T04bsa054_u:10511: tadā saṃsargaḥ saṃnipāto melanaṃ kutaḥ kasmāt etayorindriyārthayoḥ?
T04bsa054_u:10514: vyavadhāne sati sa kathaṃ bhavet iti bhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10516: so 'pi na yujyate ityāha nirantaratve ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10519: evaṃ hi tayoḥ sarvātmanā nairantaryaṃ bhavet yadi aṇīyasāpi nāṃśena vyavadhānaṃ syāt sadharmatā ca /
T04bsa054_u:10522: ekatve sati bhedābhāvāt kiṃ kena saṃgataṃ syāt?
T04bsa054_u:10527: tatra ca saṃsargadūṣaṇe na kiṃciddūṣyate ityāha nāṇorityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10539: tāvatā siddhaṃ naḥ sādhyamityāha apraveśa iti-
T04bsa054_u:10540: apraveśe na miśratvamamiśratve na saṃgatiḥ // Bca_9.95 //
T04bsa054_u:10543: tathā ca tatsvarūpaṃ svātmanā vyāpnuvata eva tena saṃgatiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10545: tacca miśratvaṃ tatra praveśamantareṇa na bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:10546: itthamapraveśe praveśābhāve sati na miśratvaṃ nāsaṃbhinnarūpatvam /
T04bsa054_u:10547: amiśratve miśratvābhāve ca na saṃgatiḥ nāsaṅgaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:10548: niraṃśasya sarvathaiva saṃsargo na yujyate ityāha niraṃśasya cetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10557: tasya amūrtasya aṃśābhāve asattvameva prāptamiti bhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10558: na caitad bhavato 'pi pramāṇapratītaṃ kvacidastītyāha saṃsarga ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10559: saṃsarge ca niraṃśatvaṃ yadi dṛṣṭaṃ nidarśaya // Bca_9.96 //
T04bsa054_u:10574: iti trayāṇāmapi saṃsargamavadhūya saṃprati samūha eva vastusan nāsti iti pratipādayannāha samūhasyāpītyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10578: avastutvāt vasturahitatvāt aśvaviuṣāṇavat saṃsargo naiva yujyate iti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10586: tasmādevaṃ pratipāditakrameṇa sparśanābhāve trikasaṃparkābhāve vedanāsaṃbhavaḥ kutaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:10597: vedanāyā vicāreṇa niḥsvabhāvatvād bādhā avicārataḥ ātmādeḥ pūrvanirastatvādvedakābhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10603: saṃprati vedanābhāvāt tatpratyayā tṛṣṇāpi kāraṇavirahāt paramārthato notpādamarhatītyupadarśayitumāha yadā netyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10604: yadā na vedakaḥ kaścidvedanā ca na vidyate /
T04bsa054_u:10605: tadāvasthāmimāṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛṣṇe kiṃ na vidīryase // Bca_9.99 //
T04bsa054_u:10610: tadā avasthāmimāṃ evaṃvidhāṃ svajanmavikalāṃ dṛṣṭvā upalabhya tṛṣṇe kiṃ na vidīryase,
T04bsa054_u:10615: kenāyaṃ tarhi sukhasādhanatvādinā bhāveṣu dṛṣṭādivyavahāraḥ pravartate ityatrāha dṛśyate ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10620: evaṃ tarhi cittameva vedakaṃ vastusadastīti cedāha svapnamāyopamātmanā /
T04bsa054_u:10626: cittena sahotpannatvāt cittena saha janma yasya tasya darśanam,
T04bsa054_u:10628: na tu paramārthato darśanamasti yenaivaṃ dṛṣṭādivyavahāraḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10634: api tu jñānaṃ viṣayākāratayā tata utpadyamānamuttarakālaṃ tasya grāhakamucyate,
T04bsa054_u:10638: anyathā pūrvaṃ prāgbhāvi paścāduttarakālaṃ jātena utpannena jñānena smaryate nānubhūyate smṛtirūpeṇa viṣayīkriyate,
T04bsa054_u:10651: anyena tarhi sā jñānenānubhūyate vedanā? āha-
T04bsa054_u:10653: na ca naiva / anyena tatsamānakālabhāvinā jñānenānubhūyate,
T04bsa054_u:10656: na cāsti vedakaḥ kaścidvedanāto na tattvataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10660: ataḥ asmāt kāraṇāt vedanā anubhava iti vedanālakṣaṇaśūnyatvādvedanā na tattvataḥ na paramārthataḥ,
T04bsa054_u:10672: vedako vedanā vedyaḥ pṛthagbhūto na vidyate //
T04bsa054_u:10674: yathā bodhistathā hyeṣā śāntā śuddhā prabhāsvarā //
T04bsa054_u:10677: iti na kasyacit sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā svakīyaṃ bhavatītyāha nirātmaka ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10678: nirātmake kalāpe 'smin ka evaṃ bādhyate 'nayā // Bca_9.102 //
T04bsa054_u:10679: nirātmake kasyacidātmādervedakasyābhāvādasvāmike kalāpe ekasyānuyāyino 'bhāvāt pratītyasamutpannamātre 'smin māyāsvabhāvavadupalambhagocaratāmupagate
T04bsa054_u:10680: evamindrajālavat paśyan saṃjātavismayo brūte- ka evaṃ bādhyate 'nayā /
T04bsa054_u:10687: nendriyeṣu na rūpādau nāntarāle manaḥ sthitam /
T04bsa054_u:10689: tatra ṣaṣṭhaṃ tāvanmanovijñānaṃ nirūpayati- tathā kva punaridaṃ manovijñānaṃ svayamupasthitam?
T04bsa054_u:10690: tatra na tāvadindriyeṣu cakṣurādiṣu manaḥ sthitaṃ sthitimupagatam /
T04bsa054_u:10695: nāpyantarna madhye kāyasya cittaṃ nāpi bahiḥ na bāhyeṣu śarīrāvayaveṣu cittaṃ labhyate /
T04bsa054_u:10697: uktebhyaḥ sthānebhyaḥ anyatrāpi kkaciddeśāntare yatra tatra vā na labhyate,
T04bsa054_u:10700: tataḥ kathaṃ tasya niṣedha ityatrāha yanna kāye ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10701: yanna kāye na cānyatra na miśraṃ na pṛthak kvacit /
T04bsa054_u:10702: tanna kiṃcidataḥ sattvāḥ prakṛtyā parinirvṛtāḥ // Bca_9.104 //
T04bsa054_u:10710: nāpi pṛthak svātantryeṇa ca kvacidavasthitaṃ yaccittam,
T04bsa054_u:10715: ataḥ asmāt kāraṇāt sattvāḥ prāṇinaḥ prakṛtyā svabhāvena parinirvṛtāḥ parimuktasvabhāvāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10717: svayameva tu abhūtaparikalpavaśādasatyapi satyamāropya kleśavāsanopahatacittasaṃtatayaḥ saṃsāracārakāvarodhaniṣiddhasvātantryavṛttayo 'parimuktā ityucyante na tu paramārthataḥ //
T04bsa054_u:10718: iti mano vicārya cakṣurādivijñānaṃ vicārayannāha jñeyādityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10720: jñeyena saha cejjñānaṃ kimālambyāsya saṃbhavaḥ // Bca_9.105 //
T04bsa054_u:10721: tathā hi na kvacit sadā sadrūpamavasthitaṃ jñānam,
T04bsa054_u:10722: kiṃ tu cakṣurādisāmagrīṃ pratītya utpadyamānaṃ rūpādijñeyagrāhakamityucyate,
T04bsa054_u:10723: iti parasyāśayamāśaṅkaya vikalpayati- tat punarjñeyāt pūrvaṃ vā syāt,
T04bsa054_u:10730: pūrvaṃ jñeyamālambanamantareṇa kimālambya kimāśritya asya saṃbhava utpādaḥ?
T04bsa054_u:10731: dvitīyapakṣamāśrityāha- jñeyena grāhyaviṣayeṇa saha samānakālaṃ cedyadi jñānam,
T04bsa054_u:10736: atha jñeyādbhavet paścāt tadā jñānaṃ kuto bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:10740: paścāt tadanantaraṃ nivṛtte jñeye bhavet utpadyeta jñānam,
T04bsa054_u:10747: sa evaṃ cittaṃ parigaveṣate- katarat taccittaṃ rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā?
T04bsa054_u:10753: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyate /
T04bsa054_u:10763: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa māyāsadṛśamabhūtakalpanatayā vividhāmupapattiṃ parigṛhṇāti /
T04bsa054_u:10766: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa dīpārciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate /
T04bsa054_u:10772: yāvat cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate /
T04bsa054_u:10777: yat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ tannaivāsti na nasti ityādi //
T04bsa054_u:10778: evaṃ cittasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādya dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādayitumuktameva kramaṃ yojayannāha evaṃ cetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10781: evameva yathoditanyāyena sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvabhāvānāmutpattirutpādo nāvasīyate na pratīyate /
T04bsa054_u:10782: teṣāmapi svahetutaḥ pūrvaṃ samānakālaṃ paścādvā utpattau idameva dūṣaṇaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vācyam /
T04bsa054_u:10785: ata eva ca anutpannāniruddhasvabhāvatayā niṣprapañcatvāt sarvadharmā vimokśābhimukhā
T04bsa054_u:10786: dharmadhātuniryātā ākāśadhātuparyavasānā aprajñaptikā avyavahārā anabhilāpyā anabhilapanīyā ityucyante /
T04bsa054_u:10789: dharme dharmānupaśyī viharan bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
T04bsa054_u:10795: sa sarvadharmeṣu sarvakleśeṣu ca kṛtrimasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate- niṣkleśā ete dharmā naite sakleśāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10809: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā /
T04bsa054_u:10815: evaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ darśayatā sarvadharmā anutpannāniruddhāḥ prakāśitāḥ //
T04bsa054_u:10817: tataḥ satyadvayavyavasthāpanaṃ na ghaṭate iti parihartuṃ codyamutthāpayannāha yadyevamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10824: tataḥ saṃvṛterabhāvāt satyadvayaṃ saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ ceti yaduktam-
T04bsa054_u:10826: iti, tadetat satyadvayaṃ kutaḥ? naiva syāt /
T04bsa054_u:10830: tathā marīcikādiṣu jalakalpanayeva saṃvṛtisvabhāvayā kalpanayā buddhyā vyavasthāpyate,
T04bsa054_u:10843: yo 'pi tarhi sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatālakṣaṇaṃ paramārthasatyamadhigamya anupalambhayogena sarvaprapañcavirahāt parinirvṛtimupayātaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:10844: so 'pi sattvaḥ parinirvṛto vinirmuktaḥ kuto bhavet? naiva syāt /
T04bsa054_u:10847: buddhiḥ saṃvṛtirucyate iti vacanāt nirvṛtirapi saṃvṛtiḥ syāt //
T04bsa054_u:10850: parasya nirvṛtasattvādanyasya sattvasya cittaṃ tasyāsau vikalpaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:10857: svasaṃvṛtyā nijasaṃvṛtyā svakalpanayā sa iti parinirvṛto nāsti, na vidyate /
T04bsa054_u:10858: parinirvṛta eva saḥ iti svayamasya sarvavikalpoparamāt /
T04bsa054_u:10859: anyatrāpi tarhi kathamanyasaṃvṛtiḥ syādityatrāha sa paścādityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10860: sa paścānniyataḥ so 'sti na cennāstyeva saṃvṛtiḥ // Bca_9.108 //
T04bsa054_u:10863: iti dharmebhyo dharma utpadyamānaḥ paścādbhāvī bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:10870: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadi nāma parinirvṛto buddhyā viṣayīkṛtaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:10873: na raktacittenālambitaḥ svayaṃ prahīṇasarvakleśāvaraṇo vītarāgo 'pyavītarāgo bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:10874: tasmāt sarvakalpanāvirahādanyasaṃvṛtyālambito 'pi svayaṃ parinirvṛta evāsau paramārthataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10875: ata eva sarvadharmāḥ sarvakalpanāśūnyatvādanutpannāniruddhasvabhāvatvācca prakṛtiparinirvṛtā ādiśāntā ityucyante /
T04bsa054_u:10876: tathāpi tathāvidhebhya eva tathāvidhā anye dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante ca /
T04bsa054_u:10878: tena ca rūpeṇa parikalpavaśāt punarālambyamānāḥ sāṃvṛtāḥ,
T04bsa054_u:10880: śūnyebhya eva śūnyā dharmāḥ prabhavanti dharmebhyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10888: yatha muñca pratītya balvajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
T04bsa054_u:10889: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣu ekaikaśa nāsti vartanā //
T04bsa054_u:10892: mudrāt pratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na copalabhyate /
T04bsa054_u:10893: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato eva saṃskāra anuchedaśāśvatāḥ // * * * * *
T04bsa054_u:10894: araṇiṃ yatha cottarāraṇiṃ hastavyāyāma trayebhi saṃgati /
T04bsa054_u:10895: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtārthu laghu nirudhyate //
T04bsa054_u:10896: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kutayaṃ āgatu kutra yāti vā /
T04bsa054_u:10897: vidiśo diśi sarvi mārgato nāgati nāsya gatiśca labhyate //
T04bsa054_u:10898: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ tṛṣṇa avidyā iti karmapratyayā /
T04bsa054_u:10899: sāmagri tu sattvasucanā sa ca paramārthatu nopalabhyate //
T04bsa054_u:10908: svapnavat saṃsṛtiḥ proktā tvayā tattvavidāṃ vara //
T04bsa054_u:10910: tasmāt paramārthata utpādanirodhābhāve 'pi na saṃvṛtisatyavirodha iti sarvaṃ samañjasam //
T04bsa054_u:10912: tadā na jñānaṃ na ca jñeyaṃ vastutaḥ saṃbhavati /
T04bsa054_u:10913: tat kimiha kena vicāryate iti vicāro 'pi na syāt /
T04bsa054_u:10923: yathāprasiddhaṃ lokavyavahārato niścitamāśritya gṛhītvā vicāro vimarśaḥ sarva ucyate abhidhīyate /
T04bsa054_u:10924: sarva iti na kaścideva vicāro 'pi saṃvṛtimāśritya pratanyate,
T04bsa054_u:10931: vicāritena tu parīkṣitena punaryadā vicāreṇa vicāryate nirūpyate,
T04bsa054_u:10936: vicārye tarhi vicāryamāṇe kathamiyamanavasthā na syādityatrāha vicārite ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10939: vicārye tu parīkṣye punarvastuni vicārite nirṇīte sati vicārasya nirṇayasya punaruttarakālaṃ kartavyasya āśrayo nāsti,
T04bsa054_u:10948: sarvavyavahāranivṛtteḥ sarvatra nirvyāpāratayā praśāntatvāt tadeva nirvāṇamabhidhīyate //
T04bsa054_u:10949: kalpitaviṣaye 'vaśyameva sarvatra vicāraḥ satyo na tu paramārthata ityāha yasya tvityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10951: yasya punaḥ paramārthasadbhāvavādinaḥ etaddūyaṃ vicāro vicāryaṃ ceti etadubhayamapi satyaṃ paramārthasat,
T04bsa054_u:10952: sa eva bhāvasvabhāvavādī atyantaduḥsthitaḥ atyantamatiśayena duḥkhena sthito duḥsthitaḥ duṣkaraṇīyatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:10954: yadi jñānavaśādartho jñānāstitve tu kā gatiḥ // Bca_9.112 //
T04bsa054_u:10955: yadi jñānavaśāt jñānasya pramāṇasya vaśāt sāmarthyāt arthaḥ prameyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
T04bsa054_u:10959: jñānasya pramāṇasya punarastitvaṃ kuto niścitamiti vaktavyam /
T04bsa054_u:10960: svasaṃvedanasyābhāvāt pramāṇāntarānveṣaṇe anavasthānaṃ syāditi kā gatirāśrayaṇīyā?
T04bsa054_u:10965: atha jñeyavaśājjñānaṃ jñeyāstitve tu kā gatiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10967: atha jñeyasya prameyasya vaśāt jñānaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
T04bsa054_u:10970: tadā svayameva jñeyaṃ jñānāstitve vyavasthānibandhanaṃ syāt,
T04bsa054_u:10971: tacca kutaḥ pramāṇāt siddhamiti pṛcchati- jñeyāstitve punaḥ kā gatiriti /
T04bsa054_u:10972: prameyasiddhaye jñānāntarānusaraṇe tadapi jñānāntaraṃ kutaḥ siddhamiti vaktavyam /
T04bsa054_u:10976: syādetat- bhavedetat yadi jñānasya jñeyasya vā siddhaye jñānāntarāpekṣā syāt,
T04bsa054_u:10980: atha punarevamabhidhīyate- anyonyasya jñānasya jñeyasya parasparasya vaśāt sāmarthyāt jñānajñeyayorapi sattvamastitvaṃ niścīyate jñānavaśājjñeyasya jñeyavaśācca jñānasyeti yāvat /
T04bsa054_u:10986: pitā cenna vinā putrātkutaḥ putrasya saṃbhavaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10989: pitā janakaḥ yadi putraṃ vinā putramantareṇa na syāt,
T04bsa054_u:10992: kutaḥ kasmāt piturabhāvāt putrasya janyasya saṃbhavaḥ janma astu?
T04bsa054_u:10995: yataḥ putrasya abhāve asattve pitā nāsti na bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:11001: ataḥ itaretarāśrayaṇādekābhāvādanyatarābhāvaḥ syāditi dvayorapyanayorabhāva iti samudāyārthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11007: jñānaparicchedyatayā ca jñeyamiti yāvat jñānaṃ na sidhyati,
T04bsa054_u:11009: tāvat paricchedyatayā ca jñeyaṃ na sidhyati /
T04bsa054_u:11011: syādetat- na brūmaḥ- anyonyavaśāt siddhiranayoḥ api tu jñeyakāryaṃ jñānam,
T04bsa054_u:11015: jñeyājjñānena jātena tatsattā kiṃ na gamyate // Bca_9.115 //
T04bsa054_u:11017: bījaṃ tenaiva bījājjātena aṅkureṇa sūcyate gamyate yathā,
T04bsa054_u:11018: tathā atra jñeyāt prameyāt jñānena jātena utpannena tatsattā tasya jñeyasya sattā sadbhāvaḥ kiṃ na gamyate,
T04bsa054_u:11023: jñānāstitvaṃ kuto jñātaṃ jñeyaṃ yattena gamyate // Bca_9.116 //
T04bsa054_u:11026: kiṃ tarhi anyato jñānādaṅkuravyatiriktāt tadastīti gamyate /
T04bsa054_u:11027: tathā hi- na yogyatāmātreṇa kāryaṃ kāraṇasya gamakam,
T04bsa054_u:11031: ataḥ prākpratipannakāryakāraṇabhāvasya punaḥ paścāt kkacid bījāvinābhāvinamaṅkuramupalabdhavataḥ aṅkurādadhyavasāyātmakamanumānamutpadyate,
T04bsa054_u:11034: jñānāstitvaṃ jñānasya sadbhāvaḥ kuto jñātaṃ kasmāt pratītam?
T04bsa054_u:11037: yad yasmāt jñeyaṃ tena jñānena jñeyakāryeṇa gamyate avasīyate /
T04bsa054_u:11042: kālpanikapakṣe tu yathāprasiddhavyavahāramāśritya śakyate iti niścitam //
T04bsa054_u:11043: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11044: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana //
T04bsa054_u:11046: ityasyārthasya samarthanārthaṃ nāpyahetuta iti turīyakoṭiprasādhanāya tāvat svabhāvavādimatamapākartumāha loka ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:11048: tathā hi te svaparasvabhāvasarvahetunirapekṣameva bhāvagrāmavaicitryamutpadyate iti varṇayanti /
T04bsa054_u:11050: na ca cetano 'pi kaścidanyaḥ karmaṇā tādṛśanirmāṇapravīṇa upalabhyate,
T04bsa054_u:11053: tasmāt kiṃcitkāraṇamantareṇaiva sarvamidaṃ jagadvaicitryamutpadyate iti teṣāṃ matam, taduktam-
T04bsa054_u:11073: padmasya rājīvasya nālamādi yeṣāṃ padmadalakesarādīnāṃ te tathoktāḥ,
T04bsa054_u:11076: hetubhedena hetoḥ kāraṇasya bhedena viśeṣeṇa jāyate utpadyate, nānyathā /
T04bsa054_u:11083: nanu bhavedeṣa viśeṣaḥ yadi hetoreva svayamasau viśeṣaḥ siddhaḥ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:11084: kiṃ tu tasyaiva kutaḥ sa bhavatīti vaktavyam /
T04bsa054_u:11089: kiṃkṛtaḥ kena kṛtaḥ kuto yātaḥ hetubhedaścet,
T04bsa054_u:11091: pūrvahetuprabhedataḥ pūrvasya prāktanasya tajjanakasya hetoḥ prabhedataḥ prabhedādviśeṣāt /
T04bsa054_u:11092: tasyāpi tatpūrvasya hetoḥ kuto viśeṣa iti cet,
T04bsa054_u:11094: iti uttarottarasya viśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ pūrvapūrvasya viśeṣādityuttaraṃ vācyam /
T04bsa054_u:11095: na caivamanavasthānamaniṣṭaṃ kiṃcidāpādayati- anavarāgrasya saṃsārasya pūrvakoṭirna prajñāyate ityabhyupagamāt /
T04bsa054_u:11096: ata eva phalāviparyayo 'pi na svato bhavatītyāha kasmāccedityādi-
T04bsa054_u:11099: pūrvahetuprabhāvataḥ pūrvasya tajjanakasya hetoḥ sāmarthyāt svahetunā sa tādṛśastatsvabhāvo
T04bsa054_u:11108: hetuvyāpāreṇa tat prasādhayataḥ svayameva punaḥ sahetukatvābhyupagamāt vandhyā me
T04bsa054_u:11109: māteti bruvataḥ iva pratijñāyāḥ svavacanena bādhanaṃ syāt ityubhayataḥpāśā rajjuriti
T04bsa054_u:11111: na heturastīti vadan sahetukaṃ nanu pratijñāṃ svayameva śātayet /
T04bsa054_u:11112: athāpi hetupraṇayālaso bhavet pratijñayā kevalayāsya kiṃ bhavet //
T04bsa054_u:11115: evaṃ svabhāvavādinaṃ nirākṛtya caturthaprakāraprasādhanārthameva īśvarakāraṇatāṃ jagataḥ pratyākhyātuṃ tadupakṣepaṃ kurvannāha īśvara ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:11117: īśvarakāraṇavādino hi svabhāvavādimataniṣedhamākarṇya viśeṣamabhidhātumardhamavasitaṃ bhārasyeti manyamānāḥ prāhuḥ- sāhāyyameva anuṣṭhitamevaṃ bhavadbhiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11120: kevalamacetanāḥ punaramī jalapaṅkādayo vaicitryāsāmarthyā iti yuktamanenoktam /
T04bsa054_u:11121: tatra astyeva sa bhagavān viśvavaicitryanirmāṇapravīṇaḥ jagadekasūtradhāraḥ sakalajagadādibhūtaḥ
T04bsa054_u:11124: tena hetunā sahetukaṃ sakalamidaṃ sacarācaraṃ jagaditi kaḥ sacetanaḥ anyathā vaktumutsahate?
T04bsa054_u:11125: iti naiyāyikādiveśmakathāmabhidhāya pratyācaṣṭe- īśvaro jagato hetuḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11127: sa eva jagato viśvasya hetuḥ sṛṣṭisthitipralayakāraṇam /
T04bsa054_u:11129: anyathā punaracetanopādānatvāt kathamamī girisaridavanisāgarādaya utpattibhājo bhaveyuḥ?
T04bsa054_u:11141: naitaducyamānamapi svasamayābhiniveśināṃ jaḍadhiyāṃ prītikaraṃ pramāṇaśūnyaṃ viduṣāṃ saṃtoṣamutpādayati /
T04bsa054_u:11144: tathā ca sati kāruṇikatvaṃ tasya śraddhāsamadhigamyameva syāt /
T04bsa054_u:11147: tat karma kāruṇikaḥ kimiti kārayati yenāniṣṭaṃ phalamupabhujyate,
T04bsa054_u:11150: api ca kiṃ tasminnavyāpriyamāṇe tat karmaphalamupabhujyate na vā?
T04bsa054_u:11160: atha kṛtasya karmaṇo 'vipraṇāśādavaśyaṃ tena tatphalamanubhavitavyamiti tadupabhogāya vyāpriyate iti cet,
T04bsa054_u:11165: evaṃ hi tadicchāyattavṛttitayā tasyāparipākāt tena svamaiśvaryamupadarśitaṃ tatra bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:11167: mahad bata anena svamaiśvaryamitthaṃ dyotitamanyatra syāt /
T04bsa054_u:11168: tat parakarmaṇāpi samākṛṣṭo nāma nātmani vaśitvamadhigacchati,
T04bsa054_u:11169: īśvarataḥ karmaṇa eva mahat sāmarthyamevaṃ prakāśitaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:11170: tadvaraṃ karmaiva paryupāsyaṃ yatsāmarthyena samākṛṣyamāṇo maheśvaro 'pi sthātumasamarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11172: namaḥ satkarmabhyo vidhirapi na yebhyaḥ prabhavati //
T04bsa054_u:11177: tadā yadi nāma dayāvirahāt sukhaṃ nopanayati,
T04bsa054_u:11185: rāgādimatāmapi tāvajjitendriyāṇāṃ na krīḍārthaṃ dṛśyate pravṛttiḥ,
T04bsa054_u:11187: na rakṣaḥpiśācādimantareṇa anyasya paraduḥkhena krīḍā saṃbhāvyate //
T04bsa054_u:11198: na hi svasthātmā niraparādhaṃ janaṃ pīḍayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11201: tathābhūtamapi kārayitvā punaḥ pīḍayatīti sa laukikeśvarāṇāmapi jaghanyatayā vṛttimatiśete /
T04bsa054_u:11205: tadā asādhu tadārādhane svargāpavargārthināṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11207: tathā hi svargādilipsayā tadārādhanāya pravartante prekṣāvantaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11216: tadayamabhivicāryamāṇo na kvacidavasānaṃ labhate iti alaṃ durmativiṣyanditeṣu ādareṇeti /
T04bsa054_u:11219: sukhasya duḥkhasya na ko 'pi dātā paro dadātīti kubuddhireṣā /
T04bsa054_u:11222: tasmādakartṛkameva idaṃ jagadaśeṣamiti na paridṛṣṭakāraṇādanyaḥ svatantraścetano vā tasya kartā kaścidasti /
T04bsa054_u:11225: īśvarakāraṇavādinaṃ pṛcchati- vada brūhi ko 'yamīśvaro bhavato 'bhimataḥ?
T04bsa054_u:11228: na ca anupalabdhānvayavyatirekavyāpārasya kāraṇatā prakalpayituṃ yuktā,
T04bsa054_u:11231: na cānyasya kṣitibījādivyatiriktasya anvayavyatirekānuvidhānaṃ kurvat dṛśyate kāryam /
T04bsa054_u:11232: tat kathaṃ tasya kāryopayogitvaṃ vyavasthāpyate? yaduktam-
T04bsa054_u:11236: atha pṛthivyādīni bhūtānyeva īśvaro bhavatviti parābhiprāyamāśaṅkayāha bhūtāni cedityādi-
T04bsa054_u:11237: bhūtāni cedbhavatvevaṃ nāmamātre 'pi kiṃ śramaḥ // Bca_9.119 //
T04bsa054_u:11247: nāmamātre eva kimiha mahāsamārambheṇa tatprasādhanāya śramaḥ āyāsaḥ kriyate?
T04bsa054_u:11249: tvayā punastānyeva bhūtāni īśvaraḥ iti nārthataḥ kaścidviśeṣaḥ?
T04bsa054_u:11253: api tvaneke 'nityāśca niśceṣṭā na ca devatāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11254: laṅghayāścāśucayaścaiva kṣmādayo na sa īśvaraḥ // Bca_9.120 //
T04bsa054_u:11268: (Bcp 257) kṣmādayaḥ kṣmā pṛthivī ādiryeṣāmaptejovāyūnāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11281: pūrvameva vistareṇa ātmanaḥ pratiṣiddhatvāt niḥsvabhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇavadasau /
T04bsa054_u:11282: athāpi syāt- avitarkyamāhātmyatvādasya nārvāgdarśanairidamitthamiti tatsvarūpaṃ vivecayituṃ śakyamityāha acintyasyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:11285: tadā acintyasya ca cintāpathamatikrāntasya īśvarasya kartṛtvaṃ yugapatkāraṇatvamapi acintyamatarkyaṃ kimucyate,
T04bsa054_u:11294: tena īśvareṇa acintyamāhātmyena kiṃ kāryaṃ straṣṭuṃ nirmātumiṣṭamabhipretaṃ ca,
T04bsa054_u:11301: nanu bhoḥ, asāvātmā dhruvo nityo 'bhimato bhavatām /
T04bsa054_u:11303: anyathā nitya eva sa na syāt /
T04bsa054_u:11305: anyatrāpi na tasya sṛṣṭivyāpāra upalakśyate ityāha kṣmādītyādi-
T04bsa054_u:11306: kṣmādisvabhāva īśaśca jñānaṃ jñeyādanādi ca // Bca_9.122 //
T04bsa054_u:11315: īśvaro 'pi dhruvaḥ iti ātmānamasau na karoti /
T04bsa054_u:11321: karmaṇaḥ śubhāśubhāt yathāsaṃbhavaṃ sukhaduḥkhe ca bhavataḥ iṣṭāniṣṭavipākaje,
T04bsa054_u:11322: tatrāpi na tasya vyāpāraḥ / evaṃ sati-
T04bsa054_u:11328: hetorādirna cedasti phalasyādiḥ kuto bhavet // Bca_9.123 //
T04bsa054_u:11329: tathāhi asau nityo vā jagato hetuḥ syādanityo vā?
T04bsa054_u:11331: tatra nityatve sati hetoḥ kāraṇasya ādirnāsti,
T04bsa054_u:11335: nityamupasthite samarthasvabhāve hetau kāryamapi tajjanyamajastrameva jāyeta /
T04bsa054_u:11336: iti tatsāmarthyapratibaddhaṃ kāryaṃ sadā prāpnoti / tat-
T04bsa054_u:11338: kasmāt kāraṇāt sadā sarvakālaṃ na kurute?
T04bsa054_u:11339: na sarvaṃ kāryaṃ janayatīti kathaṃ kasyacit kāryasya kadācit kriyāvirāmaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:11340: athavā / anyathāvatāryate- yadi ca neśvaro jagataḥ kartā syāt,
T04bsa054_u:11343: tataśca hetoḥ kleśakarmādilakṣaṇasya ādiḥ pūrvakoṭiḥ na cedasti,
T04bsa054_u:11344: phalasya sattvabhājanalokavivartādilakṣaṇasya ādiḥ prathamārambhaḥ kuto bhavet?
T04bsa054_u:11346: anādau saṃsāre hi sattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena sthitisaṃvartavivartānāṃ pravartanāt /
T04bsa054_u:11350: pralayakāle 'pi tasyānupahatatayā māhātmyasyābhyupagamāt phalasya tatkṛtasya sargādilakṣaṇasya ādiḥ kuto bhavet?
T04bsa054_u:11351: nityatayā tatkāraṇasya sadā samarthatvāt sargādikamapi nityameva syāt /
T04bsa054_u:11352: ato nityasamarthe tasmin sargāderādireva na syāt /
T04bsa054_u:11353: tataḥ kathaṃ sargasyādāvapi tadvayāpāro bhavet? api ca /
T04bsa054_u:11365: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma asau sadā samarthasvabhāvaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:11373: na hi nityatayā anādheyātiśayasya kācidapekṣā nāma /
T04bsa054_u:11381: tathāpi te nityā vā syuranityā vā?
T04bsa054_u:11394: tena kāraṇena tadāyattavṛttīnāṃ sahakāriṇāṃ sadāsaṃnihitatvādasau nityaḥ kartā kimapekṣatām?
T04bsa054_u:11396: itthaṃ na kācidapi tasyāpekśāstīti sadā kāryaṃ kurvīta //
T04bsa054_u:11400: tadasya nimittakāraṇatvāt sāmagrīmapekṣya kāryaṃ kurvato noktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ iti parāśayamāśaṅkayāha apekṣata ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:11402: yadi nāma asau sadā sarvakāryāṇi kartuṃ samarthaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:11404: na hi sāmagrīmantareṇa satyapi samarthe kartari kāryamutpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:11405: yathā kila paṭotpādanasamarthe 'pi kvaciddhetau turītantuvemādikamantareṇa na paṭa utpadyate,
T04bsa054_u:11416: svarūpaṃ cāsya prāgapi samarthaṃ tadeveti kathaṃ kadācit kriyāvirāmaḥ?
T04bsa054_u:11421: anyathāpi teṣāmapi pūrvaṃ tatsāmarthyasadbhāve tatkriyāprasaṅgo na nivartate iti sādhyavikalo (Bcp 260) dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11424: sa ca sarvadā saṃnihitasvabhāva iti kathaṃ kadācit sāmagrīvaikalyamapyasya?
T04bsa054_u:11436: na ca avidyamānasvabhāve vandhyāsuta iva kiṃcit kartuṃ śakyate nīrūpatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:11461: evaṃ kurvataḥ kāryamabhinirvartayataḥ sataḥ tasya kuta īśatā,
T04bsa054_u:11463: etena yaduktaṃ kenacit- buddhimattvādīśvarasya naiṣa doṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11468: tathā hi tā api icchāḥ svasattāmātranibandhanāḥ kiṃ na karotīti sa eva tasyopālambhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11471: kiṃ tāsāṃ viyoge 'pi na karoti atha asahakārivaikalye 'pi kāryākaraṇe sarvadā tadāyattaḥ?
T04bsa054_u:11473: tathā tadbhāve 'pi sarvakāryaṃ kiṃ na karoti?
T04bsa054_u:11482: samartho 'pyeṣa prakṛtyā sahakāriṇāmasaṃnidhau nava kāraka iti cet,
T04bsa054_u:11483: mātāpi satī prakṛtyā bandhyā ityetadapi tarhi devānāṃ priyeṇa vaktavyamityāstāṃ tāvat /
T04bsa054_u:11485: tathā ca sati anyasādhāraṇasvabhāvasya kathamīśatvamiti neśvarakāryaṃ jagadvaicitryamiti siddham //
T04bsa054_u:11487: tarhi nityaparamāṇupuñjamayaṃ dvayaṇukādikrameṇotthaṃ kṣititaruparvatādikaṃ bhavatvityāha ye 'pītyādi-
T04bsa054_u:11489: ye 'pi mīmāṃsakādivādino nityānaṇūn paramāṇunāhuḥ jagadvaicitryakāraṇatvena bruvate,
T04bsa054_u:11490: te 'pi vādinaḥ pūrvam “aṃśā apyaṇubhedena” [9.87]ityādinā paramāṇuvicārasamaye tatpratiṣedhānnivāritā nirākṛtāḥ ato nityaparamāṇumayamapi nedaṃ jagat //
T04bsa054_u:11491: evamīśvarakāraṇatāṃ ślokārdhena antarāle eva nityaparamāṇusvabhāvatāṃ ca jagato nirasya
T04bsa054_u:11492: tasyaiva turyaprakārasya samarthanāya pradhānapariṇāmarūpatāṃ nirākartuṃ sāṃkhyamatamudbhāvayannāha sāṃkhyā ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:11493: sāṃkhyāḥ pradhānamicchanti nityaṃ lokasya kāraṇam // Bca_9.127 //
T04bsa054_u:11494: sāṃkhyāḥ kāpilāḥ pradhānaṃ prakṛtirityaparanāmadheyam icchanti manyante nityaṃ lokasya kāraṇam /
T04bsa054_u:11495: tacca nityamavinaśvarasvabhāvaṃ lokasya sarvasya carācarasya jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ pariṇāmarūpeṇa hetumicchanti //
T04bsa054_u:11499: sattvaṃ rajastamaśceti ete trayo guṇā aviṣamaṃ sthitāḥ sāmyāvasthāṃ prāptāḥ pradhānamiti kathyante,
T04bsa054_u:11517: ṣoḍaśaka iti ekādaśendriyāṇi pañca ca tanmātrāṇi /
T04bsa054_u:11520: śrotraṃ tvakū cakṣū rasanaṃ ghrāṇaṃ ceti /
T04bsa054_u:11524: pañcabhyaḥ śabdādibhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni bhavanti pañca bhūtāni ca ākāśavāyutejojalapṛthivyākhyāni /
T04bsa054_u:11526: mahadahaṃkārau śabdādayaśca pañca kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca /
T04bsa054_u:11527: ekādaśendriyāṇi ākāśādayaśca pañca kāryameva na kāraṇam /
T04bsa054_u:11530: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:11540: evaṃ kila pradhānāt kāryarūpeṇa jagadvivartaḥ pravartate iti kāpilāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11541: tadevaṃ tat sarvamākāśe viracitacitramiva pratibhāsate iti manyamānaḥ siddhāntavādī dūṣayitumāha ekasyeti-
T04bsa054_u:11543: ekasya sataḥ pradhānasya trisvabhāvatvaṃ sattvarajastamobhedena tryātmakatvamayuktamasaṃgatam /
T04bsa054_u:11550: evaṃ guṇā na vidyante pratyekaṃ te 'pi hi tridhā // Bca_9.129 //
T04bsa054_u:11551: evameva pradhānavat guṇāḥ sattvarajastamorūpā na vidyante /
T04bsa054_u:11555: tathā hi sarvaṃ triguṇātmakaṃ bruvatāṃ pratyekaṃ guṇā api svarūpeṇa triguṇātmakāḥ prāpnuvanti /
T04bsa054_u:11556: tathā tadguṇā api triguṇātmakatayā naikasvabhāvā vidyante //
T04bsa054_u:11557: yadā caivaṃ vicārayato guṇā na santi,
T04bsa054_u:11558: tadā tadvivartarūpāḥ śabdādayo 'pi na yujyante ityāha guṇābhāve ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:11572: yaśca sattvādīnāṃ sukhādirūpatāmupapādayituṃ tatpariṇāmasya rūpādino vyaktasya sukhādyanvayo heturuktaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:11577: vastrādau acitsvabhāve paṭādau sukhāderapi cidātmakasya tādātmyenāsaṃbhavaḥ abhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11579: te ca guṇā na hi santi /
T04bsa054_u:11581: athāpi syāt- na sukhādyātmakatayā parādayaḥ sukhādisvabhāvā ucyante,
T04bsa054_u:11584: tasya sukhāderheturūpāḥ kāraṇasvabhāvā bhāvā bāhyāḥ paṭādayaścenmatam,
T04bsa054_u:11590: tat ke ime bhāvāḥ sukhādiheturūpā bhaviṣyanti? api ca /
T04bsa054_u:11591: vyaktasya sukhādisvabhāvatve paṭādaya eva sukhādijanyāḥ syurityāha sukhādyevetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:11607: paṭādikāryatvāt sukhādyapi na syāditi tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt sukhādestatkāryatvam /
T04bsa054_u:11618: satyāmeva sukhavyaktau saṃvittiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate /
T04bsa054_u:11623: ekadā bhūtāyāṃ sukhavyaktau sukhasya nityatve sati /
T04bsa054_u:11625: sukhasya saṃvedanaṃ sarvadā kiṃ na syāt?
T04bsa054_u:11627: tasmāt kadācidanupalabhyamānaṃ tat tadā nāstīti niścitamiti kathaṃ nityatvam?
T04bsa054_u:11631: tadeva sūkṣmatāṃ yāti sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca tatkatham // Bca_9.133 //
T04bsa054_u:11636: kutaḥ? yad yasmāt sthūlaṃ vyaktasvabhāvaṃ sat,
T04bsa054_u:11639: nitya tayā nānāsvabhāvatā ekasya na yukteti bhāvaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:11640: athāpi syāt- ekadā parasparaviruddhayorekasminnayogaḥ pūrvadharmanivṛttau tu dharmāntarotpatterna doṣa ityāha sthaulyamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:11642: sthaulyamāvirbhāvarūpatāṃ tyaktvā parityajya bhavet sūkṣmaṃ tirohitarūpaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:11643: evamabhyupagame sati anitye sthaulyasūkṣmate utpādavināśālīḍhatvādadhruve sthaulyasūkṣmate syātām /
T04bsa054_u:11651: anyathā kathaṃcit kenacidrūpeṇa avasthānāt pūrvavat punarupalabdheḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11658: tathā hi tat sthaulyaṃ sukhādbhinnamabhinnaṃ vā syāt /
T04bsa054_u:11660: tadā tasmin nivṛtte 'pi pūrvavat sukhasaṃvedanaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:11663: na ca satyapi saṃbandhe akāraṇasya nivṛttau anyasya nivṛttiryujyate,
T04bsa054_u:11672: yadi sthaulyaṃ sukhādanyat bhinnaṃ na bhavati,
T04bsa054_u:11675: tatsvabhāvatayā sthaulyasya nivṛttau sukhasya vinivṛtteḥ sukhasya anityatā vinaśvaratā sphuṭaṃ niścitam //
T04bsa054_u:11693: anabhilāṣiṇo 'pi te tava sadutpattivādinaḥ sthitā āpannā /
T04bsa054_u:11694: anyathā prāgapi tasya sadbhāve paścādvat pūrvamapi tadupalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11698: api ca / satkāryavādinaḥ kāraṇāvasthāyāṃ kāryasadbhāvāt idamapi dūṣaṇamaparamāśaṅkayate ityāha annāda ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:11700: annamattītyannādaḥ annabhakṣakaḥ amedhyabhakṣaḥ syāt aśucibhoktā bhavet / katham?
T04bsa054_u:11706: kiṃ ca idamapi satkāryavādinaḥ prasaṅgāntaramāsañjayannāha paṭārgheṇetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:11709: karpāsabīje kāraṇe bhaviṣyataḥ paṭasya kāryasya sadbhāvāt paṭasyārgheṇa mūlyena karpāsabījaṃ krītvā gṛhītvā nivasyatāṃ paridhīyatām //
T04bsa054_u:11710: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma paramārthataḥ kāraṇe kāryamasti,
T04bsa054_u:11711: tathāpi nāyaṃ saṃvṛtyavidyātimiropahatalocanaḥ sāṃvyavahāriko lokaḥ paśyatītyāśaṅkayannāha mohādityādi-
T04bsa054_u:11714: mohādajñānāt sadapi vastutattvaṃ nekṣate na paśyati lokaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11718: yadi nāma na loko 'paśyaṃstathā vyavahāraṃ karoti,
T04bsa054_u:11721: yataḥ tattvajñasyāpi kāraṇe kāryamastīti paramārthavedino 'pi sāṃkhyasya sā sthitiḥ,
T04bsa054_u:11723: te 'pi dṛśyante annabhakṣaṇādiṣu pravartamānāḥ karpāsabījaṃ paṭārthinaḥ pariharantaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:11729: tathāhi- kāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāraṇe astīti niścayaḥ ubhayorapi tattvajñasya lokasya ca sādhāraṇaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11742: evaṃ ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ kāpilaḥ siddhāntavādino 'pi sādhāraṇadūṣaṇamāsañjayannāha pramāṇamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:11744: yadi pramāṇamapi paramārthataḥ pramāṇaṃ na bhavatīti bhavatāṃ pakṣaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:11746: pramāṇasyāprāmāṇye tatpramitaṃ tena pramāṇena paricchinnaṃ mṛṣā alīkaṃ prāpnoti /
T04bsa054_u:11750: tadā yeyaṃ bhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tattvataḥ paramārthataḥ śūnyatā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā tasmāt pramāṇānniścitā,
T04bsa054_u:11753: sarvapramāṇopadarśitasya mṛṣārthatvāt sāpi sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā tadvicārakapramāṇopadarśitaiva iti samāno nyāyaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:11757: kalpanākalpitaṃ samāropitaṃ bhāvamaspṛṣṭvā kalpanābuddhayā agṛhītvā tadabhāvo na gṛhyate nālambyate /
T04bsa054_u:11758: tathāhi ghaṭamāropitarūpeṇa parikalpya tatsaṃbandhitayā ghaṭābhāvaṃ pratipadyate lokaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11759: ghaṭasya vicāreṇa lokaprasiddhenaiva yadā na kiṃcit svarūpamavatiṣṭhate,
T04bsa054_u:11760: tadā tadabhāvaḥ tadviparyayarūpaḥ sutarāṃ na kaścit /
T04bsa054_u:11762: tasmādbhāvo mṛṣā yo hi tasyābhāvaḥ sphuṭaṃ mṛṣā // Bca_9.140 //
T04bsa054_u:11766: tasya niḥsvabhāvasya bhāvasya abhāvo virahaḥ sphuṭaṃ niścitaṃ mṛṣā asatyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11768: evaṃ ca bhāvābhāvayoḥ parikalpitarūpatve sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvataiva avatiṣṭhate //
T04bsa054_u:11769: punaridameva upasaṃhāravyājena vispaṣṭayannāha tasmāt svapne ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:11770: tasmātsvapne sute naṣṭe sa nāstīti vikalpanā /
T04bsa054_u:11772: tasmāt svapne middhākrāntacittāvasthāyāmutpannavinaṣṭe sute putre sati sa putro nāstīti vikalpanā tadabhāvavikalpaḥ / kiṃ karoti?
T04bsa054_u:11774: tasya sutasya bhāvaḥ tasyāstitvaṃ tasya kalpanā sattvasamāropaḥ tasyotpādaḥ unmajjanaṃ taṃ ni[vi?]badhnāti /
T04bsa054_u:11775: niṣedhayati- tathaiva tarhi seti cenna mṛṣā ca sā // Bca_9.141 //
T04bsa054_u:11776: sā kalpanā tadbhāvakalpanāṃ vibadhnāti api mṛṣā /
T04bsa054_u:11778: athavā satyābhimate eva sute svapne naṣṭe sarvametadyojanīyam /
T04bsa054_u:11780: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yathā svapnopalabdhasya vastuno 'nutpannāniruddhasyāpi kalpanopadarśitau bhāvābhāvau na paramārthasantau,
T04bsa054_u:11782: na ca sā kalpanā asatyārthaviṣayatayā apramāṇam,
T04bsa054_u:11785: iti tasyā aprāmāṇye 'pi na sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā vighaṭate /
T04bsa054_u:11791: evamahetubhūtasvabhāveśvarapradhānakartṛtvaṃ jagato nirākṛtya nāpyahetutaḥ ityasyārthaṃ prasādhya upasaṃharannāha tasmādevamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:11796: svabhāvāderahetuto 'kāraṇājjātaṃ kiṃcit kāryaṃ nāsti na vidyate /
T04bsa054_u:11801: nanu yadi nāma svabhāveśvarapradhānāderahetuto na kiṃcidasti,
T04bsa054_u:11803: tat kathaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatā setsyatīti parāśayamāśaṅkaya na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyām iti koṭitrayaṃ samarthayannāha na ca vyastetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:11804: na ca vyastasamasteṣu pratyayeṣu vyavasthitam // Bca_9.142 //
T04bsa054_u:11805: na ca naiva / vyastasamasteṣviti vyasteṣu samastesu ca /
T04bsa054_u:11811: tatra na tāvat svataḥ svabhāvādbhāvā utpadyante /
T04bsa054_u:11812: utpādāt pūrvaṃ tasya svabhāvasyāvidyamānatvāt kuta utpadyantām?
T04bsa054_u:11813: utpanne ca tasmin satyapi svarūpe tasyāpi niṣpannatvāt kimutpadyantām? api ca /
T04bsa054_u:11814: svata eva janmani jātasyaiva punarjanma syāt /
T04bsa054_u:11817: jātasya punarjanmani bījadīnāmeva āsaṃsāraṃ pravṛtteḥ nāṅkurādayaḥ kadācidutpattumavasaraṃ labheran /
T04bsa054_u:11818: na ca etadabhyupagacchato 'pi lokata eva bādhāmanubhavat siddhipathamupayāti,
T04bsa054_u:11824: tathā hi yāvat svabhāvo na bhavati,
T04bsa054_u:11830: parato hi janmani iṣyamāṇe śālibījādapi kodravāṅkurasyotpattiprasaṅgaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11835: tathāpi kāryakāraṇayoranyonyajanyajanakabhāvasya niyāmakatvāt na sarvasyotpattiriti cet, na /
T04bsa054_u:11836: anutpanne hi kārye kasmin punarasya śaktiriti vaktavyam /
T04bsa054_u:11843: iti na kiṃcit kenacidekasaṃtatipatitaṃ sadṛśaṃ vā janyajanakabhāvaniyataṃ vā asti,
T04bsa054_u:11851: na hi ekenāndhenādṛṣṭamārgo bahubhirapi draṣṭuṃ śakyate /
T04bsa054_u:11852: pratyekaṃ vā sikatāstailadānāsamarthā militā api tatsamarthā bhavanti /
T04bsa054_u:11854: iti svaparobhayajanitamahetujanitaṃ vā tattvato na kiṃcidasti /
T04bsa054_u:11855: tasmāt paramārthato 'nutpannāniruddhasvabhāvaṃ māyāmarīcipratibimbapratiśrutkāsamaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ svabhāvaśūnyameva sarvaṃ viśvamābhāsate
T04bsa054_u:11859: ihoktaṃ bhagavatā- ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajīvamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambanaṃ
T04bsa054_u:11862: yastu evaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvam- ityādi pūrvavat yāvat- avyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati so 'nuttaradharmaśarīraṃ buddhaṃ paśyati /
T04bsa054_u:11867: atha ca punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:11886: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti /
T04bsa054_u:11887: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti,
T04bsa054_u:11890: evaṃ yāvat puṣpe sati phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11895: yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśaṛtusamavāyāt bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11907: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījasya saṃdhāraṇākṛtyaṃ karomīti /
T04bsa054_u:11908: evaṃ yāvadṛtorapi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījasya pariṇāmanākṛtyaṃ karomīti /
T04bsa054_u:11909: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanita iti /
T04bsa054_u:11910: atha punaḥ satsu eteṣu bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
T04bsa054_u:11911: sa cāyamaṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ
T04bsa054_u:11916: na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti /
T04bsa054_u:11919: na ca yadeva bījaṃ sa evāṅkuraḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11941: evaṃ bāhyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairdraṣṭavyaḥ // iti /
T04bsa054_u:11949: pratītyasamutpādo 'pi yathāvadevaṃ saṃgacchate iti traikālyavādimatamāśaṅkayāha anyata ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:11950: anyato nāpi cāyātaṃ na tiṣṭhati na gacchati /
T04bsa054_u:11960: sa ca dharmo na ca nityaḥ iti kathametat setsyati?
T04bsa054_u:11961: atha pūrvāparakālayoḥ kāritraśūnyatayā dharmasya adhvasu viśeṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11962: tathā hi yadā asaṃprāptakāritraḥ kṛtyaṃ na karoti,
T04bsa054_u:11965: yadā tu kṛtyānnivṛttaḥ tadā atīta iti viśeṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:11968: tadāpi sadbhāvāt kāritramapi kathaṃ na syāditi vaktavyam /
T04bsa054_u:11971: kāritraṃ vā kathamatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca ucyate?
T04bsa054_u:11974: pāścātye ca dharmasyāpi svayamatītatvādivyavasthāyāṃ na kiṃcit kṣīyate /
T04bsa054_u:11986: svabhāvaḥ sarvadā nāsti bhāvo nityaśca neṣyate /
T04bsa054_u:12009: pratibhāsamānasya ca pratyutpannasya na rūpaṃ kiṃcidvicāreṇāvatiṣṭhate, tadā-
T04bsa054_u:12010: māyātaḥ ko viśeṣo 'sya yanmūḍhaiḥ satyataḥ kṛtam // Bca_9.143 //
T04bsa054_u:12011: māyātaḥ aindrajālikanirmitahastyādirūpāyā api niḥsvabhāvatayā viśeṣo naiva kaścit asya hetupratyayopajanitasya vasturūpasya paridṛśyamānasya
T04bsa054_u:12015: āyāti tatkutaḥ kutra yāti ceti nirūpyatām // Bca_9.144 //
T04bsa054_u:12019: yacca vasturūpaṃ māyāhetunā māyāsvabhāvena yadviracitamiti yāvat /
T04bsa054_u:12028: yadi tasya kutaścidāgacchati kvacid gacchati vā upalabhyate //
T04bsa054_u:12033: pratibimbasame tasmin kṛtrime satyatā katham // Bca_9.145 //
T04bsa054_u:12041: evaṃbhūte vasturūpe kṛtrime parāyattavṛttitayā asvābhāvike satyatā amṛṣārthatā kutaḥ?
T04bsa054_u:12044: hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ tadabhāvānna santi ye /
T04bsa054_u:12045: kathaṃ nāma na te spaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamā matāḥ //
T04bsa054_u:12048: na ca hetupratyayānāṃ sāmarthyaṃ kvacidapi paramārthataḥ saṃbhavati //
T04bsa054_u:12052: tatra na vidyamānaḥ kriyate ityāha vidyamānasyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:12054: vidyamānasya kāraṇavyāpārāt prāgeva satsvabhāvasya hetunā kāraṇena kiṃ prayojanam?
T04bsa054_u:12063: syādetat- yadi nāma vidyamānasya niṣpannatvāt kartavyābhāvāt na hetunā kimapi prayojanam,
T04bsa054_u:12064: avidyamānasya tu kiṃ na bhavatītyāha nābhāvasyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:12081: ko vā tarhi abhāvādanyaḥ aparaḥ bhāvatām,
T04bsa054_u:12086: kiṃ tarhi prāgabhāvasya bhāvavirodhinaḥ sadbhāvāttadā bhāvo na bhavati,
T04bsa054_u:12095: tenaivotpadyamānena bhāvena abhāvasya vināśo bhaviṣyatīti cedāha-
T04bsa054_u:12100: tasmāt na ajātena anutpannena bhāvena so 'bhāvaḥ prāgabhāvarūpaḥ apagamiṣyati nivartayiṣyate //
T04bsa054_u:12101: athāpi syāt- mā apagacchatu nāma abhāvaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:12103: utpanne ca bhāve bhāvābhāvayoḥ parasparaparihārāt paścādabhāvaḥ svayameva apagamiṣyatītyāha na cetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:12109: na caiva anapagate anivṛtte abhāve bhāvasyāvasaraḥ avakāśaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:12120: tasmādbhāvātmani abhāvātmani vā kārye na kāraṇasya vyāpāro yujyate /
T04bsa054_u:12121: ubhayānubhayapakṣe ca pratyekapakṣaniṣedhādeva kāraṇavyāpārasya niṣedhaḥ kṛto bhavatīti draṣṭavyam /
T04bsa054_u:12125: na sannutpadyate bhāvo nāpyasan sadasanna ca /
T04bsa054_u:12126: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ jāyate katham //
T04bsa054_u:12128: evaṃ tāvadbhāvasyotpattiḥ paramārthato na kathaṃcidapi saṃgacchate /
T04bsa054_u:12129: nāpi kathaṃcidutpannasya satsvabhāvasya nivṛttiryujyate ityāha bhāvaścetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:12136: tadā ca ekasyaiva vastunaḥ dvayoḥ svabhāvayoḥ prasaṅgaḥ syāt,
T04bsa054_u:12138: na ca bhāvatāṃ parityajya abhāvarūpatāṃ yātīti vaktumucitam /
T04bsa054_u:12139: tadā ca bhāvasyaivābhāvāt ko 'bhāvarūpatāṃ yātīti na vidmaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:12142: itthaṃ bhāvasyotpādavināśayoḥ paramārthato 'bhāvaṃ prasādhya upasaṃharannāha evamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:12143: evaṃ na ca nirodho 'sti na ca bhāvo 'sti sarvadā /
T04bsa054_u:12152: “utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasamatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā dharmadhātuḥ tathatā avitathatā” /
T04bsa054_u:12159: idaṃ niḥsvabhāvatāsamānādhikaraṇaṃ jagadviścaṃ sattvabhājanalokasaṃjñitaṃ sacarācaraṃ vā /
T04bsa054_u:12164: sā ca śūnyatā notpadyate na nirudhyate āha- yadi evaṃ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā,
T04bsa054_u:12172: āha- yadetaduktaṃ bhagavatā saṃskṛtā dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante ca ityasya tathāgatabhāṣitasya ko 'bhiprāyaḥ?
T04bsa054_u:12174: tatra tathāgato mahākārūṇiko lokasya trāsapadaparihārārthaṃ vyavahāravaśāduktavān utpadyante nirudhyante ca /
T04bsa054_u:12175: na cātra kasyaciddharmasya utpādo na nirodhaḥ // iti //
T04bsa054_u:12178: iti jagato niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ tadantargatānāṃ narakādigatīnāmapi niḥsvabhāvataivetyupadarśayannāha svapnetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:12180: svapnena upamā tulyaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ tathoktāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:12188: sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatayā vicāre vimarśe sati yasmāt kadalīsamāḥ kadalīvanniḥsārāḥ gatayaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:12195: nirvṛtānirvṛtānāṃ na viśeṣo nāsti vastutaḥ // Bca_9.151 //
T04bsa054_u:12200: kutaḥ? vastutaḥ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatayā prakṛtiparinirvṛtatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:12204: ātmanaśca pareṣāṃ ca samatā tena te matā //
T04bsa054_u:12206: iti paramārthatattvāparijñānānmithyābhiniveśādāropitajagajjālamupakalpya ātmanaiva ātmānamākulayati bālajanaḥ ityupadarśayannāha evamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:12207: evaṃ śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu kiṃ labdhaṃ kiṃ hṛtaṃ bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:12208: satkṛtaḥ paribhūto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati // Bca_9.152 //
T04bsa054_u:12209: kutaḥ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā kiṃ priyaṃ vā kimapriyam /
T04bsa054_u:12210: kā tṛṣṇā kutra sā tṛṣṇā mṛgyamāṇā svabhāvataḥ // Bca_9.153 //
T04bsa054_u:12211: vicāre jīvalokaḥ kaḥ ko nāmātra mariṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:12212: ko bhaviṣyati ko bhūtaḥ ko bandhuḥ kasya kaḥ suhṛt // Bca_9.154 //
T04bsa054_u:12213: evaṃ pratipāditanyāyena śūnyeṣu niḥsvabhāveṣu dharmeṣu kiṃ labdham,
T04bsa054_u:12215: kiṃ hṛtam, kimapahṛtaṃ kena kasyacit bhavet,
T04bsa054_u:12218: paribhūtaḥ apakṛto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati?
T04bsa054_u:12224: kiṃ priyaṃ vā kiṃ vallabhaṃ vā?
T04bsa054_u:12229: kā tṛṣṇā yayā lābhādyarthaṃ tṛṣyati janaḥ?
T04bsa054_u:12236: vicāre paramārthasvarūpanirūpaṇe sati jīvalokaḥ sattvalokaḥ kaḥ?
T04bsa054_u:12239: jīvalokasya vicāreṇa asatsvabhāvatvāt ko nāmātra jīvaloke mariṣyati,
T04bsa054_u:12255: parigṛhṇantu avidyamānameva tu svarūpamāropya madvidhā iti granthakāraḥ ātmānameva nidarśanaṃ karoti /
T04bsa054_u:12264: tacca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtam /
T04bsa054_u:12270: yāvat na lābho nālābho na duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ na yaśo nāyaśaḥ na rūpaṃ nārūpamityādi /
T04bsa054_u:12271: tatra jinena janasya kṛtena saṃvṛti deśita lokahitāya /
T04bsa054_u:12274: saṃvṛti prajñapayī narasiṃhaḥ ṣaṅgatayo bhaṇi sattvagaṇānām /
T04bsa054_u:12275: narakagatīśca tathaiva ca pretān āsurakāya narāṃśca marūṃśca //
T04bsa054_u:12304: vyathā yeṣvapāyeṣu te tathoktāḥ, teṣu ca /
T04bsa054_u:12307: āgatyāgatya sugatiṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā sukhocitāḥ // Bca_9.157 //
T04bsa054_u:12314: bhave saṃsāre kāmarūpārūpyasvabhāve bahuprapātaśca bahutara upaghātaśca /
T04bsa054_u:12316: tatra ca bhave prapāte vā atattvamīdṛśaṃ vyāmohavijṛmbhitametādṛśaṃ sarvajanasādhāraṇaṃ yathāvidhaṃ pratipāditaṃ paridṛśyamānaṃ vā /
T04bsa054_u:12326: anantā anavadhikālavipākatayā aparyantā vā duḥkhānāmativipulatayā mahāyānamanadhigamya nistarītumaśakyatvāt, sāgarāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:12327: tathāpi kathaṃcit mahatā vīryeṇa kuśalapakṣopacayāt bhūyasā kālena sugatiṃ prāpya kṣapayituṃ śakyante ityata āha tatraivamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:12332: tatra tathārūpe samāveśe evaṃ paridṛśyamānarūpā alpabalatā /
T04bsa054_u:12339: ārogyasya ārogyāya vārogopaśamāya vyāpāraiḥ viśeṣeṇa kaṭutiktabhaiṣajyakaṣāyapānādibhiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:12340: kuśalopārjanamantareṇa vṛthā caiva āyurvahatyāśu iti vakṣyamāṇena saṃbandhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:12354: vṛthaiva niṣphalameva kuśalapakṣopacayarahitatvāt āyurvahati yāti āśu śīghram,
T04bsa054_u:12366: tatrāpi evamavasthāṃ gate 'pi abhyastavikṣepaḥ pariśīlitamauddhatyaṃ tasya nivāraṇaṃ nivartanaṃ tasya gatiranupraveśaḥ kutaḥ? naivāsti /
T04bsa054_u:12367: tatrāpi evamanarthaparaṃparāyāṃ sthitānāṃ kathaṃcit kuśalapakṣaṃ samīkṣya māro yatate mahāpāyaprapātane,
T04bsa054_u:12371: evamapi kadācit satyaratnādiṣu abhisaṃpratyayavaśāt kathaṃcit kalyāṇamupajāyate ityāha tatrāsanmārgetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:12375: tatra evaṃ daśāṃ prāpnoti- samyagdṛṣṭivipakṣasya asanmārgasya cārvākamīmāṃsakādiparidīpitasya bāhulyāt bhūyastvāt vicikitsā sanmārge vimatiśca
T04bsa054_u:12383: kathaṃcit buddhotpādasaṃbhave 'pi kleśaughaḥ [jātijarāmaraṇā] dīnāmoghaḥ avicchinnaḥ pravāhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:12391: sāṃpratamevaṃ sattvān suduḥkhitān samīkṣya karuṇāmreḍitahṛdayaḥ paraduḥkhaduḥkhī śāstrakāraḥ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ śocayannāha aho bateti-
T04bsa054_u:12396: ke punaramī sattvāḥ śocanīyā ityāha ye ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:12398: ye sattvā avidyāndhīkṛtajñānalocanāḥ nekṣante na paśyanti svadauḥsthityaṃ svasya ātmano duḥkhāvasthitatvam /
T04bsa054_u:12404: snātvā snātvā jalāvagāhanaṃ kṛtvā kṛtvā yathā kaścidupahatabuddhiḥ śītārtaḥ sukhābhilāṣī /
T04bsa054_u:12412: aho bata atibahulatarājñānāndhakārākramaṇamamīṣāṃ yadātmagatamapi pramādaṃ na paśyantītyāha ajaretyādi-
T04bsa054_u:12415: na vidyate jarā jīrṇatā yeṣāṃ te ajarāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:12417: teṣāmajarāṇāmamarāṇāmiva līlā viceṣṭitaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:12418: teṣāmevamanayā līlayā viharatāṃ niścitaṃ vicaratāṃ satām /
T04bsa054_u:12426: tadyathā mahārāja catasṛbhyo digbhyaścatvāraḥ parvatā āgaccheyuḥ,
T04bsa054_u:12434: tebhyo na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyitum,
T04bsa054_u:12437: yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyitum,
T04bsa054_u:12446: tadyathā mahārāja siṃho mṛgarājo rūpasaṃpanno javasaṃpannaḥ sujātanakhadaṃṣṭrākarālo mṛgagaṇamanupraviśya mṛgaṃ gṛhītvā yathākāmakaraṇīyaṃ karoti
T04bsa054_u:12447: sa ca mṛgarājo 'tibalaṃ vyālamukhamāsādya vivaśo bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:12448: evameva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyena apagatamadasya atrāṇasya apratiśaraṇasya
T04bsa054_u:12449: aparāyaṇasya marmasu cchidyamāneṣu māṃsaśoṇite pariśuṣyamāṇe parituṣitavihvalavadanasya
T04bsa054_u:12453: imaṃ lokaṃ jahataḥ paralokamākramataḥ mahāpathaṃ vrajataḥ mahākāntāraṃ praviśataḥ
T04bsa054_u:12455: karmavāyunā nīyamānasya nimittīkṛtāṃ diśaṃ vrajato nānyat trāṇaṃ nānyat śaraṇaṃ nānyat
T04bsa054_u:12457: dharmo hi mahārāja tasmin samaye trāṇaṃ layanaṃ śaraṇaṃ bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:12474: duḥkhānyeva agnayaḥ tai saṃtāpitānāṃ sattvānāṃ śāntiṃ jātyādiduḥkhānalatāpapraśamanam /
T04bsa054_u:12486: evamabhyudayasaṃpadi pareṣāṃ ceto vidhāya niḥśreyasasaṃpadi pradarśayannāha kadetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:12489: kadā kasmin kāle upalambhadṛṣṭibhyo bhāvagrāhābhiniviṣṭebhyo deśayiṣyāmi prakāśayiṣyāmi /
T04bsa054_u:12495: puṇyasya jñānādeḥ saṃbhāraṃ kadā upalambhadṛṣṭibhyo deśayiṣyāmīti saṃbandhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:12507: te santo guṇadoṣayorapi ca taiḥ sāraṃ vimiśrādato
T04bsa054_u:12508: grāhyaṃ sarvamakalmaṣaṃ viṣamiva tyājyaṃ duruktaṃ yadi //
T04bsa054_u:12509: na yuktamuktaṃ kimapīha yanmayā paraṃ prajātaṃ skhalitaṃ tadeva me /
T04bsa054_u:12510: nanu grahīṣyanti mamātra sādhavo matiṃ mayānena kṛtena sāṃpratam //
T04bsa054_u:12513: yaḥ saṃvṛtyā vrajati manaso gocaratvaṃ kathaṃcit
T04bsa054_u:12514: tādṛśyarthe skhalati na matiḥ kasya vai mādṛśasya /
T04bsa054_u:12519: yatpuṇyaṃ samupārjitaṃ hitaphalaṃ tenāśu sarvo jano
T04bsa054_u:12527: āśu prāptikarī jinasya padavīṃ sādya likhitvā mayā
T04bsa054_u:12528: prāptaṃ yatkuśalaṃ susaṃpadi padaṃ tenāstu buddho janaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:12549: tena sarve janāḥ santu bodhicaryāvibhūṣaṇāḥ // Bca_10.1 //
T04bsa054_u:12562: so 'ṅgārarāśirmaṇirāśirastu taptā ca bhūḥ sphāṭikakuṭṭimaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:12565: tacchastrayuddhaṃ ca paraspareṇa krīḍārthamadyāstu ca puāpayuddham // Bca_10.9 //
T04bsa054_u:12571: dhvāntaṃ dhvastaṃ samantātsukharatijananī kasya saumyā prabheyam /
T04bsa054_u:12574: dṛṣṭvā prāmodyavegādvayapagataduritā yāntu tenaiva sārdham // Bca_10.11 //
T04bsa054_u:12579: āyātāyāta śīghraṃ bhayamapanayata bhrātaro jīvitāḥ smaḥ
T04bsa054_u:12582: jātaṃ saṃbodhicittaṃ sakalajanaparitrāṇamātā dayā ca // Bca_10.13 //
T04bsa054_u:12586: dṛṣṭvāgre mañjughoṣaṃ bhavatu kalakalaḥ sāṃprataṃ nārakāṇām // Bca_10.14 //
T04bsa054_u:12592: bhavantu sukhinaḥ pretā yathottarakurau narāḥ // Bca_10.17 //
T04bsa054_u:12593: saṃtarpyantāṃ pretāḥ strāpyantāṃ śītalā bhavantu sadā /
T04bsa054_u:12595: andhāḥ paśyantu rūpāṇi śṛṇvantu badhirāḥ sadā /
T04bsa054_u:12600: udvigrāśca nirudvegā dhṛtimanto bhavantu ca // Bca_10.21 //
T04bsa054_u:12602: durbalā balinaḥ santu strigdhacittāḥ parasparam // Bca_10.22 //
T04bsa054_u:12604: sarvā diśaḥ śivāḥ santu sarveṣāṃ pathivartinām /
T04bsa054_u:12605: yena kāryeṇa gacchanti tadupāyena sidhyatu // Bca_10.23 //
T04bsa054_u:12607: kṣemeṇa kūlamāsādya ramantāṃ saha bandhubhiḥ // Bca_10.24 //
T04bsa054_u:12618: yāḥ kāścana striyo loke puruṣatvaṃ vrajantu tāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:12619: prāpnuvantūccatāṃ nīcā hatamānā bhavantu ca // Bca_10.30 //
T04bsa054_u:12621: viramya sarvapāpebhyaḥ kurvantu kuśalaṃ sadā // Bca_10.31 //
T04bsa054_u:12625: nityaṃ jīvantu sukhitā mṛtyuśabdo 'pi naśyatu // Bca_10.33 //
T04bsa054_u:12629: mṛdvī ca vaiḍūryamayī bhūmiḥ sarvatra tiṣṭhatu // Bca_10.35 //
T04bsa054_u:12638: sphīto bhavatu lokaśca rājā bhavatu dhārmikaḥ // Bca_10.39 //
T04bsa054_u:12639: śaktā bhavantu cauṣadhyo mantrāḥ sidhyantu jāpinām /
T04bsa054_u:12641: mā kaścidduḥkhitaḥ sattvo mā pāpī mā ca rogitaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:12642: mā hīnaḥ paribhūto vā mā bhūtkaścicca durmanāḥ // Bca_10.41 //
T04bsa054_u:12644: nityaṃ syātsaṃghasāmagrī saṃghakāryaṃ ca sidhyatu // Bca_10.42 //
T04bsa054_u:12665: yadā ca draṣṭukāmaḥ syāṃ praṣṭukāmaśca kiṃcana /
T04bsa054_u:12668: yathā carati mañjuśrīḥ saiva caryā bhavenmama // Bca_10.54 //
